title_ar: Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ù‚ÙŠØ§Ø³ Ø¶ØºØ· Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ù… Ø³ÙŠØªØ²Ù† CH453 BCN - Ø¯Ù‚Ø© Ù‡Ø§Ø¯Ø¦Ø© Ù„Ù†ØªØ§Ø¦Ø¬ Ù…ÙˆØ«ÙˆÙ‚Ø©
description_en:
Achieve accurate and reliable readings with the **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN**. This digital device boasts incredibly quiet operation, making it ideal for use anytime without disturbing anyone. With its 90-reading memory recall function, you can easily track and compare your past results. It also includes an irregular heartbeat indicator and a body movement indicator to ensure you get the most precise data.

The **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN** is operated with a single touch and provides an average of the last three readings for enhanced accuracy. It is a sturdy and durable device designed for long-lasting performance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN**:
â­ Plug the air hose connector firmly into the main unit's socket.
â­ Attach the cuff around your arm, ensuring the blue marker is towards the palm side and the cuff is snug but comfortable.
â­ Place your arm on a table so the center of the cuff is at heart level.
â­ Press the "START/STOP" button to begin the measurement.
â­ Results will be displayed on the screen.
â­ Press "START/STOP" to turn off the device, or it will power off automatically.
â­ If the irregular heartbeat indicator appears frequently, consult your doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN**:
â­ Blood Pressure Monitor
â­ Wrap Cuff (SCN-003)
â­ Instruction Manual
â­ Batteries and Storage Case

#BloodPressure #Citizen #BPmonitor #HeartHealth #HealthDevice #Health #SaudiArabia #Healthcare #Prevention #Wellness

description_en:
Experience luxurious freshness with **City Men** Musk Deo Spray. Specially formulated for the modern man, this spray offers superior protection against sweat and body odor, ensuring you feel refreshed and attractive all day long. **City Men** Deo Spray features a unique formula that empowers you with confidence to face any challenge, while its rich musk fragrance adds a touch of sophistication and distinction. Its convenient 150 ml size makes it your perfect companion for all occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use for even distribution.
â­ Hold the can approximately 15 cm from your skin.
â­ Spray evenly onto clean, dry skin, especially underarms.
â­ Allow the deodorant to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Use daily or as needed for long-lasting protection and fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men**:
â­ Butane
â­ Propane
â­ Isobutane
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA

#CityMen #Deodorant #DeoSpray #MensFragrance #Musk #MensGrooming #Freshness #Confidence #SaudiArabia #SaudiPerfume

description_en:
Experience superior protection and long-lasting freshness all day with **City Men** Deo Spray! Specially designed for active men seeking unwavering confidence and renewed vitality. **City Men** Deo Spray offers an advanced formula that effectively combats sweat and body odor, leaving you feeling fresh and attractive at every moment. Its energizing fragrance provides a sense of vitality and energy, while its quick-drying formula prevents any residue on your clothes.

â­ Effective protection against sweat and body odor.
â­ Refreshing and energizing fragrance that lasts.
â­ Quick-drying formula with no residue.
â­ Dermatologically tested for skin safety.
â­ Ideal for daily use by active men.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men** Deo Spray:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Hold the can approximately 15 cm from your body.
â­ Spray evenly on clean, dry skin, especially underarms.
â­ Allow the deodorant to dry before dressing.
â­ Use daily or as needed for continuous freshness and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men** Deo Spray:
â­ Butane
â­ Propane
â­ Isobutane
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **City Men Deo Spray Dynamic**, your perfect personal protector. Specially formulated for men with active lifestyles, this spray offers powerful protection against sweat and unpleasant body odor all day long, featuring a quick-drying formula that leaves no annoying residue. Enjoy the invigorating and dynamic scent that lasts, keeping you confident and comfortable at all times.

â­ Superior protection against sweat and body odor.
â­ Refreshing and dynamic scent that lasts.
â­ Quick-drying formula, leaves no white marks.
â­ Dermatologically tested for skin safety.
â­ Convenient 150 ml spray bottle for easy use.
â­ Ideal for daily use and sports activities.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men Deo Spray Dynamic**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm away from your body.
â­ Spray evenly on clean, dry skin, especially underarms.
â­ Allow the deodorant to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Use daily or as needed for ultimate freshness and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men Deo Spray Dynamic**
â­ Butane
â­ Propane
â­ Isobutane
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA

#CityMen #Deodorant #BodySpray #LongLastingFreshness #MensFragrance #SweatProtection #MensGrooming #SaudiFragrance #Riyadh #Jeddah

Experience all-day freshness and confidence with **City Men Deo Spray Fashion 150 ml**. This unique formula offers effective protection against sweat odor, coupled with an elegant and attractive fragrance that lasts. Perfect for daily wear and special occasions, it leaves your skin feeling vitalized and energetic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men Deo Spray Fashion 150 ml**:

â­ Hold the spray can 15 cm away from your body.
â­ Spray evenly onto clean, dry skin, focusing on underarms.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and unwavering confidence with **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml Musk New**. This deodorant is formulated to provide superior protection against sweat and body odor, empowering you with a feeling of cleanliness and vitality throughout the day.

The **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml Musk New** features a unique formula that offers a sense of comfort and freshness to your skin, while its classic, luxurious musk fragrance adds an irresistible allure. It's your ideal choice to start your day with energy and end it with the same vitality.

â­ Attractive masculine musk fragrance that lasts all day.
â­ Powerful and effective anti-perspirant protection to keep you dry and shielded.
â­ Fast-drying formula that leaves no residue or stains.
â­ Dermatologically tested to ensure skin safety.
â­ Convenient 50 ml roll-on bottle for easy application.
â­ Ideal for daily use by men seeking elegance and confidence.
â­ Travel-friendly size, perfect for carrying anywhere.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml Musk New**
â­ Ensure underarms are clean and completely dry.
â­ Gently shake the bottle before use to ensure ingredient distribution.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of deodorant to each underarm.
â­ Allow it to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Use daily for optimal results and continuous protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml Musk New**
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Benzophenone-4

description_en:
Experience lasting freshness and confidence with **City Men** Deodorant Spray Exciting, 150 ml. Designed for the modern man, this spray offers superior protection against sweat and body odor, keeping you dry and smelling great all day long with its distinctive masculine fragrance.

â­ Provides effective and reliable anti-perspirant protection.
â­ Delivers a long-lasting feeling of freshness and vitality.
â­ Features an exciting, attractive fragrance with a sophisticated masculine touch.
â­ Fast-drying formula leaves no residue on clothing.
â­ Easy-to-use spray format for quick and even application.
â­ Ideal for both daily wear and special occasions.
â­ Generous 150 ml size ensures a long-lasting supply.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men** Deodorant Spray Exciting:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the spray can approximately 15 cm away from your body.
â­ Spray evenly onto clean, dry skin, focusing on the underarms.
â­ Allow the deodorant to dry completely before getting dressed.
â­ Use daily or as needed for continuous freshness and odor protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men** Deodorant Spray Exciting:
â­ Butane
â­ Propane
â­ Isobutane
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA

Experience ultimate freshness with **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Energize**. Designed to provide you with a feeling of vitality and energy that lasts all day, offering effective protection against sweat and body odor. Its advanced formula ensures unparalleled dryness and confidence, making it the perfect companion for the modern, active man. Enjoy continuous freshness every moment with **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Energize**, the ideal choice to maintain your comfort and allure throughout the day.

â­ Energizing and refreshing fragrance that lasts all day.
â­ Powerful protection against sweat and body odor.
â­ Quick-drying formula that prevents stains.
â­ Convenient 50 ml roll-on bottle for easy application.
â­ Ideal for daily use and intense activities.
â­ Dermatologically tested for safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Energize**:
â­ Shake the bottle gently before use.
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Use daily or as needed for lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Energize**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Panthenol

description_en:
Discover freshness and protection all day long with **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Dynamic New**. This deodorant is designed to give you a feeling of confidence and comfort with effective protection against sweat odor. Its unique formula prevents bacterial growth and provides a long-lasting refreshing fragrance. **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Dynamic New** is perfect for your active lifestyle, keeping you feeling fresh even in the toughest conditions.

â­ Effective protection against sweat and odor for a long time.
â­ Refreshing scent that gives you a feeling of freshness throughout the day.
â­ Helps reduce odor-causing bacteria.
â­ Quick-drying formula that leaves no marks on clothes.
â­ Dermatologically tested for skin safety.
â­ Convenient 50 ml roll-on bottle, perfect for travel.
â­ Suitable for daily use by men who prioritize cleanliness and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Dynamic New**:
â­ Gently shake the bottle before use.
â­ Apply the deodorant directly to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow it to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Use daily for best results or as needed throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men Deo Roll On 50 ml Dynamic New**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Benzophenone-4

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness with **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml**. This deodorant is designed to provide the perfect balance of elegance and energy, keeping you feeling confident all day. Ideal for the modern man, it offers reliable protection against odor and dryness, ensuring you stay stylish and comfortable in any situation.

â­ Stylish and fresh fragrance that lasts all day.
â­ Effective anti-perspirant providing dryness and protection.
â­ Convenient 50 ml roll-on bottle for easy application.
â­ Dermatologically tested for skin safety.
â­ Quick-drying formula leaving no stains.
â­ Perfect for the fashion-conscious man.
â­ Compact and travel-friendly packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml**:
â­ Shake the bottle gently before use.
â­ Apply the roll-on deodorant to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow the deodorant to dry before dressing.
â­ Use daily or as needed for long-lasting freshness and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Benzophenone-4

description_en:
**City Men Deo Roll On 50ml Exciting New** delivers an exhilarating fragrance and all-day protection against body odor. Its unique formula provides a refreshing experience while keeping you dry, confident, and odor-free. Perfect for the modern man who thrives on excitement and energy, this roll-on deodorant ensures you stay fresh and protected during any activity, whether at work, after a workout, or while socializing.

**Product Features:**
â­ Invigorating fragrance that lasts all day long.
â­ Powerful anti-perspirant formula for dryness and odor protection.
â­ Convenient 50 ml roll-on bottle for precise and easy application.
â­ Dermatologically tested for safety on skin.
â­ Fast-drying formula that leaves no residue.
â­ Ideal for daily use and for men with active lifestyles.
â­ Portable and travel-friendly packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml Exciting New**:
â­ Shake the bottle gently before use.
â­ Apply the roll-on deodorant to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow the deodorant to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Use daily or as needed for long-lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **City Men Deo Roll On 50ml Exciting New**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Panthenol
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Benzophenone-4

description_en:
Introducing **Signal Toothpaste Cavity Fighter** in 120 ml, the ultimate solution for protecting your teeth against decay and acid attacks. Our innovative formula relies on the Pro-Fluoride Complex and active Micro-Calcium to repair tiny invisible holes, providing robust protection and long-term fortification for your teeth.

â­ Effective protection against cavities and acid attacks.
â­ Contains active fluoride and calcium for enhanced dental health.
â­ Offers continuous protection even between brushings.
â­ Clinically proven efficacy in maintaining dental health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Toothpaste Cavity Fighter**:
â­ For children up to 6 years: Use a pea-sized amount with supervision to minimize swallowing.
â­ For adults and children 2 years and older: Brush teeth thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day.
â­ Consult a dentist if consuming fluoride from other sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Toothpaste Cavity Fighter**:
â­ Active Fluoride Complex.
â­ Active Micro-Calcium.
â­ Other ingredients to promote oral and dental health.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¬Ù†Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø¨Ù†ÙƒÙ‡Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙØ±Ø§ÙˆÙ„Ø© 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Signal Kids Strawberry Toothpaste is expertly crafted to make brushing an enjoyable experience for your little ones. Featuring a delightful strawberry flavor and a low-foam formula, it encourages children to brush regularly. Enriched with active fluoride, it provides robust protection against cavities and sugar acid attacks, while also strengthening enamel and safeguarding milk teeth. 

This toothpaste transforms brushing into an exciting adventure, preventing plaque buildup and diligently protecting gums and teeth. Brushing before bed becomes easier and more delightful with Signal Kids Strawberry Toothpaste, fostering healthy oral hygiene habits from an early age.

â­ Infused with a beloved strawberry flavor that makes brushing fun.
â­ Rich in active fluoride for strong cavity protection and enamel strengthening.
â­ Specifically formulated for children to protect milk teeth and promote oral health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal** Kids Strawberry Toothpaste:
â­ Apply a small amount to a soft-bristled toothbrush.
â­ Encourage your child to brush for two minutes.
â­ Rinse mouth with water and avoid swallowing.
â­ Use twice daily.
â­ Supervise young children during brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal** Kids Strawberry Toothpaste:
â­ Active Ingredients: Sodium Fluoride (500 ppm Fluoride).
â­ Other Ingredients: Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Aromo, Cellulose Gum, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, CI 42051.

#Signal #KidsToothpaste #StrawberryFlavor #DentalCare #OralHygiene #HealthyTeeth #ChildrensHealth #SaudiArabia #Toothpaste #KidsHealth

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¬Ù†Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† ÙØ­Ù… Ø¹Ù†Ø§ØµØ± Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹Ø© 75 Ù…Ù„ Ù„ØªØ¨ÙŠÙŠØ¶ ÙˆØ­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ØµØ­Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙÙ…
description_en:
Discover the power of nature with **Signal** Complete 8 Nature Elements whitening toothpaste, delivering a cleaner and whiter smile. This innovative toothpaste, enriched with 8 nature elements, effectively boosts your oral health protection. It contains Zinc Minerals, an antibacterial of natural origins, clinically proven to fight bacteria for healthier teeth and a visibly whiter smile in just two weeks. The toothpaste formula is crafted from 96% ingredients of natural origins, infused with 100% natural charcoal for deep cleaning and noticeable whitening.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal**:

For optimal oral health and protection for your entire family, follow these simple steps:
â­ In the morning: Brush with **Signal** toothpaste and toothbrush, then rinse with **Signal** mouthwash.
â­ During the day: Refresh your breath with **Signal** mouthwash.
â­ At night: Brush again with **Signal** toothpaste and toothbrush, then rinse with **Signal** mouthwash.
â­ Remember to change your toothbrush every 3 months and visit your dentist regularly for the best results.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For children under the age of six: Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste and brush under adult supervision.
â­ Do not swallow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal**:

â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Zinc Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Charcoal Powder, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin. Q1 Limonene.

description_en:
Experience complete dental protection with **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Original**. This advanced formula features Pro-Fluoride Complex and active Micro-Calcium, working synergistically to enhance your oral health. It shields your teeth against acid attacks from food residue, helps repair tiny invisible holes, provides superior cavity protection, and fortifies your teeth for long-term strength. Achieve a healthy, radiant smile with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Original**:
â­ Brush teeth thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day.
â­ For children under 6 years: Use a pea-sized amount and supervise brushing to minimize swallowing.
â­ Consult a dentist or physician if consuming fluoride from other sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Original**:
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ PEG-32
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Aroma (Flavor)
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Mica
â­ Calcium Gluconate
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Limonene
â­ Phenylcarbinol
â­ CI 12490
â­ CI 77891

description_en:
Discover a brighter smile with **Signal Whitening Toothpaste**. This innovative toothpaste is specially formulated to effectively whiten your teeth. It contains the Pro-Fluoride Complex with active Micro-Calcium that works to protect your teeth against acid attacks caused by food debris. This unique formula helps repair tiny invisible holes caused by acids, providing superior protection against cavities and enhancing your teeth's strength for noticeable whitening results and a healthy, attractive smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Whitening Toothpaste**:
â­ Dental professionals recommend brushing teeth twice a day with a fluoride toothpaste.
â­ For children under 6 years: Use a pea-sized amount and supervise brushing to minimize swallowing.
â­ If consuming fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or public health doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Whitening Toothpaste**:
â­ Sorbitol, Aqua (Water), Hydrated Silica, PEG-32, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma (Flavor), Cellulose Gum, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Glycerin, Limonene, CI 77891.

#Signal #Toothpaste #TeethWhitening #WhiteTeeth #OralCare #DentalCare #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia #HollywoodSmile

description_en:
Discover the **Signal Kids Toothbrush**, specially designed to provide a safe and effective cleaning experience for your dear children.

â­ The **Signal Kids Toothbrush** features ultra-soft, densely packed bristles that ensure deep cleaning, gentle on sensitive gums and teeth.
â­ The small head of the **Signal Kids Toothbrush** reaches all corners of the mouth, helping to prevent gum disease and tooth decay.
â­ This **Signal Kids Toothbrush** offers 3x more bristles than regular brushes for a healthy and radiant smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Kids Toothbrush**:
â­ Dentists recommend changing your toothbrush every 3 months.
â­ For children aged 6 and under: Use a pea-sized amount with supervised brushing to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Kids Toothbrush**:
â­ Ultra-soft filaments (4mm diameter).
â­ Comfortable handle with an attractive design for children.
â­ Safe and high-quality materials.

description_en:
Introduce your child to a delightful brushing experience with **Signal Tp Kids Mixed Fruits Ic 50ml**, featuring a gentle mixed fruits flavor and low foam that makes dental hygiene fun. It effectively protects against sugar acid attacks with active fluoride, strengthening tooth enamel and preventing cavities. This toothpaste is specifically formulated to fortify and safeguard milk teeth, combating plaque buildup and promoting optimal gum health. Make brushing an exciting adventure for your little ones with **Signal Tp Kids Mixed Fruits Ic 50ml**!

â­ Infused with a delightful mixed fruits flavor for a fun and enjoyable brushing experience.
â­ Contains active fluoride that strengthens enamel and protects against sugar acid attacks, effectively preventing cavities.
â­ Specifically designed to protect and strengthen milk teeth, while also helping to prevent plaque build-up and promote healthy gums.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Tp Kids Mixed Fruits Ic 50ml**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount onto a soft-bristled toothbrush.
â­ Encourage your child to brush their teeth for at least two minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water after brushing.
â­ Use twice daily, especially before bedtime and after meals.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Tp Kids Mixed Fruits Ic 50ml**:
â­ Active Ingredients: Sodium Fluoride (500 ppm Fluoride)
â­ Ingredients: Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, CI 42090.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¬Ù†Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ù‚Ø±Ù†ÙÙ„ Ø¹Ù†Ø§ØµØ± Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹Ø© 75 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the natural power of **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Clove 75 Ml** for superior oral health protection. This toothpaste enhances your teeth's strength and maintains gum health, while providing rapid relief from sensitivity with its unique formula.

**Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Clove 75 Ml** contains zinc minerals, an antibacterial of natural origins, clinically proven to fight the causes of gum problems for healthier smiles. This formula, made from 92% natural origin ingredients and infused with a floral taste and 100% natural cloves, is the ideal choice for sensitive teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Clove 75 Ml**

For optimal oral health and complete protection for your entire family, follow these simple steps:
â­ In the morning: Brush with Signal toothpaste + toothbrush and rinse with mouthwash.
â­ During the day: Refresh your breath with Signal mouthwash.
â­ At night: Brush with Signal toothpaste + toothbrush and rinse with Signal mouthwash.
â­ Remember to change your toothbrush every 3 months and visit your dentist regularly.

Cautions & Warnings:
â­ For children under the age of six: Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste and brush under adult supervision.
â­ Do not swallow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Clove 75 Ml**

â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Potassium Citrate, Zinc Citrate, PEG-32, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Parfum, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, CI 73360. Q1 Limonene.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¬Ù†Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„ 8 Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ 100 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Signal Complete 8** offers long-lasting, double antibacterial protection with the gentle power of zinc. Its formula is enriched with Zinc Mineral, renowned for its potent antibacterial properties. It's absorbed by the gums during brushing and gradually released, providing protection for up to 18 hours. Clinically proven to deliver 8 benefits for complete oral care, including protection against cavities, strengthening gums, delivering 18-hour anti-plaque action, fortifying enamel, restoring natural tooth whiteness, freshening breath, fighting tartar formation, and combating bacteria. This advanced formula includes Potassium citrate for rapid relief from tooth sensitivity, and is free from Triclosan.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Complete 8**
â­ For children up to 6 years: Use a pea-sized amount and supervise brushing to minimize swallowing.
â­ For children aged 6 years and older: Brush teeth thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ In case of fluoride intake from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Complete 8**
â­ Water
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Silica
â­ PEG-32
â­ Zinc Citrate
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Flavor
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Mica
â­ Limonene
â­ CI 7260
â­ CI 77491
â­ CI 77891

description_en:
Experience superior dental care and hygiene with the **Signal** Sensisoft Clean Toothbrush. Featuring ultra-soft bristles as thin as 0.01mm, it effectively removes 4 layers of plaque for a deep and thorough clean. Its round and nano tip bristles provide gentle softness while effectively cleaning teeth and gums for all-round protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal**:
â­ For optimal hygiene, replace your toothbrush every 3 months.
â­ For children 6 years and younger, use a pea-sized amount under supervision during brushing to minimize swallowing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal**:
â­ Ultra-soft bristles as thin as 0.01mm.
â­ Designed to provide comfortable softness.
â­ Contains up to 80% PCR (Post-Consumer Recycled) material for eco-friendly care.

description_en:
Discover advanced whitening power with **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Action White**. **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Action White** gives you a brighter smile and comprehensive protection for your teeth.

This toothpaste offers a superior cleaning experience with an innovative formula that effectively whitens teeth and protects them from cavities and acid attacks. Active Micro-Calcium particles help repair tiny invisible holes and strengthen enamel, giving you stronger teeth and better long-term oral health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Action White**
â­ Brush teeth thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ For children under 6 years: Instruct in good brushing and rinsing habits to minimize swallowing.
â­ Consult a dentist or physician if consuming fluoride from other sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Toothpaste Complete 8 Action White**
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ PEG-32
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Aroma (Flavor)
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Mica
â­ Calcium Gluconate
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Limonene
â­ Phenylcarbinol
â­ CI 12490
â­ CI 77891

#Signal #Toothpaste #TeethWhitening #OralCare #HealthySmile #WhiteTeeth #CavityProtection #Fluoride #FreshBreath #DentalHygiene

description_en:
Experience superior oral hygiene with the **Signal** Ultra Reach Toothbrush, expertly engineered with a long neck to precisely access the back of your mouth, where 85%* of tooth decay originates. Its unique head features multi-level bristles for unparalleled cleaning, reaching even the tightest gaps between your teeth and delivering 15%** more anti-plaque efficacy on molars. Designed by Pininfarina, the **Signal** Ultra Reach toothbrush is the first of its kind to incorporate a metal structure for enhanced durability and performance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal** Ultra Reach:
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for a thorough and effective clean.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or as recommended by your dentist.
â­ Rinse the brush thoroughly with water after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal** Ultra Reach:
â­ High-quality, multi-level bristles for deep cleaning.
â­ Ergonomically designed long neck for optimal reach.
â­ Innovative metal structure for enhanced durability.
â­ Comfortable handle for a secure grip.

#SignalToothbrush #DeepClean #OralCare #DentalHealth #ToothDecay #PlaqueRemoval #SaudiBeauty #PersonalCare #HomeEssentials #HealthySmile

description_en:
Discover the power of nature with **Signal Complete 8 Herbal Nature Elements Toothpaste**. Infused with Thyme and Sage, this toothpaste offers superior protection for your oral health, promoting stronger teeth and healthier gums. It features a formula containing Zinc minerals, known for their antibacterial properties of natural origin, clinically proven to combat the causes of gum problems for a healthier smile. The formula is crafted from 96% ingredients of natural origins and delivers a refreshing herbal taste, enriched with 100% natural herbal ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Complete 8 Herbal Nature Elements Toothpaste**:

For optimal oral health and protection for your entire family, follow these simple steps:
â­ In the morning: Brush with **Signal Complete 8 Herbal Nature Elements Toothpaste** and toothbrush, then rinse with mouthwash.
â­ During the day: Refresh your breath with Signal mouthwash.
â­ At night: Brush with the toothpaste and toothbrush again, and rinse with Signal mouthwash.
â­ Remember: Change your toothbrush every 3 months and visit your dentist regularly.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For children under the age of six: Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste and brush under adult supervision.
â­ Do not swallow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Complete 8 Herbal Nature Elements Toothpaste**:

â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Zinc Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Parfum, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, CI 42051, CI 47005. Q1 Limonene.

#Signal #Toothpaste #OralCare #HealthyGums #DentalHealth #FreshBreath #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Dubai

description_en:
Discover nature's power with **Signal** Complete 8 Nature Elements Pink Salt & Chamomile Toothpaste. This toothpaste offers superior protection for your oral health, strengthening your teeth and maintaining healthy gums with its innovative formula.

â­ Contains zinc minerals, a natural antibacterial agent clinically proven for complete protection and fights plaque for 18 hours.
â­ The formula is made from 96% ingredients of natural origins, offering a refreshing touch with 100% natural chamomile oil and pink salt for a unique floral taste experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal** Complete 8 Nature Elements:
â­ In the morning: Brush with **Signal** toothpaste + toothbrush and rinse with mouthwash.
â­ During the day: Refresh your breath with Signal mouthwash.
â­ At night: Brush again with **Signal** toothpaste + toothbrush and rinse with Signal mouthwash.
â­ Remember to change your toothbrush every 3 months and visit your dentist regularly for optimal oral health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal** Complete 8 Nature Elements:
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Zinc Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Sodium chloride, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Lauryl Alcohol, Anthemis Nobilis Flower, CI 73360, Q1 Limonene.

description_en:
Experience a new level of oral hygiene with the **Signal Soft Antibacterial Toothbrush**, meticulously engineered for superior mouth care. Developed in collaboration with dental experts, this innovative toothbrush targets 4 essential areas of your mouthâ€”teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gumsâ€”to effectively eliminate 99.9% of bacteria with its 4D cleaning technology. The dual antibacterial bristles, infused with Silver Ions, ensure a healthier oral environment for up to 3 months, providing deep cleaning and long-lasting freshness. Its precisely designed head with sculpted HD arcs reaches even the most difficult areas, while the 4-angled ergonomic, anti-slip grip handle offers exceptional comfort and perfect control during brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Soft Antibacterial Toothbrush**:
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for two minutes.
â­ Use gentle, circular motions to ensure thorough cleaning of teeth and gums.
â­ Remember to clean your tongue and cheeks regularly.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.
â­ Rinse the toothbrush thoroughly with water after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Soft Antibacterial Toothbrush**:
â­ High-quality soft bristles.
â­ Silver Ions for antibacterial properties.
â­ Precision-engineered brush head with sculpted arcs.
â­ Ergonomic, 4-angled anti-slip handle.
â­ Soft gum massagers to improve blood circulation.

#SignalToothbrush #Antibacterial #SoftBristles #OralCare #HealthySmile #FreshBreath #DentalHealth #SaudiBeauty #SaudiDeals #Saudi Arabia

description_en:
Experience deep cleaning and natural freshness with **Signal** Toothpaste Baking Soda & Nature Elements. This toothpaste is designed to provide thorough cleaning and up to 12 hours of antibacterial protection, thanks to its unique formula that combines the power of baking soda, zinc's antibacterial properties, and the refreshing zest of rosemary and mint. Enjoy a healthier smile and fresh breath all day long.

â­ Deeply cleanses food debris and plaque.
â­ Provides natural freshness that lasts up to 12 hours.
â­ Baking soda for whiter and brighter teeth.
â­ Zinc minerals for natural antibacterial protection.
â­ 96% naturally derived ingredients.
â­ Refreshing floral taste combining rosemary and mint.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal**:
â­ Brush your teeth with **Signal** toothpaste and a toothbrush twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ Use Signal mouthwash to refresh your breath during the day.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months and visit your dentist regularly for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal**:
â­ Sorbitol, Aqua, Hydrated Silica, Zinc Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Sodium bicarbonate, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Sodium carbonate, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol.

#SignalToothpaste #BakingSoda #NaturalFreshness #OralCare #HealthySmile #FreshBreath #DentalHygiene #SaudiArabia #ToothWhitenning #BeautyTips

description_en:
Experience superior hygiene and comprehensive protection with the **Signal Sensisoft Clean Toothbrush for Healthy & Clean Teeth 1+1**. Designed with ultra-fine bristles as thin as 0.01mm, it effectively removes 4 layers of plaque, providing a deep clean that's gentle on your gums. Its three-angle neck ensures easy reach to all areas of your mouth, guaranteeing a comfortable and healthy brushing experience. The variety of colors in this multipack makes brushing time enjoyable for the whole family. The **Signal Sensisoft Clean Toothbrush for Healthy & Clean Teeth 1+1** is committed to sustainability, containing up to 80% PCR material for recyclability.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Sensisoft Clean Toothbrush for Healthy & Clean Teeth 1+1**
â­ Brush your teeth twice a day for two minutes.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months for optimal dental hygiene.
â­ Consult a dentist for children under two years old.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Sensisoft Clean Toothbrush for Healthy & Clean Teeth 1+1**
â­ Soft nano-tip bristles (0.01mm) for deep yet gentle cleaning.
â­ Comfortable handle with a three-angle neck for easy reach.
â­ Contains up to 80% PCR material (recycled plastic).
â­ Multipack with assorted colors.

description_en:
Experience superior oral care with the **Signal Toothbrush with Charcoal & Silver**. Designed for a deeper, healthier clean, its innovative bristles offer an advanced brushing experience.

â­ Ultra-thin bristles that are gentle on teeth and gums.
â­ Infused with Charcoal and Silver ions, making them 99% antibacterial for a more hygienic clean.
â­ Antibacterial bristles repel bacteria growth for up to 3 months.
â­ Features a 3-curved neck handle to reach deeper and clean the full mouth.
â­ Includes a tongue cleaner for comprehensive oral hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Toothbrush with Charcoal & Silver**:
â­ Brush your teeth at least twice a day, in the morning and evening.
â­ Gently brush your teeth and gums for two minutes.
â­ Rinse the toothbrush thoroughly after each use.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Toothbrush with Charcoal & Silver**:
â­ Bristles infused with charcoal and silver ions.
â­ Ergonomic handle with a 3-curved design.
â­ Rubber tongue cleaner.

#Signal #Toothbrush #OralCare #CharcoalToothbrush #SilverToothbrush #HealthyGums #WhiteTeeth #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

â­ Angled neck for easy handling.

â­ Brush your teeth twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.
â­ Use with an appropriate toothpaste for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal White Shine Medium Toothbrush**:

â­ High-quality plastic bristles (Nylon).
â­ Ergonomic plastic handle.

description_en:
Achieve superior oral care with the **Signal** Sensitive Toothbrush Promo Pack, 2x1, designed for deep and gentle cleaning.

The **Signal** 4D Sensitive Toothbrush features scientifically proven 4D clean technology, targeting four essential areas of your mouth: teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums. Developed with dental experts, this toothbrush provides an exceptional clean and promotes fresh breath.

Its head design includes soft, high-definition sculpted arcs that effectively sweep away 99% of bacteria. The 20x thinner, soft tapered bristles reach deep between teeth, gently removing plaque while protecting the gum line for a whole-mouth clean. The raised, angled tip ensures maximum flexibility, and the 4-angled ergonomic handle is designed for a perfect fit to your jawline, making it easier to reach difficult areas and remove stubborn plaque.

This toothbrush also includes soft gum massagers to stimulate gums and improve blood circulation, along with an ergonomic anti-slip grip that helps balance pressure on your gums for a comfortable, irritation-free cleaning experience. Discover the full range to upgrade your dental routine today!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal**
â­ Brush twice daily.
â­ Use gentle, circular motions.
â­ Gently clean your tongue and gums.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after brushing.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles are frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal**
â­ Ultra-soft tapered bristles (20x thinner).
â­ 4D head design with HD sculpted arcs.
â­ Soft gum massagers.
â­ Ergonomic, 4-angled anti-slip handle.

#Signal #Toothbrush #SensitiveTeeth #OralCare #OralHealth #DentalHygiene #TeethCleaning #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¬Ù†Ø§Ù„ ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù…Ø© Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙØ­Ù… 1+1 - Ù†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Discover superior softness and unmatched care with the **Signal Sensisoft Charcoal Toothbrush 1+1**. This toothbrush features ultra-soft bristles as thin as 0.01mm, capable of removing up to 4 layers of plaque for a deep and effective clean of teeth and gums, offering comprehensive protection. Its three-angle neck design facilitates reaching difficult areas.

â­ Ultra-soft bristles with a 0.01mm diameter for gentle yet effective cleaning.
â­ Removes up to 4 layers of plaque for a deep cleaning experience.
â­ Three-angle neck design for reaching the most difficult areas.
â­ Ideal for gentle care of teeth and gums.
â­ Comes in a multipack with various colors to make family brushing time more joyful.
â­ It is recommended to replace your toothbrush every 3 months for optimal hygiene.
â­ Made with up to 80% PCR material, reflecting our commitment to eco-friendly and sustainable products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Sensisoft Charcoal Toothbrush 1+1**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste.
â­ Gently brush your teeth in circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Ensure all tooth surfaces and gums are cleaned.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Supervise children aged 6 and younger to minimize swallowing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Sensisoft Charcoal Toothbrush 1+1**:
â­ Bristles with 0.01mm diameter.
â­ Ergonomic handle.
â­ Pack containing two toothbrushes.
â­ Eco-friendly materials (up to 80% PCR).

description_en:
For superior oral hygiene, choose the **Signal Medium Interdental Toothbrush**, meticulously designed for a deep and comprehensive clean. Its unique 4D technology ensures effective removal of bacteria from the entire mouth, including teeth, tongue, gums, and cheeks, providing long-lasting fresh breath. Developed in collaboration with dentists, the precision-sculpted soft bristles on the brush head effectively sweep away 99% of bacteria and 80% of plaque, offering you an unparalleled cleaning experience. The ergonomic 4-angled handle ensures easy access to hard-to-reach areas, while the gum massagers help improve gum health and promote blood circulation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Medium Interdental Toothbrush**:
â­ Start by brushing your teeth twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ Use gentle, circular motions to cover all tooth surfaces.
â­ Don't forget to clean your tongue and gums for a complete oral clean.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Medium Interdental Toothbrush**:
â­ Soft, high-definition sculpted bristles
â­ Uniquely designed brush head for increased flexibility and reach
â­ Ergonomic, anti-slip handle with a 4-angle design
â­ Soft gum massagers to stimulate blood circulation

#Signal #Toothbrush #OralCare #DentalHygiene #HealthySmile #FreshBreath #SaudiArabia #Deals #Promotion #InterdentalBrush

description_en:
Experience superior oral care with the **Signal Soft Toothbrushes Clean Promo Pack - 2 Pcs**. This duo pack features high-quality toothbrushes specifically designed for effective yet gentle cleaning of your teeth and gums, ensuring a healthy and radiant smile every day. The soft bristles are carefully crafted to reach all tooth surfaces, cleaning gently without causing irritation, while the ergonomic handle provides optimal control during brushing.

â­ Soft bristles offer gentle yet effective cleaning for teeth and gums.
â­ Promo pack provides excellent value with two toothbrushes.
â­ Ergonomically designed handle ensures a comfortable and secure grip.
â­ Ideal for daily use to maintain oral hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Soft Toothbrushes Clean Promo Pack - 2 Pcs**:
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush bristles.
â­ Brush your teeth for 2 minutes, ensuring all surfaces are covered.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly and rinse the toothbrush.
â­ Store the toothbrush in a dry place and replace it every 3 months or when bristles appear worn.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Soft Toothbrushes Clean Promo Pack - 2 Pcs**:
â­ Bristles: Nylon.
â­ Handle: Polypropylene.
â­ Grip: Thermoplastic Elastomer (TPE).

description_en:
Discover superior oral care with the **Signal Medium Toothbrush V Gum Jewel**. Engineered with 4D Clean technology, this toothbrush is designed to eliminate bacteria from 4 essential areas of your mouth, ensuring a deep clean and long-lasting fresh breath.

The **Signal Medium Toothbrush V Gum Jewel** features a unique head design with soft, sculpted bristles that effectively sweep away 99% of bacteria and clean 3.5 times more effectively in hard-to-reach areas. The ergonomic, anti-slip handle, combined with gentle gum massagers, promotes blood circulation and provides a comfortable, gentle cleaning experience, while helping to balance pressure on gums to avoid discomfort.

â­ 4D Clean technology to remove bacteria from teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums.
â­ Soft, precisely sculpted bristles to effectively sweep away 99% of bacteria.
â­ 3.5X more effective deep clean in hard-to-reach areas.
â­ Ergonomic 45-degree angled anti-slip grip for superior comfort.
â­ Soft gum massagers to improve blood circulation and gum health.
â­ Raised and angled head design for maximum flexibility and reach.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Medium Toothbrush V Gum Jewel**
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for two minutes.
â­ Use gentle circular motions for a thorough clean.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles show wear.
â­ Gently clean your tongue and gums with the brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Medium Toothbrush V Gum Jewel**
â­ High-quality soft bristles.
â­ Ergonomically designed brush head.
â­ Comfortable, non-slip plastic handle.
â­ Soft silicone gum massagers.

Make brushing teeth a fun adventure with the **Signal Juniors Toothbrush Pokemon**! Specially designed for children aged 7 and above, this toothbrush combines fun and effectiveness to ensure your child's dental health. It features ultra-soft, densely packed bristles for a gentle yet effective cleaning of teeth and gums, with a small head designed to reach difficult areas. Its stylish and comfortable handle makes the brushing experience easy and enjoyable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Juniors Toothbrush Pokemon**
â­ Dentists recommend changing your toothbrush every 3 months.
â­ For children aged 6 years and younger: Use a pea-sized amount for supervised brushing to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of fluoride intake from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Juniors Toothbrush Pokemon**
â­ Ultra-soft, densely packed bristles for deep, gentle cleaning.
â­ Small head designed to reach difficult areas.
â­ Comfortable handle with beloved Pokemon character design.
â­ 4-mil diameter filaments for effective cleaning.

description_en:
Experience gentle yet effective cleaning with the **Signal Double Care Soft Toothbrush for Sensitive Teeth**. This toothbrush is expertly designed to provide a superior cleaning experience for those with sensitive teeth. Its ultra-soft bristles are engineered to gently remove plaque and food debris without irritating gums or enamel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Double Care Soft Toothbrush for Sensitive Teeth**
â­ Wet the toothbrush bristles with water.
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste.
â­ Brush your teeth in gentle circular motions for two minutes, focusing on the gum line.
â­ Clean your tongue.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Double Care Soft Toothbrush for Sensitive Teeth**
â­ Ultra-fine, soft bristles.
â­ Ergonomic, non-slip handle for comfortable grip.
â­ Compact brush head design to reach all areas.
â­ High-quality materials for durability and longevity.

description_en:
**Signal Toothbrush Inside Clean Medium** offers a superior cleaning experience with its innovative Double Tilting Head. This unique design allows the bristles to adapt precisely to both the outer and inner dental arches, ensuring a more effective and accurate clean that removes plaque and grime with ease. Clinical studies have demonstrated its superior efficacy compared to flat-trimmed toothbrushes.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Signal Toothbrush Inside Clean Medium**
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for optimal oral hygiene.
â­ Utilize the brush's design to reach all tooth surfaces, including the inner arch and back teeth.
â­ Rinse the toothbrush thoroughly after each use.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Signal Toothbrush Inside Clean Medium**
â­ Medium bristles for effective cleaning and plaque removal.

description_en:
Discover the **Signal Strawberry Kids Toothpaste 75 ml**, meticulously crafted to meet the unique needs of your child's teeth. Milk teeth and newly erupting permanent teeth are more susceptible to decay, making this toothpaste ideal for superior care.

âœ… Enriched with fluoride to effectively combat cavities.
âœ… Sugar-free formula for optimal oral health.
âœ… Delicious strawberry flavor that children love for a pleasant brushing experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Strawberry Kids Toothpaste 75 ml**:
â­ For children 6 years and younger: Use a pea-sized amount.
â­ Supervise brushing to minimize swallowing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Strawberry Kids Toothpaste 75 ml**:
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ PEG-32
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Aroma (Flavor)
â­ Cellulose Gum

description_en:
Transform toothbrushing into a fun moment with **Signal Kids Mint Toothpaste with Pikachu 75ml**, teaching your children good oral health habits. Discover our exciting new range featuring everyone's favorite Pokemon character, Pikachu, and collect all 4 different designs!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Kids Mint Toothpaste with Pikachu 75ml**:
â­ For children 6 years and younger: Use a pea-sized amount for supervised brushing to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of fluoride intake from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Kids Mint Toothpaste with Pikachu 75ml**:
â­ Sugar acid protection - Contains Active Fluoride to help protect against sugar acid that can cause cavities.
â­ Helps strengthen tooth enamel.
â­ Mild and refreshing mint flavor.
â­ Soft combination suitable for children's teeth.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¬Ù†Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ø¨ÙŠÙƒØ±Ø¨ÙˆÙ†Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ØµÙˆØ¯ÙŠÙˆÙ… Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© 100Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the refreshing power of **Signal Toothpaste Complete Baking Soda**, formulated for superior tooth protection. Featuring a Pro-Fluoride Complex and active Micro-Calcium, this toothpaste helps shield your teeth against decay and acid attacks, while repairing tiny invisible holes for long-term fortification and strength. Enjoy clinically proven efficacy for a healthy, protected smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Toothpaste Complete Baking Soda**:
â­ Adults and children 2 years and older: Brush teeth thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ Children under 6 years: Use a pea-sized amount for supervised brushing to minimize swallowing, and instruct them in good brushing and rinsing habits.
â­ Children under 2 years: Ask a dentist or physician.
â­ Do not swallow.
â­ Supervise children as necessary until capable of using without supervision.
â­ In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Toothpaste Complete Baking Soda**:
â­ Calcium Carbonate
â­ Water
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Silica
â­ Lauryl Sodium Sulfate
â­ Sodium Monofluorophosphate
â­ Flavor
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Potassium Citrate
â­ Trisodium Phosphate
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Phenylcarbinol
â­ Glycerin
â­ CI 74260

#SignalToothpaste #BakingSoda #DentalCare #OralHealth #ToothProtection #CavityPrevention #HealthyTeeth #Fluoride #Smile #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience complete protection with **Signal Clove Toothpaste**, specially designed for your sensitive teeth. Our unique formula is inspired by nature, blending the power of natural oils with Zinc mineral to provide double the protection against bacteria. This clinically proven toothpaste offers rapid relief from tooth sensitivity, thanks to its infusion of clove oil and juniper berry oil, known for their soothing properties.

â­ Complete protection infused with nature.
â­ Effective 2x better anti-bacterial protection with Zinc mineral.
â­ Offers rapid relief from sensitivity.
â­ Infused with clove & juniper berry oils for soothing properties.
â­ Free from Triclosan and Parabens.
â­ Gentle formula, suitable for the entire family.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Clove Toothpaste**
â­ For children 6 years and under: Use a pea-sized amount and supervise brushing to minimize swallowing.
â­ For adults: Brush thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Signal Clove Toothpaste**
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Potassium Citrate, PEG-32, Zinc Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Eugenia Caryophyllus Leaf Oil, Juniperus Communis Fruit Oil, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Eugenol, Limonene, CI 73360.

#Signal #Toothpaste #Clove #SensitiveTeeth #DentalCare #OralHealth #Hygiene #SaudiArabia #ToothProtection #BeautySaudi

Our gentle formula blends natural oils with Zinc mineral for double effective anti-bacterial power. Clinically proven, this innovative formulation offers comprehensive protection suitable for the entire family, effectively strengthening and protecting your gums.

â­ Enriched with sage and thyme oils, known for their restorative properties.
â­ Promotes gum health and protects against issues.
â­ Gentle and safe formula for daily use.
â­ Free from Triclosan and Parabens.
â­ Provides complete protection against bacteria.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Signal Herbal Gum Care Toothpaste**:

description_en:
Discover the hydrating power of **Cerave Moisturising Cream**, specifically designed for dry and very dry skin. Infused with three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, this cream deeply moisturizes and helps restore the skin's natural protective barrier. Developed with dermatologists, its rich, non-greasy, and fast-absorbing formula is suitable for both the face and body.

â­ Provides deep hydration for dry and very dry skin.
â­ Helps restore the skin's natural barrier with essential ceramides.
â­ Retains moisture in the skin thanks to hyaluronic acid.
â­ Non-greasy and fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Fragrance-free and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Moisturising Cream**:
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Moisturising Cream**:
â­ Aqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Petrolatum, Potassium Phosphate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Dipotassium Phosphate, Tocopherol, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin.

#Cerave #SkinHydration #Skincare #BodyMoisturizer #DrySkin #Ceramides #HyaluronicAcid #SkincareProducts #DeepHydration #HealthySkin

description_en:
Experience unparalleled purity with **Cerave Foaming Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin**. Developed with dermatologists, this innovative foaming cleanser deeply cleanses normal to oily skin, removing excess oil and refreshing without stripping or leaving it feeling tight and dry. Its unique formula features three essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide to help restore the skinâ€™s barrier, attract hydration, and calm the skin. Discover the power of gentle yet effective cleansing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Foaming Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin**:
â­ Gently massage onto wet skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily, morning and evening, for best results.
â­ Always follow with your regular skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Foaming Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin**:
â­ Three Essential Ceramides: Help restore the skin barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Attracts and retains moisture.
â­ Niacinamide: Helps to calm the skin.
â­ Gentle, non-comedogenic gel foaming formula.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

#Cerave #FaceWash #OilySkin #NormalSkin #Skincare #SkinHydration #HyaluronicAcid #Niacinamide #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience deep hydration with **Cerave Moisturizing Cream**, specifically formulated for dry to very dry skin. Its unique formula combines three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid to restore your skin's protective barrier and provide long-lasting moisture. The patented MVE Delivery Technology ensures a continuous release of hydrating ingredients for 24-hour nourishment, leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing cream was developed with dermatologists. Suitable for use on both the face and body, it is fragrance-free and non-comedogenic.

â­ Effectively hydrates dry to very dry skin on the face and body.
â­ MVE Technology continuously releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration.
â­ Ceramides help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic acid helps retain the skin's natural moisture.
â­ Non-comedogenic and fragrance-free formula.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Moisturizing Cream**:
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed.
â­ Suitable for adults and children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Moisturizing Cream**:
â­ Ceramides (NP, AP, EOP).
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Tocopherol (Vitamin E).

#Cerave #Moisturizer #DrySkin #HyaluronicAcid #Ceramides #Skincare #SkinHydration #BeautyProducts #HealthySkin #SaudiBeauty

This gentle cleanser is formulated to restore your skin's natural barrier with effective ingredients like ceramides and hyaluronic acid, helping your skin lock in essential moisture. It efficiently removes dirt, oil, and makeup without stripping the skin, leaving it clean and refreshed.

â­ Suitable for normal to dry skin.
â­ Gently removes dirt, oil, and makeup.
â­ Helps restore and maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.

description_en:
Discover **Cerave SA Smoothing Cleanser**, a gentle exfoliating cleanser specifically formulated to refine and smooth your skin. Powered by a unique blend of Salicylic Acid, Ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide, this cleanser effectively removes dirt, oil, and dead skin cells, leaving your skin soft, even-toned, and moisturized without dryness.

**Cerave SA Smoothing Cleanser** offers gentle, non-irritating exfoliation without harsh microbeads, suitable for both face and body, even for acne-prone skin. The non-comedogenic, fragrance-free formula is also enriched with antioxidant Vitamin D to help restore the skin's natural barrier and soothe the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave SA Smoothing Cleanser**:
â­ Wet skin with lukewarm water.
â­ Apply a small amount to hands and lather gently onto skin in a circular motion.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Recommended for daily use, morning and night.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave SA Smoothing Cleanser**:
â­ Salicylic Acid: For exfoliation and skin smoothing.
â­ Three Essential Ceramides: To help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: To help retain skin's natural moisture.
â­ Niacinamide: To help calm skin.
â­ Vitamin D: As an antioxidant.
â­ Fragrance-free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic formula.

#Cerave #Skincare #Cleanser #Exfoliation #SalicylicAcid #SmoothSkin #Moisturizing #FacialCare #BeautyProducts #Saudi Arabia

Enriched with three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, this cream effectively moisturizes the skin and helps restore its protective barrier. Developed with dermatologists, **Cerave** Moisturizing Cream is the ideal choice for dry and very dry skin on both the face and body. It features patented MVE Delivery Technology, ensuring a continuous release of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night for soft, protected skin. It is also fragrance-free and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Moisturizing Cream for Dry Skin**
â­ Apply generously to the skin as needed.
â­ Suitable for use on both the face and body.
â­ Suitable for the whole family, from adults to children.
â­ Ideal for dry and very dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Moisturizing Cream for Dry Skin**
â­ Ceramides: Help restore and maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Helps retain the skinâ€™s natural moisture.
â­ MVE Technology: Continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.

description_en: Reveal brighter, refreshed eyes with **Cerave Eye Repair Cream for Dark Circles and Puffiness**. Developed with dermatologists, this advanced formula is enriched with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide to deeply hydrate and restore the delicate eye area's natural barrier. The marine and botanical complex works to brighten the entire eye area, effectively reducing the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. **Cerave Eye Repair Cream for Dark Circles and Puffiness** is non-greasy, fast-absorbing, and fragrance-free, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Featuring patented MVE Technology, it ensures a continuous release of moisturizing ingredients for long-lasting hydration and a revitalized look.

description_en:
CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion is a lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that helps hydrate the skin and restore its natural barrier, making it perfect for dry to very dry skin.

Formulated with three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, it also features patented MVE Technology for long-lasting hydration and a lightweight, non-comedogenic formula that wonâ€™t clog pores. Our daily moisturizer leaves the skin feeling comfortable and provides 24-hour hydration.

â­ Moisturizes and helps restore the skinâ€™s protective barrier.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy.
â­ MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration.
â­ Ceramides: Help restore and maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic acid: Helps retain the skinâ€™s natural moisture.
â­ Non-comedogenic, oil-free and fragrance-free.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.
â­ Accepted by the National Eczema Association.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Moisturizing Lotion for Dry to Very Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician.
â­ Suitable for adult and children's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Moisturizing Lotion for Dry to Very Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ Essential Ceramides.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ MVE Technology.

description_en:
Introducing the **Cerave Moisturizing Lotion**, your go-to solution for dry to very dry skin hydration.

This lightweight, oil-free moisturizer is specially formulated to deeply hydrate the skin and restore its natural protective barrier. Enriched with three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, **Cerave Moisturizing Lotion** provides long-lasting hydration thanks to its patented MVE Technology. Its non-comedogenic formula ensures it won't clog pores, making it ideal for daily use.

Experience comfortable and soothed skin with **Cerave Moisturizing Lotion**, delivering 24-hour hydration. It's gentle on the skin and suitable for both adults and children.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Moisturizing Lotion**:
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician.
â­ Suitable for adult and child skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Moisturizing Lotion**:
â­ Contains three essential ceramides that help restore and maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.
â­ Enriched with hyaluronic acid, which helps retain the skinâ€™s natural moisture.
â­ MVE Technology: A patented delivery system that continuously releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy formula.
â­ Oil-free and fragrance-free.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.
â­ Accepted by the National Eczema Association.

title_en: Cerave Moisturizing Cream for Dry Skin - 340g: Deep Hydration with Ceramides & Hyaluronic Acid
title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© - 340 Ø¬Ù…: ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ Ù…Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø³ÙŠØ±Ø§Ù…ÙŠØ¯Ø§Øª ÙˆØ­Ù…Ø¶ Ø§Ù„Ù‡ÙŠØ§Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙˆÙ†ÙŠÙƒ
description_en:
Nourish your dry skin with **Cerave Moisturizing Cream for Dry Skin**, specifically formulated to provide deep hydration and restore the skin's protective barrier. Enriched with three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, this cream delivers 24-hour continuous hydration thanks to its patented MVE Delivery Technology. Its rich, non-greasy, and fast-absorbing texture makes it ideal for daily use on both face and body, and it is fragrance-free, suitable for dry to very dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Moisturizing Cream for Dry Skin**:
â­ Apply liberally as needed to clean, dry skin.
â­ Suitable for use on the face and body.
â­ Ideal for dry and very dry skin in adults and children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Moisturizing Cream for Dry Skin**:
â­ Three Essential Ceramides: Help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Helps attract and retain moisture in the skin.
â­ MVE Delivery Technology: Releases moisturizing ingredients continuously for 24-hour hydration.
â­ Gentle, non-comedogenic, and fragrance-free formula.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.

#Cerave #MoisturizingCream #SkinHydration #DrySkin #Ceramides #HyaluronicAcid #Skincare #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia #DeepHydration

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort for your skin with **Cerave PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion**, the perfect moisturizer that combines science and beauty to deliver maximum hydration and care while you sleep. This lightweight and advanced formula is specifically designed for sensitive skin, effectively working to protect the skin's barrier thanks to its content of 3 natural ceramides and hyaluronic acid, which enhance your skin's ability to retain moisture for a long time. This formula relies on patented MVEÂ® Delivery Technology, which ensures gradual and continuous release of moisturizing ingredients throughout the night, providing your skin with deep and sustained hydration. It is the ideal solution to transform your skin into softer, more supple, and radiant skin every morning.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion**
â­ Apply liberally to your face and neck at night.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion**
â­ Ultra-lightweight night cream.
â­ MVE Technology: Our delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for all-night hydration.
â­ Ceramides: Help restore and maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic acid: Helps retain skinâ€™s natural moisture.
â­ Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic, oil-free, fragrance-free.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.

description_en:
Discover ultimate purity and refreshment with **Cerave Foaming Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin**, the perfect solution for a deep and effective cleanse. Its unique formula, enriched with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide, works to restore the skin's barrier, deeply hydrate, and soothe, leaving you with healthy, radiant skin. This gel-based foaming cleanser was developed with dermatologists to ensure its effectiveness and gentleness on normal to oily skin, as it efficiently removes excess oil and impurities without stripping the skin of its natural moisture or leaving it feeling tight.

â­ Deeply cleanses and effectively removes excess oil.
â­ Helps restore the skin's protective barrier and retain moisture.
â­ Calms the skin thanks to niacinamide.
â­ Gentle, non-comedogenic, and fragrance-free formula.
â­ Ideal for normal to oily skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Foaming Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin**:
â­ Gently massage onto damp skin to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Foaming Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin**:
â­ Essential Ceramides (1, 3, 6-II): Essential for restoring the skin's natural barrier and maintaining its health.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Attracts moisture and helps retain it in the skin.
â­ Niacinamide: Helps to calm the skin and reduce inflammation.
â­ Green Tea Leaf Extract: An antioxidant that soothes the skin.
â­ Glycerin: Helps to hydrate the skin and maintain its softness.

description_en: **Cerave Blemish Control Cleanser** is a refreshing gel-to-foam facial cleanser specifically formulated for blemish-prone skin. This cleanser helps to reduce the appearance of blemishes and blackheads, while removing excess oil, leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth. Its unique formula penetrates pores to eliminate the causes of spots and blemishes, while protecting the skinâ€™s natural barrier. Enriched with Salicylic Acid, a gentle exfoliant that removes dead skin cells, reduces blackheads and the appearance of pores, and treats and prevents acne. It contains the 3 essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) that help restore the skin's natural barrier, and Niacinamide to calm the skin. It is non-comedogenic, fragrance- and paraben-free, and gentle on the skin, making it an ideal choice for oily and acne-prone skin.

description_en:
**Cerave Hydrating Cleanser** is a gentle face wash, specifically formulated for normal to dry skin. Its unique formula works to restore the skin's natural barrier, helping it effectively retain moisture. It cleanses and refreshes the skin without stripping it or leaving it feeling tight and dry, for soft and supple skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Hydrating Cleanser**:
â­ Wet your face with lukewarm water.
â­ Apply a small amount of the cleanser to your hands and gently lather.
â­ Massage the lather gently onto your facial skin in circular motions.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Gently pat your face dry with a soft towel.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Hydrating Cleanser**:
â­ Essential Ceramides: Help restore and maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Helps attract and retain moisture in the skin.
â­ MVE Delivery Technology: Continually releases moisturizing ingredients for all-day hydration.
â­ Non-comedogenic formula.
â­ Non-irritating and fragrance-free.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ Ù„ÙˆØ´Ù† Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ù„Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø±ÙŠ SPF 30 - 52 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience deep hydration and superior protection with **Cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30**. Specifically formulated for normal to dry skin, this lotion offers a light, non-sticky texture along with comprehensive UVA and UVB protection. Enriched with 3 essential ceramides, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid, **Cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30** effectively nourishes, soothes, and restores your skin's natural protective barrier, making it ideal even for skin dried out by anti-acne treatments. Enjoy healthy, refreshed skin all day with its fragrance-free and non-comedogenic formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30**:
â­ Apply to face and neck in the morning.
â­ Avoid direct contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse with plenty of water.
â­ To activate the pump for the first time, push down on the tube and the top of the pump simultaneously.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30**:
â­ Essential Ceramides
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ UVA & UVB Protection

#Cerave #FaceMoisturizer #Sunscreen #Skincare #DrySkin #Hydration #SaudiBeauty #BeautyProducts #HealthySkin #KSA

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ Ø¬Ù„ Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…Ø´ ÙƒÙˆÙ†ØªØ±ÙˆÙ„ Ù…Ø±Ø·Ù‘Ø¨ Ù„Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø±Ø¶Ø© Ù„Ø­Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¨Ø§Ø¨ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø´ÙˆØ§Ø¦Ø¨ 40 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
CeraVe Blemish Control Gel is an acne treatment for the face with a BHA/AHA exfoliant formulated with salicylic acid, a beta-hydroxy acid (BHA), to help clear acne & prevent new breakouts and alpha hydroxy acids (AHA), a blend of lactic and glycolic acids, to help smooth and soften skin. The formula helps to minimize the appearance of pores & reduce blackheads. Also formulated with niacinamide to help soothe skin and hyaluronic acid to help maintain skin's natural moisture. CeraVe Blemish Control Gel is alcohol-free, fragrance-free, paraben-free, oil-free, and non-comedogenic skincare. Formulated without drying alcohols like denatured alcohol, commonly found in acne spot treatments, which can cause excessive dryness. CeraVe Blemish Control Gel contains 3 essential ceramides that are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-ii) to help maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier. CeraVe skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Developed with Dermatologists, **CeraVe Blemish Control Gel** provides a lightweight, hydrating full-face treatment to clear acne and help prevent new acne breakouts while minimizing the appearance of pores without drying the skin.
â­ Formulated with 3 essential ceramides to help maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier and niacinamide to help calm skin.
â­ Recommended for use once per day in the evening, this formula with a powerful blend of AHA and BHA is oil-free and free of drying alcohol, leaving skin looking more radiant, smooth, and noticeably clearer after 3 days.
â­ Targets blemishes & blackheads, helping skin look noticeably clearer.
â­ Proven to improve skin texture and reduce pores.
â­ Maintains healthy-looking skin with daily use.
â­ Lightweight, fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Hydrates skin for up to 24 hours.
â­ Non-greasy & non-drying formula.
â­ The number of blackheads appears reduced by up to 45%.
â­ The number of spots appears reduced by up to 29%.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CeraVe Blemish Control Gel**
â­ Cleanse skin thoroughly before applying this product.
â­ Start with one application daily and increase as needed or as directed by a physician.
â­ Please wear sunscreen during the day when using this product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CeraVe Blemish Control Gel**
â­ ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: SALICYLIC ACID 2%
â­ INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, GLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, GLUCONOLACTONE, SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE, PEG-150 PENTAERYTHRITYL TRISTEARATE, CERAMIDE NP, CERAMIDE AP, CERAMIDE EOP, CARBOMER, CALCIUM GLUCONATE, TRIETHYL CITRATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, CHOLESTEROL, TETRASODIUM EDTA, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE SUCCINATE, XANTHAN GUM, HECTORITE, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, BENZOIC ACID

#Cerave #BlemishControl #AcneTreatment #OilySkin #HealthySkin #SaudiSkincare #SkinGoals #Moisturizer #ClearSkin #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience intense hydration and soothing relief for your hands with **Cerave Therapeutic Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands With Hyaluronic Acid 50 ml**. This specially formulated cream calms the skin and restores its natural barrier with a rich blend of hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and three essential ceramides. Enjoy smooth, protected, and soft-feeling skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Therapeutic Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands With Hyaluronic Acid 50 ml**:
â­ Apply liberally as needed for deep moisturization.
â­ Helps restore the skin's protective barrier, preventing chafing, chapping, or cracking.
â­ Its non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula provides instant comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Therapeutic Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands With Hyaluronic Acid 50 ml**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Locks in the skin's natural moisture.
â­ Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin and reduce redness.
â­ Three Essential Ceramides: Aid in restoring and maintaining the skin's natural barrier.
â­ Dimethicone: Temporarily protects the skin by forming a protective barrier for a silky feel.
â­ Fragrance-free and developed with dermatologists.

#Cerave #HandCream #SkinHydration #Skincare #SaudiArabia #DeepMoisture #DrySkin #SoftHands #BeautyProducts #SkinProtection

description_en:
Experience deeply hydrated and refreshed skin with **Cerave Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum**. This lightweight gel-cream formula delivers 24-hour deep hydration, enriched with 3 Essential Ceramides and Hyaluronic Acid to support your skin's natural barrier and retain moisture.

Product Features:
â­ Provides 24-hour hydration.
â­ Can be used alone or layered under moisturizer.
â­ Hyaluronic acid: Helps retain the skinâ€™s natural moisture.
â­ Ceramides: Help restore and maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.
â­ Vitamin B5: Helps to provide skin-soothing benefits.
â­ MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for all-day hydration.
â­ Non-comedogenic, paraben-free, and fragrance-free.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum**:
â­ Apply evenly to your face and neck daily. Can be used alone, layered under moisturizer, and even as a makeup base.
â­ If contact with your eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Build **Cerave Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum** into your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum**:
â­ AQUA / WATER, GLYCERIN, CETEARYL ETHYLHEXANOATE, DIMETHICONE, AMMONIUM POLYACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, PANTHENOL, CERAMIDE NP, CERAMIDE AP, CERAMIDE EOP, CARBOMER, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, CHOLESTEROL, PHENOXYETHANOL, DISODIUM EDTA, ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CITRIC ACID, XANTHAN GUM, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN

description_en:
Experience ultimate foot care with **Cerave SA Renewing Foot Cream**, expertly formulated to provide intensive hydration and relief for dry, rough, and cracked feet. This rich cream combines essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid to exfoliate, soften, and renew your foot's skin, leaving them smooth and moisturized.

â­ Provides 24-hour intense hydration.
â­ Helps exfoliate rough and cracked skin.
â­ Promotes the restoration of the skin's protective barrier.
â­ Non-greasy and fast-absorbing formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave SA Renewing Foot Cream**:
â­ Apply generously to clean, dry feet.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily or as needed for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave SA Renewing Foot Cream**:
â­ Salicylic Acid (SA) for effective exfoliation.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for superior hydration.
â­ Essential Ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore the skin barrier.
â­ Chamomile Extract to soothe the skin.
â­ Niacinamide to calm skin and reduce redness.

#Cerave #FootCare #FootMoisture #SoftFeet #CrackedHeelTreatment #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia #FootBeauty #DeepHydration #DailyCare
