description_en:
Experience superior hydration and protection with **Cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 25**. A lightweight facial lotion with broad-spectrum SPF25, specifically formulated to moisturize sensitive skin that is normal to dry and exposed to UV rays. The broad-spectrum sunscreen provides protection against UVA and UVB rays while the formula hydrates, helping maintain and protect the skin barrier with 3 essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, supported by MVEÂ® technology for long-lasting hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 25**:
â­ Apply liberally to your face and neck in the morning.
â­ Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply at least every 2 hours.
â­ Fragrance-free and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 25**:
â­ Homosalate (10%), Meradimate (5%), Octinoxate (5%), Octocrylene (2%), Zinc Oxide (6.3%).

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙŠÙ„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ø¨ÙˆØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ù…Ø­ 400 Ø¬Ù… - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù„Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
NESTLE **Cerelac** Baby Cereal Wheat 400 gm is the perfect start to your baby's feeding journey.

**Cerelac** Baby Cereal Wheat features a rich and nutritious blend of wheat and milk, fortified with Iron to support cognitive and brain development, plus Bifidus and immunonutrients like Vitamins (A, C, D) and Zinc to boost your baby's immunity.

Made from 100% natural grain and easily digestible, **Cerelac** Baby Cereal Wheat is the ideal choice to help your baby transition smoothly from milk to solids.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g (approximately 9 level tablespoons) of **Cerelac**.
â­ Stir well until you achieve a smooth and consistent texture, and feed immediately with a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep any unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:

â­ Wheat Flour
â­ Milk Skimmed Solids
â­ Sucrose
â­ Caramel
â­ Palm Olein
â­ Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Sunflower Oil
â­ Vanilla Flavor
â­ Bifidus Culture
â­ Minerals & Vitamins

description_en:
Begin your baby's healthy feeding journey with **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Wheat and Dates 400g**. This nutritious and easy-to-prepare cereal, specially designed for babies from 6 months onwards, combines the goodness of wheat and natural dates to support your baby's growth and development.

â­ Fortified with Iron+ to help support brain and cognitive development.
â­ Contains BL and immunonutrients (Vitamins A, C, D, and Zinc) to support your babyâ€™s immune system.
â­ Made from 100% natural grain and easily digestible, making it perfect for introducing new tastes.
â­ Helps your baby get used to new tastes in a gentle and nourishing way.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Wheat and Dates**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Wheat and Dates**.
â­ Stir well until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Wheat and Dates**:
â­ Wheat Flour, Dried Milk Skimmed, Caramel, Sucrose, Palm Olein, Date Syrup, Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Sunflower Oil, Sugar Syrup, Vanillin, Bifidus Culture, Minerals & Vitamins.
â­ Contains Gluten and Milk.

#Cerelac #BabyCereal #InfantNutrition #BabyFood #WheatAndDates #BabyHealth #BabyCare #Infant #BabySupplies #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Nestle **Cerelac** Baby Cereal Wheat is the ideal food for your baby from 6 months of age. A nutritious and convenient wheat-based infant cereal with milk powder, fortified with iron to support healthy cognitive development. It contains Bifidus BL and immunonutrients (A, C, D, and Zinc) to support your babyâ€™s immune system. Made from 100% natural and easily digestible grains, **Cerelac** helps your baby adapt easily from milk to solids.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are thoroughly clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes, then allow it to cool. Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into your baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac**.
â­ Stir until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Wheat flour, milk skimmed solids, sucrose, caramel, palm olein, low erucic acid rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil, vanilla flavor, bifidus culture, minerals & vitamins.
â­ Contains gluten and milk.

description_en:
Introducing **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Dates** Family Pack, your baby's perfect introduction to solid foods from 6 months. This easily digestible, wheat-based cereal is enriched with iRON+ to support healthy brain development and cognitive growth. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Dates** is also fortified with essential immunonutrients like Vitamins A, C, D, and Zinc to bolster your baby's immune system. Made from 100% natural grains, it's a delicious and convenient way to introduce your little one to new tastes and textures, promoting healthy eating habits. Free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives, ensuring a wholesome start for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Dates**:
â­ Wash hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food.
â­ Boil clean water for 5 minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into a clean baby bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Dates**.
â­ Stir until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Dates**:
â­ Wheat Flour.
â­ Dried Skimmed Milk.
â­ Sucrose.
â­ Caramel.
â­ Palm Olein.
â­ Date Syrup.
â­ Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Sunflower Oil.
â­ Sugar Syrup.
â­ Natural flavor (Vanilla).
â­ Bifidus.
â­ Minerals & Vitamins.
â­ Contains milk and gluten.

description_en:
Discover the perfect nutrition for your baby with **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruits 400 gm**, a nutritious and easy-to-prepare cereal, specially designed for babies from 6 months onwards. It features a formula rich in iron to support cognitive development, and immunonutrients like vitamins (A, C, D) and Zinc to support the immune system. Made from 100% natural wheat and fruits, it is easily digestible and helps your baby get accustomed to new tastes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruits 400 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour 150 ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruits 400 gm**.
â­ Mix the mixture well until smooth and feed immediately to your baby using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruits 400 gm**:
â­ Wheat Flour.
â­ Dried Skimmed Milk.
â­ Sucrose.
â­ Palm Olein.
â­ Banana Flake.
â­ Pineapple Juice Concentrate.
â­ Orange Juice Concentrate.
â­ Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Sunflower Oil.
â­ Vanilla Flavor.
â­ Bifidus Culture.
â­ Minerals & Vitamins.

description_en:
Start your baby's nutritional journey with **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Dates**, specially formulated to support their healthy growth. Rich in iron essential for cognitive development, natural wheat, and delicious dates, this cereal is easy to digest and perfect for introducing new tastes to your baby. **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Dates** is the ideal choice to ensure your little one gets a strong and nutritious start.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Dates**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and then let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Dates**.
â­ Mix until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately with a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal with Dates**:
â­ Wheat Flour, Dried Skimmed Milk, Date Syrup, Essential Vitamins & Minerals.
â­ Fortified with Iron to support cognitive development.
â­ Contains Prebiotics to support digestive health.
â­ Easy to digest and suitable for starting solids.
â­ Free from artificial colors and preservatives.

description_en:
Nestle **Cerelac** Rice, 1kg: A healthy and complete start for your baby from 6 months. A nutritious and easily digestible cereal, made from 100% natural rice with milk powder. Fortified with Iron+ to support cognitive and brain development, plus Bifidus and immunonutrients (Vitamins A, C, D, and Zinc) to boost your baby's immune system. **Cerelac** Rice helps your baby transition smoothly from milk to solid foods.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac** Rice:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing your baby's food, and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac** Rice.
â­ Stir until the cereal is smooth and consistent, and feed it to your baby immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions for reuse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac** Rice:
â­ White rice flour.
â­ Dried skimmed milk.
â­ Sucrose.
â­ Palm olein.
â­ Low erucic acid rapeseed oil.
â­ Coconut oil.
â­ Sunflower oil.
â­ Vanilla flavor.
â­ Bifidus culture.
â­ Minerals & vitamins.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙŠÙ„Ø§Ùƒ Ù‚Ù…Ø­ Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© Ø¹Ø§Ø¦Ù„ÙŠØ© - Ø·Ø¹Ø§Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØºØ°ÙŠ ÙˆØ§Ù„ØµØ­ÙŠ
description_en:
Introducing **Cerelac** Wheat Family Pack, the perfect complete nutrition solution for your babies from 6 months onwards. **Cerelac** is specially designed to support your baby's growth and provide them with essential energy and nutrients, alongside breast milk. It's a quick and easy-to-prepare, easily digestible meal, ideal as complementary food for their solid food journey.

Product Features:
â­ Infant cereal powder that is easy to prepare and dissolves quickly.
â­ Suitable as complementary food for infants and easily digestible, minimizing digestive issues.
â­ Made from high-quality wheat, a natural source of energy.
â­ Intended for infants from 6 months of age as a healthy start to their diet.
â­ Fortified with Iron, Zinc, Calcium, and Vitamins A & C to promote growth and development.
â­ Contains Bifidus BL probiotics to support the baby's natural immunity.
â­ Completely free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the meal and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean water for 5 minutes and let it cool slightly.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac**.
â­ Stir until smooth and feed your baby immediately.
â­ Do not keep any unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Wheat Flour.
â­ Milk Skimmed Solids.
â­ Sucrose.
â­ Caramel.
â­ Palm Olein.
â­ Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Sunflower Oil.
â­ Vanilla Flavor.
â­ Bifidus.
â­ Essential Minerals & Vitamins.

Precautions:
â­ Close the pack tightly after each use and store in a cool, dry place.
â­ Use the product within 30 days of opening the pack and before the expiry date.

description_en:
Give your baby a healthy start with **Cerelac Wheat & Fruits**, specifically designed to meet your infant's nutritional needs from 6 months onwards. This easy-to-prepare and digest cereal is enriched with wheat, milk, and natural fruits, along with the iRON+ formula fortified with Iron, Zinc, Calcium, and Vitamins A & C to support healthy growth and cognitive development. **Cerelac Wheat & Fruits** contains Bifidus BL probiotic to enhance your baby's natural defenses and introduce them to new flavors gently. It's completely free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives, making it a safe and delicious choice. This is the perfect solution for a smooth transition from milk to solids.

â­ Easy to prepare and digest, ideal for babies from 6 months.
â­ Fortified with Iron, Zinc, Calcium, and Vitamins A & C for growth support.
â­ Contains Bifidus BL to boost immunity.
â­ Introduces babies to diverse flavors, nurturing taste buds.
â­ Free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives.
â­ Made from 100% natural grains.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Wheat & Fruits**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing baby's food.
â­ Ensure all utensils are thoroughly clean.
â­ Boil clean water for 5 minutes. Allow to cool to lukewarm.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Wheat & Fruits**.
â­ Stir until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Wheat & Fruits**:
â­ Wheat Flour, Dried Skimmed Milk, Sucrose, Palm Olein, Banana Flake, Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Orange Juice Concentrate, Pineapple Juice Concentrate, Sunflower Oil, Artificial flavor (Vanilla), Bifidus, Minerals & Vitamins.
â­ Contains Gluten and Milk.

description_en:
Discover balanced and delicious nutrition with **Cerelac** Puree Multipack. **Cerelac** is specifically designed to offer your baby a delightful first food experience, featuring a rich blend of apple, carrot, and mango, perfect for introducing new tastes. Each pouch is ready to serve, making mealtimes easy and convenient for active parents.

â­ Made with 100% natural fruits and vegetables for maximum nutritional benefit.
â­ Fortified with Vitamin C to support cognitive development and boost immunity.
â­ Smooth and easily digestible texture, ideal for your baby's sensitive tummy.
â­ Convenient single-serve pouch with a spout for direct feeding, reducing mess and facilitating on-the-go nutrition.
â­ No added sugar, relying on the natural sweetness of fruits.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Ensure the pouch is intact and unopened before use.
â­ Suitable for babies from 6 months and above, as per healthcare professional recommendations.
â­ Squeeze the puree directly onto a spoon or into a clean bowl.
â­ Avoid microwaving the pouch.
â­ Once opened, refrigerate for up to 24 hours and consume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Apple Puree
â­ Carrot Puree
â­ Mango Puree
â­ Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid)

Fortified with iRON+ to help support healthy brain and cognitive development, **Cerelac** also contains BL and immune nutrients (A, C, D, and Zinc) to support your babyâ€™s immune system. Made from 100% natural grain and easily digestible, **Cerelac** is a convenient and nutritious way to slowly introduce new tastes and encourage your baby to enjoy new experiences with food.

description_en:
Introduce your little one to the delicious and nutritious **Cerelac NutriBiscuit Original**. Made with wheat cereals, these delightful biscuits are perfect for babies aged 12 months and above. **Cerelac NutriBiscuit Original** is enriched with vitamin B1 to support your baby's overall growth and development, making it an excellent choice for snack time. These biscuits encourage chewing and help develop fine motor skills, offering a healthy and convenient way to introduce new flavors and textures.

â­ Deliciously nutritious wheat cereal-based snack.
â­ Enriched with vitamin B1 to support healthy growth and development.
â­ Encourages chewing and helps develop independent eating skills.
â­ Convenient on-the-go option for any snacking occasion.
â­ Loved by babies, chosen by mums.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac NutriBiscuit Original**:
â­ Close the pack tightly after each use and store in a cool, dry place.
â­ Use within 14 days after opening and before the expiry date indicated on the pack.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac NutriBiscuit Original**:
â­ Wheat flour, sucrose, wheat starch, butter, dried skimmed milk, honey, salt, vanillin, minerals & vitamins.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙŠÙ„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ø¨ÙˆØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ù…Ø­ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø®Ø¶Ø±ÙˆØ§Øª 350 Ø¬Ù… - Ù„Ø¨Ø¯Ø§ÙŠØ© ØµØ­ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
Start your baby's weaning journey with **Cerelac** Rice & Vegetable Mix. This nutritious and delicious food is specially designed for babies from 6 months and above, enriched with essential vitamins and minerals including Iron, Zinc, and Vitamin A to support normal growth and development. With a smooth texture perfect for your baby's developing chewing and swallowing abilities, and free from artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives, **Cerelac** offers a convenient and wholesome meal that introduces your baby to new tastes and textures safely and deliciously.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac** Rice & Vegetable Mix:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing your baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and then let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ In a clean bowl, measure 150ml of lukewarm water.
â­ Add 50g (approximately 5 level tablespoons) of **Cerelac** Rice & Vegetable Mix.
â­ Stir well until the cereal is smooth and consistent.
â­ Serve the food to your baby immediately with a clean spoon, and discard any uneaten portion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac** Rice & Vegetable Mix:
â­ Rice
â­ Dehydrated vegetables (carrot, onion, leek, pumpkin, tomato)
â­ Skimmed milk powder
â­ Vegetable oils (palm, rapeseed, coconut, sunflower)
â­ Sugar
â­ Minerals (Iron, Zinc, Calcium, Iodine)
â­ Vitamins (A, C, D, E, B1, B2, B6, B12, Niacin, Folic Acid, Pantothenic Acid)
â­ Probiotic cultures (Bifidus BL)
â­ Contains milk and may contain traces of gluten.

#Cerelac #BabyFood #BabyCereal #Weaning #InfantNutrition #BabyHealth #BabyProducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Delicious and nutritious meals for your baby with **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Sugar Free**. At the start of your baby's weaning journey, **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Sugar Free** is the perfect beginning to introduce simple flavors and a suitable texture for your little one, supporting their cognitive development and natural growth.

â­ Fortified with Iron to support normal cognitive development.
â­ Contains Calcium, Vitamins A, C & D, and other essential nutrients.
â­ Gluten-free.
â­ Simple flavor and suitable texture for easy digestion.
â­ An ideal foundation for a varied and balanced diet.
â­ Made with 100% natural ingredients.
â­ Helps support babies' natural defenses.
â­ Contains BIFIDUS BL to enhance natural immunity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Sugar Free**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes, then let it cool.
â­ Pour 150 ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50 grams or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Sugar Free**.
â­ Stir until the mixture is smooth and feed immediately with a clean spoon.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Sugar Free**
â­ Wheat Flour.
â­ Skimmed Milk Solids.
â­ Caramel.
â­ Palm Olein.
â­ Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Sunflower Oil.
â­ Vanilla Flavor.
â­ Bifidus Culture.
â­ Minerals & Vitamins.

description_en:
Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 400g is the perfect choice to start your baby's journey with solid food. This nutritious and easy-to-prepare cereal, made from wheat and milk powder, is fortified with iRON+ to support cognitive development. It also contains Bifidus BL probiotics and immunonutrients (A, C, D, and Zinc) to boost your baby's immunity. Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 400g is made from 100% natural grains and is easily digestible, helping your baby adapt easily to thicker food textures and delicious fruit pieces. It's a nutritious and convenient meal for your baby from 8 months onwards.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 400g:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and then let it cool. Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 400g**.
â­ Stir the mixture until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.
â­ Contains Gluten and Milk.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 400g:
â­ Wheat Flour, Dried Skimmed Milk, Sucrose, Palm Olein, Corn Flake, Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Banana, Apple, Honey, Sunflower Oil, Vanilla Flavor, Bifidus Culture, Minerals & Vitamins.
â­ Contains Gluten and Milk.

description_en:
NESTLE CERELAC Fruit & Oat Puree is a nutritious and delicious meal designed to help your little one discover the wonderful flavors of fruits and grains starting from 6 months. Each pouch is made with 100% natural fruits, carefully selected for their high quality and taste-tested by little ones themselves, giving you complete confidence. **Cerelac Fruit & Oat Puree Multipack** contains Vitamin C, which plays a vital role in supporting your baby's brain development and cognitive growth. These convenient, ready-to-serve pouches are perfect for on-the-go, featuring a serving spout for better control, meaning less waste and less mess. 

**Product Features:**
â­ Fortified with Vitamin C to support healthy brain development.
â­ Vitamin C contributes to strengthening your babyâ€™s immune system.
â­ Made from 100% natural fruits and grains, easily digestible.
â­ Helps your baby adapt easily from milk to solids.
â­ Perfect for when you are on the go, offering easy and convenient feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Fruit & Oat Puree Multipack**:
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into a bowl.

**Cautions & Warnings:**
â­ Contains gluten.
â­ NESTLÃ‰ CERELAC is not intended for bottle-feeding.
â­ Complementary food. Not to be used as a breastmilk substitute.
â­ Never microwave the pouch.
â­ Warning: Keep the cap out of reach of children. Always supervise your baby while eating.
â­ If the pouch looks damaged or inflated, do not feed your baby.
â­ Storage: Store unopened at room temperature or in the fridge.
â­ Refrigerate within 1 hour after opening. Use within 1 day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Fruit & Oat Puree Multipack**:
â­ Banana, Apple, Oat & Vitamin C.

description_en:
Begin your baby's journey to balanced nutrition with **Cerelac Baby Cereal Honey 1000 gm**. Nestle presents this high-quality, nutritious cereal, specially designed for babies from 6 months and above. It features a formula rich in iron to support cognitive and brain development, along with prebiotics and essential immunonutrients like vitamins (A, C, D) and zinc to strengthen your baby's immune system. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Honey 1000 gm** is made from 100% natural grains and is easily digestible, making it the ideal choice to help your baby get used to new tastes and solid foods.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Honey 1000 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing your baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes, then let it cool to lukewarm (around 37Â°C).
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's clean bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Honey 1000 gm**.
â­ Stir the mixture well until you achieve a smooth and consistent texture, and feed it to your baby immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep any unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Honey 1000 gm**:
â­ Wheat flour, skimmed milk solids, sucrose, honey, palm olein oil, low erucic acid rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil, vanillin, bifidus culture, a balanced mix of minerals and vitamins.
â­ Contains gluten and milk.

#Cerelac #BabyCereal #InfantNutrition #WheatHoney #BabyFood #Nestle #BabyHealth #InfantVitamins #BabyWeaning #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Embark on your baby's flavor journey with **Cerelac** Fruit & Oats Puree. This nutritious and delicious blend, made with banana, apple, and oats, is specially designed to help your little one explore the goodness of fruits from 6 months onwards. We carefully select 100% natural fruits for the highest quality, then taste-test them ourselves to provide you with complete confidence. **Cerelac** contains Vitamin C, which plays a vital role in supporting your baby's brain development and cognitive growth. This convenient pouch comes with an easy-to-use serving spout, offering greater control and reducing mess and waste, making it perfect for on-the-go. Each puree undergoes over 100 quality checks and is completely free from added sugar or salt, and artificial colors or flavors.

â­ Fortified with Vitamin C to support healthy brain development.
â­ Vitamin C contributes to strengthening your babyâ€™s immune system.
â­ Made from 100% natural fruits and grains, and easily digestible.
â­ Helps your baby transition smoothly from milk to solids.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into a clean bowl.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**
â­ Banana, apple, oats, and Vitamin C.

description_en:
NESTLE CERELAC Broccoli, Parsnip, Apple & Pear Puree is a nutritious and delicious baby food made with 100% natural ingredients, perfect for introducing your little one to new flavors from 6 months. Each ingredient is carefully selected for the highest quality and a taste babies love, giving you confidence in your nutritional choices. This puree contains Vitamin C, essential for supporting healthy brain and cognitive development. The **Cerelac** pouch features a convenient design with an easy-to-use spout, allowing for better control during feeding and reducing mess and waste, making it ideal for on-the-go nutrition.

â­ Made with 100% natural fruits & vegetables
â­ Contains Vitamin C to support cognitive development
â­ No added sucrose or salt
â­ Free from artificial colors and flavors
â­ Convenient pouch with a serving spout for easy feeding

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into your baby's bowl.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Apple Puree 51%
â­ Pear Puree 29%
â­ Broccoli Puree 10%
â­ Parsnip Puree 10%

description_en:
Nestle **Cerelac** Puree 6 Fruits is a nutritious and delicious way to introduce your little one to the wonderful world of fruits from 6 months of age. It is crafted from a delightful blend of apple, banana, peach, apricot, grape, and orange, offering your baby a pleasing and beneficial taste experience.

We believe in the importance of quality ingredients, which is why every pack of **Cerelac** puree is made with 100% natural fruits, carefully selected for their premium quality. All our products undergo over 100 quality checks to ensure the highest standards of safety and purity. This puree is enriched with Vitamin C, which plays a vital role in supporting healthy brain development and cognitive growth in your baby, as well as boosting their immune system.

The convenient pouch design with an easy-to-use spout makes feeding your baby simple and on-the-go friendly. The design minimizes mess and waste, giving you better control during meal times. Most importantly, **Cerelac** puree contains absolutely no added sugar or salt, and no artificial colors or flavors, ensuring pure natural goodness for your precious little one's health.

â­ Nutritious and delicious, perfect for introducing fruits from 6 months.
â­ Fortified with Vitamin C to support healthy cognitive development and immunity.
â­ Made from 100% natural fruits and easily digestible.
â­ Convenient and on-the-go pouch, reduces mess and waste.
â­ Free from added sugar, salt, artificial colors, or flavors.

#Cerelac #BabyFood #FruitPuree #BabyNutrition #BabyProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #MomAndBaby #BabyHealth

description_en:
Discover the nutritious power of **Cerelac Kids** Multicereals & Fruits 400 Gm, specially formulated for toddlers from 3 years and onwards. This balanced meal combines delicious whole grains like wheat, oat, and rice with fruity crunchies, providing your child with healthy energy and growth. Our product is made from 100% natural ingredients and contains no added sucrose, making it the ideal choice for a satisfying and nourishing meal.

**Product Features:**
â­ A nutritious multicereal meal with fruit crunchies and milk tailored to your toddler.
â­ Made from 100% natural ingredients*.
â­ No added sucrose.
â­ Fortified with 16 Vitamins & Minerals for healthy development.
â­ Rich in Iron, meeting more than 50% of your child's daily iron needs to support cognitive development.
â­ Free from preservatives, artificial colors, and flavors for your child's well-being.
â­ A delightful mix of multicereals: wheat, oat, and rice.
â­ With added essential vitamins and minerals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Kids** Multicereals & Fruits:
â­ Prepare a nutritious meal easily by mixing the recommended amount of cereal with warm milk or water.
â­ Serve immediately after preparation for the best taste and quality.
â­ Adjust consistency by adding more liquid as per your toddler's preference.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Kids** Multicereals & Fruits:
â­ Core ingredients: WHEAT Flour, Dried Skimmed Cow's MILK.
â­ Non-Hydrogenated Vegetable Oils for healthy benefits.
â­ Whole grains: Corn, Whole Oat Flour, Rice Flour, BARLEY Flour.
â­ A touch of natural flavor: Banana Flakes, Strawberry Crunchies, Strawberry Juice Concentrate.
â­ Essential Vitamins and Minerals for comprehensive growth support.
â­ Contains GLUTEN, MILK & SOY.

Discover delicious nourishment with **Cerelac** Fruit & Biscuit Puree, specially crafted to help your little one explore the goodness of fruits from 6 months of age. Made with 100% natural fruits carefully selected for their quality, each **Cerelac** pouch undergoes over 100 quality checks to ensure the highest safety and purity standards. Fortified with Vitamin C to support healthy brain development and boost immunity, it contains no added sugar, salt, artificial colors, or flavors.

â­ Nutritious and delicious fruit and biscuit puree.
â­ Perfect for feeding your baby on the go.
â­ Fortified with Vitamin C to support cognitive development.
â­ Contributes to strengthening your baby's immune system.
â­ Made from 100% natural ingredients and easily digestible.
â­ Helps your baby transition smoothly from milk to solids.

NESTLE **Cerelac** Fruit & Biscuit Puree, a nutritious and delicious blend to help introduce your little one to the goodness of fruits and biscuits from 6 months. Made with carefully selected 100% natural Fruits & Biscuits, quality tested, then taste tested by the little ones themselves, to give you confidence in your decision. **Cerelac** contains vitamin C which helps support healthy brain and cognitive development. This convenient, ready-to-serve pouch with a serving spout allows for more control, meaning less waste and less mess, ideal for when you're on the go! Each one of our purÃ©es passes over 100 NESTLE quality checks, and they contain no added sucrose or salt, and no artificial colours or flavours.

**Product Features:**
â­ A nutritious and convenient fruit and biscuit puree. 
â­ Perfect for when you are on the go.
â­ Fortified with vitamin C which helps support brain and cognitive development.
â­ Vitamin C contributes to strengthening your babyâ€™s immune system.
â­ Made from 100% natural fruits and grains and easily digestible.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into a bowl.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:

description_en:
Begin your baby's journey with healthy nutrition with **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**, specially designed to support your baby's growth from 6 months onwards. This nutritious and convenient infant cereal is a perfect blend of whole wheat grains and milk powder, fortified with Iron+ to support brain and cognitive development, and immunonutrients like Vitamins (A, C, D) and Zinc to support your babyâ€™s immune system. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit** is made from 100% natural grains and is easily digestible, helping your baby get used to new tastes and delicious flavors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**.
â­ Stir until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**:
â­ Wheat flour, dried skimmed milk, sucrose, palm olein, banana flake, pineapple juice concentrate, orange juice concentrate, low erucic acid rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil, vanilla flavor, bifidus culture, minerals & vitamins.
â­ Contains gluten and milk.

#Cerelac #BabyCereal #InfantNutrition #BabyFood #WheatAndFruit #BabyHealth #From6Months #BabyMilk #HealthyFood #SaudiArabia

description_en:
NESTLE **Cerelac** Fruit & Oats Puree is a nutritious and delicious meal designed to help your little one discover the delightful tastes of fruits from 6 months onwards. Made with 100% natural fruits carefully selected for superior quality and taste-tested by little ones themselves, giving you complete confidence. It contains Vitamin C, essential for supporting your baby's healthy brain development and cognitive growth.

This **Cerelac** pouch features a practical design with a serving spout, offering better control and reducing mess and waste, making it ideal for on-the-go use. Each pouch undergoes over 100 stringent quality checks by NestlÃ©, and is completely free from added sucrose, added salt, and artificial colors or flavors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into a serving bowl.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Pear Puree 36%
â­ Banana Puree 15%
â­ Raspberry Puree 9%
â­ Whole Oat Flour 2.5%
â­ Grape juice concentrate 2.5%
â­ Wheat Flakes 1.5%
â­ Lemon Juice Concentrate
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Contains Gluten.

description_en:
Discover a world of delicious and nutritious flavors with **Cerelac NutriPuffs** in Banana & Strawberry! These innovative snacks are specially designed for your little ones, featuring an easy-to-grab shape to promote self-feeding and a melt-in-your-mouth texture for safe consumption. **Cerelac NutriPuffs** are carefully baked, making them a healthy alternative to fried snacks, and are completely free from added sugar, salt, and artificial flavors. They are also a rich source of Vitamin B1 and fiber, making them the perfect choice for fun and beneficial snack times. Make your baby's eating experience delightful and nutritious with **Cerelac NutriPuffs**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac NutriPuffs**:
â­ Easy to grab to promote self-feeding.
â­ Melts in the mouth for safe consumption.
â­ Baked not fried.
â­ No added sugar or salt.
â­ Source of Vitamin B1 and fiber.

description_en:
Nestle **Cerelac** Fruit Cocktail Puree is a nutritious and delicious baby food made with banana, apple, pear, and orange, designed to help introduce your little one to the goodness of fruits from 6 months old. Made with 100% natural fruits carefully selected for their high quality, then taste-tested by little ones themselves, to give you confidence in your choice. It contains vitamin C, which helps support healthy brain and cognitive development. This convenient, ready-to-serve pouch with a serving spout allows for more control, meaning less waste and less mess, making it ideal when on the go! Each of our purÃ©es passes over 100 Nestle quality checks, and they contain no added sugar or salt, and no artificial colors or flavors.

â­ A nutritious and convenient fruit puree, perfect for on-the-go.
â­ Fortified with vitamin C to support brain and cognitive development.
â­ Vitamin C contributes to strengthening your babyâ€™s immune system.
â­ Made from 100% natural fruits and easily digestible.
â­ Helps your baby adapt easily from milk to solids.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac** Fruit Cocktail Puree:
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into a bowl.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac** Fruit Cocktail Puree:
â­ Banana, apple, pear, orange, and vitamin C.

description_en:
Begin your baby's nutritional journey with **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Date Pieces 400gm**, specifically designed to support your baby's growth from 8 months and onwards. This nutritious and easy-to-prepare cereal, made from wheat and milk powder, is fortified with iron+ to aid cognitive and brain development. It also contains Bifidus BL and essential immunonutrients like Vitamins A, C, D, and Zinc to strengthen your baby's delicate immune system. Made from 100% natural grains and easily digestible, **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Date Pieces 400gm** helps your baby adapt easily to thicker food textures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Date Pieces 400gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm. Pour 150ml of water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Date Pieces 400gm**.
â­ Stir until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon. Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat Date Pieces 400gm**:
â­ Dried skimmed milk, wheat flour, caramel, corn flake, sucrose, palm olein, date syrup, date, low erucic acid rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil, sugar syrup, vanillin, bifidus culture, minerals & vitamins.
â­ Contains gluten and milk.

description_en:
Introducing **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g**, a nutritious and easily digestible cereal designed for your little ones from 6 months onwards. This wholesome cereal is carefully formulated to be free from added sugar, featuring a rich blend of multigrains including rice, wheat, oats, and corn. This unique formula is fortified with essential iron, vitamins, and minerals to support your baby's healthy growth, boost their immunity, and promote better digestion. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g** is the perfect choice for safely and deliciously introducing your baby to solid foods.

â­ Free from added sugars and artificial sweeteners for a healthier option.
â­ A diverse blend of grains (rice, wheat, oats, corn) for balanced carbohydrates and fiber.
â­ Fortified with Iron, Vitamins A, D, C, B complex, and minerals to support growth and immune system development.
â­ Easy to digest and gentle on sensitive baby tummies.
â­ Promotes healthy digestion with its high fiber content.
â­ Quick and convenient to prepare with water or milk, saving feeding time.
â­ Free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives.
â­ Suitable for babies 6 months and older, perfect for starting solids.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g**
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool to a lukewarm temperature (around 40-45Â°C).
â­ Pour 2-3 heaping tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g** per 100 ml of water or milk, or as per package instructions.
â­ Stir well to ensure a smooth, lump-free consistency.
â­ Allow it to cool to a comfortable temperature before feeding.
â­ Serve immediately or store any leftovers in a covered container in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours.
â­ Always check the temperature before feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g**
â­ Rice Flour
â­ Wheat Flour
â­ Corn Flour
â­ Oat Flour
â­ Vegetable Oils (such as palm oil or sunflower oil)
â­ Iron (fortified with iron)
â­ Vitamins (A, D, C, B1, B2, B6, B12, Folate)
â­ Minerals (Zinc, Calcium, Iodine)
â­ Natural Flavors (if used)
â­ Free from added sugars and artificial sweeteners.

description_en:
Start your baby's journey with proper nutrition with **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 1000 gm**. This rich and nutritious cereal, specifically designed for babies from 8 months and above, combines the benefits of whole wheat with the natural sweetness of fruits for an enjoyable and healthy eating experience. Fortified with iron to support brain and cognitive development, and contains essential nutrients like vitamins and minerals to support a strong immune system. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 1000 gm** is easy to digest and helps your baby adapt to new food textures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 1000 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and then let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Pour 150 ml of lukewarm water into a clean bowl.
â­ Add 50 grams (approximately 9 level tablespoons) of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 1000 gm**.
â­ Mix well until a smooth and homogeneous consistency is achieved.
â­ Serve immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep any leftover food.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat & Fruit Pieces 1000 gm**:
â­ Wheat flour.
â­ Dried skimmed milk.
â­ Sucrose.
â­ Palm olein.
â­ Corn flakes.
â­ Low erucic acid rapeseed oil.
â­ Coconut oil.
â­ Dried banana and apple pieces.
â­ Honey.
â­ Sunflower oil.
â­ Natural vanilla flavor.
â­ Bifidus culture.
â­ Essential minerals and vitamins.
â­ Contains gluten and milk.

#Cerelac #BabyCereal #InfantNutrition #BabyFood #WheatAndFruit #HealthyBabyFood #BabyFoodSaudi #KidsFood #BabyHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover CERELAC NutriPuffs Corn, the perfect snack for your little one! Specially designed to encourage self-feeding, these puffs are easy to grasp and melt in the mouth for safe consumption. Baked not fried, with no added sugar or salt, they are a rich source of Vitamin B1 and Fiber. Make snack time fun and nutritious with CERELAC NutriPuffs Corn!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for CERELAC NutriPuffs Corn
â­ Serve to babies aged 7 months and above under direct supervision of an adult.
â­ Ensure your baby is sitting up straight and feeding themselves.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place after opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of CERELAC NutriPuffs Corn
â­ Corn, High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Mixed Tocopherol Concentrate (Antioxidant), Vitamin B1, Minerals (Calcium Carbonate, Ferrous Fumarate & Zinc Sulfate).
â­ May contain gluten, peanuts and tree nuts.

description_en:
NestlÃ© **Cerelac Kids** Puree is the perfect choice for nourishing your toddler aged 3 years and above. Made with 100% natural ingredients, it combines the deliciousness of apples, bananas, and strawberries to provide your child with a tasty and nutritious experience. Each pouch offers 1.5 servings of fruits and vegetables from the recommended five a day, fortified with Vitamin C to boost your child's immunity. **Cerelac Kids** is characterized by being free from artificial preservatives and added sucrose, making it a healthy and safe option for your little one.

â­ Made from 100% natural apples, bananas, and strawberries.
â­ Fortified with Vitamin C to support immunity.
â­ No artificial preservatives or added sucrose.
â­ A nutritious and convenient on-the-go snack.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Kids**
â­ Serve directly.
â­ Can be gently warmed in a water bath or microwave (remove plastic lid).
â­ Stir puree well and check temperature before serving.
â­ Do not freeze.
â­ After opening, refrigerate for no more than 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Kids**
â­ Apple Puree (53%).
â­ Banana Pulp (27%).
â­ Strawberry Puree (20%).
â­ Vitamin C.

description_en:
Nestle **Cerelac** Wheat & Honey is a delicious and nutritious baby food pouch, specially formulated for babies from 6 months onwards. This product combines the natural goodness of grains and milk to provide a complete and nourishing meal. Rich in iron, it supports your baby's healthy cognitive development, making it an ideal choice for on-the-go feeding. **Cerelac** helps your baby transition smoothly from milk to solids, offering a convenient and easy-to-use feeding experience for parents.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ This product should not be used to feed infants below 6 months.
â­ Remove the cap and squeeze onto a spoon to feed a seated, supervised baby.
â­ Consult your doctor before using and to know how to use the product.
â­ Important: Breast-feeding is best for babies.
â­ Continue breast-feeding as long as possible after introduction of complementary feeding.
â­ Contains Milk and Gluten.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Water.
â­ Cereals.
â­ Wheat flour.
â­ Dried Skimmed Cow's Milk.
â­ Vegetable oils (Low Erucic Rapeseed Oil, High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Sunflower Oil).
â­ Honey.
â­ Iron (Ferrous fumarate).

description_en:
Nestle **Cerelac Baby Cereal Date Pieces 1000 gm** offers a complete nutritional meal for your baby from 8 months onwards.

Enjoy the delicious blend of wheat with natural date pieces, fortified with iron to support brain and cognitive development, plus Bifidus BL and immunonutrients (Vitamins A, C, D, and Zinc) to boost your baby's immunity. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Date Pieces 1000 gm** is made from 100% natural grains and is easily digestible, making it an ideal choice for gradually introducing your baby to thicker textures and new flavors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Date Pieces 1000 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands before preparing the baby's food.
â­ Ensure all utensils are thoroughly clean.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes, then allow it to cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
â­ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac**.
â­ Stir well until the cereal has a smooth consistency.
â­ Feed your baby immediately using a clean spoon.
â­ Do not keep unfinished portions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Date Pieces 1000 gm**:
â­ Dried skimmed milk
â­ Wheat flour
â­ Caramel
â­ Corn flake
â­ Sucrose
â­ Palm olein
â­ Date syrup
â­ Date
â­ Low erucic acid rapeseed oil
â­ Coconut oil
â­ Sunflower oil
â­ Sugar syrup
â­ Vanillin
â­ Bifidus culture
â­ Minerals & vitamins.
â­ Contains gluten and milk.

description_en:
Introducing **Cerelac 5 Cereals with Milk Baby Food Pouch**, a delightful and nourishing meal designed for babies aged 6 months and above. This pouch offers a wholesome blend of nature's best grains and milk for your baby's optimal development.

â­ A rich source of Iron, crucial for supporting your baby's cognitive development.
â­ Your perfect on-the-go companion, ensuring your little one is always well-fed.
â­ Smoothly transitions your baby from milk feeds to solid foods.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac 5 Cereals with Milk Baby Food Pouch**:
â­ This product should not be used to feed infants below 6 months of age.
â­ Remove the cap and squeeze onto a spoon to feed a seated, supervised baby.
â­ Consult your doctor before use for proper feeding guidance.
â­ Breast-feeding is best for babies and should be continued as long as possible.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac 5 Cereals with Milk Baby Food Pouch**:
â­ Water, Cereals, Wheat flour, Whole Oat flour, Corn, White rice flour, Barley flour.
â­ Dried skimmed cow's milk, Vegetable Oils (Low erucic rapeseed oil, High oleic sunflower oil, Sunflower oil).
â­ Iron (Ferrous fumarate).
â­ Contains Milk and Gluten.

description_en:
Explore delightful flavors with **Cerelac** Apple Puree, a nutritious and delicious baby food crafted to introduce your little one to the natural sweetness of fruits from 6 months onwards. **Cerelac** is made with 100% natural apples, carefully selected for premium quality, and taste-tested by tiny connoisseurs to give you complete confidence. This wonderful puree supports healthy brain and cognitive development thanks to its Vitamin C content. The convenient, ready-to-serve pouch with a serving spout offers great control, minimizing mess and waste, making it perfect for on-the-go feeding! Every **Cerelac** puree undergoes over 100 quality checks, contains no added sucrose or salt, and is free from artificial colors or flavors, ensuring the best start for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into a bowl.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Apple Puree 98%
â­ Apple Juice Concentrate
â­ Lemon Juice Concentrate
â­ Vitamin C

description_en:
Introducing **Cerelac** Banana & Apple Puree, a nutritious and delicious meal specially crafted to help your little one explore natural fruit flavors from 6 months onwards. **Cerelac** is made from the finest 100% natural bananas and apples, carefully selected and taste-tested to ensure the highest standards of quality and flavor. Fortified with Vitamin C to support healthy brain and cognitive development, making it an ideal choice for introducing solids. The **Cerelac** pouch comes with a convenient, ready-to-serve design featuring a serving spout for better control and less mess, perfect for on-the-go feeding. Each pouch undergoes over 100 quality checks and is free from added sugars, salt, artificial colors, and flavors.

â­ Nutritious and convenient fruit puree for babies 6+ months.
â­ Perfect for on-the-go snacking.
â­ Fortified with Vitamin C to support brain and cognitive development.
â­ Vitamin C contributes to strengthening your babyâ€™s immune system.
â­ Made from 100% natural fruits and is easily digestible.
â­ Helps your baby transition smoothly from milk to solids.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:
â­ Squeeze directly onto a spoon or into the serving bowl.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cerelac**:
â­ Natural Banana

This delicious and nutritious puree is made with 100% natural ingredients, helping your little one explore the fresh flavors of fruits. Each pouch of **Cerelac** Apple & Apricot Puree provides two servings of fruit towards their recommended daily intake, with added Vitamin C to support immunity. It's completely free from artificial preservatives and added sugars, making it a nourishing and convenient meal.

â­ Made from 100% natural fruits for an authentic taste.

Experience complete nutrition for your baby with **Cerelac** Wheat & Milk, the ideal choice for convenient and delicious feeding from 6 months onwards. Every pouch of **Cerelac** Wheat & Milk is carefully crafted to provide the natural goodness of grains and milk, serving as a vital source of iron to support your baby's healthy cognitive development. description_en:
Discover complete nutrition for your child with **Similac Gold 3**, the advanced formula specifically designed for children aged 1 to 3 years. **Similac Gold 3** is developed to support healthy growth and strong immunity, with ingredients that promote mental and visual development. **Similac Gold 3** provides a unique blend of essential nutrients for your child's healthy journey.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 3**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the formula.
â­ Boil feeding bottles and utensils for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Use the enclosed scoop to measure the specified amount of powder.
â­ Add one level scoop of powder to each 60 mL of warm water.
â­ Mix until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the milk's temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Discard any remaining formula after 1 hour of feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 3**:
â­ Contains 2'-FL HMO to support your child's immune system.
â­ Rich in DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6.
â­ Contains Taurine, Choline, Zinc, and Iron to support mental and visual development.
â­ A unique fat blend that supports calcium absorption for strong bones.
â­ Contains Prebiotics, Probiotics, and Nucleotides.

#SimilacGold #BabyFormula #KidsNutrition #GrowingUpMilk #ChildrensHealth #BabyCare #InfantFormula #SaudiBabies #PediatricNutrition #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Similac Gold 3** is a new and improved formula for babies from 1 year to 3 years of age, specifically designed to meet their growing nutritional needs while providing comprehensive support for health and immunity.

â­ Contains 2'-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, to support your childâ€™s immune system.
â­ Rich in DHA and AA to support cognitive, visual, and language development.
â­ Unique fat blend without palm olein oil â€“ clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.
â­ A source of prebiotics and nucleotides to support digestive health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 3**:
â­ Thoroughly wash feeding container and all utensils, then boil for 5 minutes.
â­ Heat water to a rolling boil for 5 minutes and allow it to cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding container.
â­ Fill enclosed scoop and add one level scoop of powder to each 60 mL of water.
â­ Mix until completely dissolved. Test temperature and feed.
â­ Discard unused formula within 1 hour of starting feeding.
â­ Store unopened tin under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25 Â°C).
â­ Use contents of opened tin within 3 weeks.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 3**:
â­ 2'-FL HMO: To support your child's immunity.
â­ DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6, Taurine, Choline, Zinc, and Iron: For proper mental, visual, and language development.
â­ Fat blend without palm olein oil: For better calcium absorption and stronger bones.
â­ Prebiotics and Nucleotides: To support the digestive and immune systems.

#SimilacGold #BabyFormula #HealthyGrowth #InfantNutrition #KidsImmunity #ChildHealth #HealthyFood #BabyEssentials #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your baby with **Similac Gold Infant Formula (2) 800 gm**, specially developed for babies from 6 to 12 months, to support their healthy growth and mental and visual development.

â­ **Similac Gold Infant Formula (2) 800 gm** offers a complete formula containing HMO to support immunity, DHA and ARA for brain and eye development, and palm olein-free fats for calcium absorption and strong bones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold Infant Formula (2) 800 gm**:
â­ Wash the bottle and all utensils, then boil them for five minutes and set aside on a clean surface.
â­ Boil water for five minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Fill the enclosed scoop with powder and scrape it level.
â­ Add one level scoop of powder to each 60 ml of water and mix until completely dissolved.
â­ Test the temperature of the feed and then feed your baby. Discard any remaining formula.
â­ Additional feeds can be refrigerated for up to 24 hours.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to warm formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold Infant Formula (2) 800 gm**:
â­ 2'-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, to support your childâ€™s immune system.
â­ DHA and ARA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6, Taurine, Choline, Zinc and Iron, which are key building blocks for mental, visual, and language development.
â­ A unique fat blend without palm olein oil â€“ clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.
â­ Prebiotics, Probiotics, and Nucleotides to support digestive health and immunity.

description_en:
Give your baby the best start with **Similac Gold 1**, an innovative infant formula specially developed for newborns up to 6 months of age. **Similac Gold 1** boosts their immune system with 2'-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, and essential elements for mental, visual, and language development such as DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6, Taurine, Choline, Zinc, and Iron. It features a unique fat blend without palm olein oil, clinically proven to support calcium absorption and strengthen bones, along with added prebiotics and nucleotides for improved digestive health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 1**:
â­ Thoroughly wash feeding container and all utensils, then boil for 5 minutes. Set aside on a clean surface.
â­ In a separate pan, heat water to a rolling boil for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding container.
â­ Fill enclosed scoop, then add one level scoop of powder to each 60 mL of water. Mix until completely dissolved. Test temperature and feed.
â­ Once feeding begins, discard unused formula within 1 hour. Additional feedings can be stored in the refrigerator for 24 hours.
â­ Warning: Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 1**:
â­ 2'-FL HMO for immune support.
â­ DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6, Taurine, Choline, Zinc, Iron for baby's development.
â­ Fat blend without palm olein oil for calcium absorption support.
â­ Prebiotics and Nucleotides for digestive health.

description_en:
Discover the power of development with **Similac Gold (3)**, the innovative formula specifically designed for your children aged 1 to 3 years. This fortified milk combines science and nutrition to support healthy growth and sustained energy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold (3)**:
â­ Thoroughly wash the feeding bottle and all utensils, then boil them for 5 minutes.
â­ In a separate container, boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool slightly.
â­ Pour the correct amount of lukewarm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Fill the enclosed scoop with the powder, then add one level scoop for every 60 mL of water.
â­ Mix the ingredients until the powder is completely dissolved and check the temperature before feeding.
â­ Discard any remaining formula within 1 hour of starting the feed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold (3)**:
â­ Contains 2'-FL HMO, inspired by breast milk, to support your child's immune system.
â­ Rich in DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6, Taurine, Choline, Zinc, and Iron to support mental, visual, and language development.
â­ A unique fat blend without palm olein oil, clinically proven to enhance calcium absorption and strengthen bones.
â­ Contains Prebiotics and Nucleotides to support digestive health and boost immunity.

#SimilacGold #BabyMilk #BabyNutrition #HealthyGrowth #ChildImmunity #BoneHealth #Vitamins #BrainDevelopment #BabyFormula #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover **Similac Gold 1**, the advanced formula specifically designed to support the healthy growth of your baby from birth to 6 months. **Similac Gold 1** is enriched with 2'-FL HMO, a breast milk oligosaccharide that helps strengthen your baby's immune system. It also contains a comprehensive blend of DHA, AA, Lutein, and Natural Vitamin E to support cognitive and visual development. Our unique palm olein-free fat blend ensures better calcium absorption for strong bones. Enriched with Prebiotics and Nucleotides, **Similac Gold 1** promotes digestive health. Give your baby the best start with **Similac Gold 1**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 1**
â­ Wash hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Boil feeding bottle and all utensils for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour the correct amount of lukewarm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Use the enclosed scoop. Add one level scoop of powder for every 60 mL of water.
â­ Mix until completely dissolved and check the temperature.
â­ Discard unused formula within 1 hour.
â­ Additional feedings can be stored in the refrigerator for 24 hours.
â­ Warning: Do not use a microwave to warm the milk.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 1**
â­ 2'-FL HMO to support immunity.
â­ DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E for cognitive and visual development.
â­ Omega 3 & 6, Taurine, Choline, Zinc, and Iron.
â­ Palm olein-free fat blend for calcium absorption.
â­ Prebiotics and Nucleotides to support digestive health.

#Similac #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #HealthyGrowth #BabyImmunity #SaudiBabies #BabyCare #InfantHealth #SimilacGold #BabyVitamins

description_en:
Similac Gold 2 is an advanced and specially formulated milk for babies aged 6 to 12 months, designed to support their crucial growth and development stages. With a unique blend of essential nutrients, **Similac Gold 2** contributes to building a strong immune system and enhancing cognitive and visual development. This formula has been carefully developed to meet your baby's increasing nutritional needs, making it the ideal choice to support their journey towards healthy growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 2**:
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, cap, and all utensils thoroughly, then boil them for five minutes.
â­ Allow boiled water to cool slightly.
â­ Pour the correct amount of lukewarm water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Fill the enclosed scoop with powder and level it.
â­ Add one level scoop of powder for every 60 ml of water.
â­ Mix until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature of the feed before giving it to your baby.
â­ Discard any leftover formula after feeding.
â­ Additional feeds should be refrigerated for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 2**:
â­ Contains 2'-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, to support your childâ€™s immune system.
â­ Rich in DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6 to support cognitive and visual development.
â­ A unique fat blend without palm olein oil, clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.
â­ Contains Prebiotics and Nucleotides to promote digestive and immune health.

#Similac #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #HealthyGrowth #BabyImmunity #SimilacGold #Stage2 #SaudiArabia #Infants #BabyHealth

description_en:
Introducing **Similac Max Pro (3)**, the advanced infant formula designed to support your child's healthy growth and development between 12 and 36 months. This special formula is 98% lactose-free and based on partially hydrolyzed cow's milk protein, making it an ideal choice for babies with lactose intolerance or gastrointestinal issues like spit-up, gas, bloating, colic, or diarrhea.

â­ 98% Lactose-Free for optimal digestive comfort.
â­ Contains HMO, Prebiotics, Probiotics (Bifidobacterium lactis), and nucleotides to support immunity and gut health.
â­ Enriched with DHA and AA for brain and eye development.
â­ Free from Palm Olein Oil, with a specialized fat blend.
â­ Includes Lutein, Choline, Iron, Taurine, and Zinc for comprehensive growth support.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Max Pro (3)**:
â­ Recommended by doctors as a substitute for regular formula in cases of lactose intolerance or gastrointestinal disturbances.
â­ Use under medical supervision.
â­ Never use the microwave to prepare or warm the formula.
â­ Store unopened tin in normal room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C).
â­ Once opened, use contents within three weeks.
â­ Ensure proper hygiene, handling, and storage practices.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Max Pro (3)**:
â­ Contains HMO (Human Milk Oligosaccharides).
â­ Omega-3 Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) and Omega-6 Arachidonic acid (AA).
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharide (FOS) and Probiotics (Bifidobacterium lactis).
â­ Amino acids and nucleotides.
â­ Fat blend free from Palm Olein Oil.
â­ Lutein, Iron, Choline, Taurine, and Zinc.

description_en:
Discover **Similac Simi Kids Gold Powder** 900 GM, an advanced milk formula designed to meet the evolving nutritional needs of children over 3 years old. **Similac Simi Kids Gold Powder** offers a delicious taste and excellent nutritional value.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Simi Kids Gold Powder**:
â­ Wash the bottle and all utensils thoroughly, then boil for five minutes.
â­ In a separate container, boil water and let it cool.
â­ Pour the appropriate amount of pre-boiled lukewarm water into the sterilized bottle.
â­ Use the enclosed scoop, fill it with powder, and level it.
â­ Add one leveled scoop of powder for every 60 ml of water and mix well.
â­ Check the temperature of the feed before giving it to your baby.
â­ Discard any leftover formula after feeding.
â­ Store additional feeds in the refrigerator (2-4Â°C) for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Simi Kids Gold Powder**:
â­ Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) and Arachidonic Acid (AA).
â­ Omega 3 & 6 for brain and vision development.
â­ Taurine, Choline, and Iron for healthy growth.
â­ Lutein for eye health support.
â­ Prebiotics: dietary fiber for digestive health.
â­ Probiotics: bacterial cultures beneficial for the gut.
â­ Nucleotides: important organic molecules to support immunity.

#Similac #BabyFormula #SimilacGold #KidNutrition #ChildrensHealth #BabyGrowth #FormulaMilk #SaudiArabia #SaudiMoms #ToddlerNutrition

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¬ÙˆÙ„Ø¯ 1 Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø­Ø¯ÙŠØ«ÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ø¯Ø© 400 Ø¬Ø±Ø§Ù…
description_en:
Discover **Similac Gold 1**, the advanced formula meticulously developed to support your baby's healthy growth from birth to 6 months. **Similac Gold 1** is enriched with 2'-FL HMO, a natural ingredient found in breast milk to boost immunity, along with DHA, ARA, Lutein, and Natural Vitamin E for cognitive and visual development. Our unique fat blend, free from palm olein oil, aids calcium absorption for stronger bones, complemented by Prebiotics and Nucleotides for digestive and immune support.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 1**:

Thoroughly wash the feeding bottle and all utensils and boil them for five minutes. Boil water for five minutes and let it cool. Pour the correct amount of lukewarm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle. Fill the enclosed scoop with powder and level it. Add one level scoop of powder to every 60 ml of water. Mix until completely dissolved. Test the temperature before feeding. Discard any leftover formula within one hour of starting the feed. Additional feeds can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 1**:

*   2'-FL HMO (for immune support)
*   DHA & ARA (for cognitive and visual development)
*   Lutein and Natural Vitamin E
*   Omega 3 & 6
*   Taurine, Choline, Zinc, and Iron
*   Palm Olein-Free Fat Blend (for better calcium absorption)
*   Prebiotics and Nucleotides

#SimilacGold #InfantFormula #BabyNutrition #BabyCare #ImmuneSupport #HealthyGrowth #BabyHealth #Newborn #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Introducing **Similac Max Pro**, an advanced formula designed to support your baby's healthy growth from 12 to 36 months. This unique formula is 98% lactose-free and based on partially hydrolyzed cow's milk protein, making it an excellent choice for infants with lactose intolerance or digestive issues. Enriched with HMO, Prebiotics, Probiotics, and nucleotides, **Similac Max Pro** helps promote gut health and strengthen immunity.

â­ 98% Lactose-free formula for improved digestive comfort.
â­ Based on partially hydrolyzed cow's milk protein for easier digestion.
â­ Contains HMO, Prebiotics, Probiotics, and nucleotides to support digestive and immune health.
â­ Suitable for infants experiencing gastrointestinal issues such as spit-up, gas, bloating, colic, or diarrhea.
â­ Nutritionally complete, can be a replacement for regular formula as recommended by a doctor for sensitive tummies.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Max Pro**:
â­ Follow your doctor's instructions for preparing and feeding the formula.
â­ Never use the microwave to prepare or warm the formula.
â­ Use prepared formula within 1 hour.
â­ Store unopened tin in normal room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C).
â­ Use open tin contents within 3 weeks.
â­ Proper hygiene, handling, and storage are important when preparing infant formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Max Pro**:
â­ Contains HMO (Human Milk Oligosaccharide).
â­ Features Omega-3 Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) and Omega-6 Arachidonic Acid (AA) essential for brain and eye development.
â­ Enriched with Fructo-oligosaccharide (FOS), amino acids, and nucleotides.
â­ Contains Probiotics (Bifidobacterium lactis) to support gut health.
â­ Free from Palm Olein Oil.
â­ Fortified with Lutein, Iron, Choline, Taurine, and Zinc for comprehensive growth.

description_en:
Introducing **Similac Gold 1**, an advanced infant formula meticulously designed to support the healthy growth and comprehensive development of your baby from birth to 6 months. It's the first step towards building a strong foundation for your baby's bright future, with carefully selected ingredients to boost immunity and promote cognitive and visual development.

â­ **Similac Gold 1** is the ideal choice for your baby's nutrition.
â­ Supports cognitive, visual, and language development with ingredients like DHA and AA.
â­ Contains 2'-FL HMO to support your child's immune system.
â­ A unique fat blend without palm olein oil, clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.
â­ Enriched with Prebiotics and Nucleotides to promote digestive health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 1**:
â­ Thoroughly wash feeding bottle, nipple, cap, and all utensils and boil them for 5 minutes.
â­ Heat water to a rolling boil for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Fill the enclosed scoop, then scrape level with a knife.
â­ Add one level scoop of powder to each 60 ml of water in the bottle.
â­ Mix until completely dissolved. Test the temperature and feed.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm the formula.
â­ After opening the tin, use contents within three weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 1**:
â­ 2'-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, to support your childâ€™s immune system.
â­ DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, omega 3 & 6, taurine, choline, zinc, and iron, which are key building blocks for mental, visual, and language development.
â­ A unique fat blend without palm olein oil, clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.
â­ Prebiotics and Nucleotides.

description_en:
Discover the perfect nutrition for your child with **Similac Gold (3)**, the advanced milk formula specifically designed for children aged 1 to 3 years. **Similac Gold (3)** promotes healthy growth and overall development for your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold (3)**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before starting.
â­ Wash feeding bottles and utensils and boil for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool slightly.
â­ Pour the correct amount of lukewarm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Use the enclosed scoop, filling it with powder and leveling it.
â­ Add one level scoop of powder to each 60 mL of water.
â­ Mix well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the milk's temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Discard any leftover formula immediately after feeding.
â­ Additional feedings can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold (3)**:
â­ Contains 2'-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, to support your childâ€™s immune system.
â­ Enriched with DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, Omega 3 & 6, Taurine, Choline, Zinc, and Iron, key building blocks for mental, visual, and language development.
â­ Features a unique fat blend without palm olein oil, clinically proven to support calcium absorption for stronger bones.
â­ Includes Prebiotics and Nucleotides to promote a healthy digestive and immune system.

#Similac #BabyMilk #BabyNutrition #HealthyFood #ChildGrowth #Kids #BabyHealth #InfantFormula #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Discover **Similac Gold 2**, the advanced formula meticulously developed to support your baby's growth from 6 to 12 months. **Similac Gold 2** is designed to meet the increasing nutritional needs during this crucial stage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Gold 2**:
â­ Thoroughly wash feeding bottle, nipple, cap and all utensils. Boil them for 5 minutes.
â­ In a separate pan, heat water to a rolling boil for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Fill enclosed scoop, then scrape level with the straight edge of a knife.
â­ Add one level scoop of powder to each 60 ml of water.
â­ Mix until completely dissolved.
â­ Test temperature and feed formula within one hour.
â­ Discard unused formula within one hour.
â­ Store unopened tin at room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C).
â­ After opening, use contents within three weeks.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Gold 2**:
â­ Contains 2-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, to support your childâ€™s immune system.
â­ Enriched with DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, omega 3 & 6, taurine, choline, Zinc, and iron, key building blocks for mental, visual, language, and physical development.
â­ Features a unique fat blend without palm olein oil â€“ clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.
â­ Includes Prebiotics and Nucleotides.

description_en:
Introducing **Similac Max Pro (1)**, the specially formulated infant milk designed to support your baby's healthy growth from birth to 6 months. This innovative formula is 98% lactose-free and based on partially hydrolyzed cow's milk protein, making it an ideal choice for infants with lactose intolerance or gastrointestinal issues such as spit-up, gas, bloating, colic, or diarrhea. 

 **Similac Max Pro (1)** is enriched with essential nutrients to support your baby's development. 

 ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Max Pro (1)**:
â­ Prepare and feed as directed by your doctor.
â­ Never use a microwave to prepare or warm the formula.
â­ Store unopened tin at normal room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C) away from direct sunlight.
â­ Use open tin contents within 3 weeks.
â­ Proper hygiene, handling, and storage are important for your baby's safety.

 ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Max Pro (1)**:
â­ Contains Human Milk Oligosaccharides (HMO).
â­ Rich in Omega-3 (DHA) and Omega-6 (AA) for brain and eye development.
â­ Contains Prebiotics (FOS) and Probiotics (Bifidobacterium lactis) for digestive health.
â­ Fortified with nucleotides, amino acids, Lutein, Iron, Choline, Taurine, and Zinc.
â­ Palm Olein Oil-free fat blend.
â­ 98% Lactose-free.

 #Similac #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #MaxPro #Babies #Infants #BabyHealth #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Introducing **Similac Max Pro (2)**, the innovative formula specially designed for your baby's digestive comfort. This formula is 98% lactose-free and based on partially hydrolyzed cow's milk protein, making it an ideal choice for infants experiencing lactose intolerance or gastrointestinal issues such as spit-up, gas, bloating, colic, or diarrhea. **Similac Max Pro (2)** is fortified with essential nutrients for your baby's health and development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Max Pro (2)**:
â­ Recommended by doctors for lactose intolerance and gastrointestinal disturbances.
â­ A suitable alternative for regular formulas in cases of spit-up, gas, bloating, colic, or diarrhea.
â­ Use under medical supervision.
â­ Store unopened tin at normal room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C).
â­ Use contents of an opened tin within 3 weeks.
â­ Proper hygiene, handling, and storage are crucial when preparing formula.
â­ Never use a microwave to prepare or warm the formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Max Pro (2)**:
â­ Contains HMO (Human Milk Oligosaccharides) for immune support.
â­ Contains Omega-3 Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) and Omega-6 Arachidonic Acid (AA) to support brain and eye development.
â­ Contains Prebiotics (Fructo-oligosaccharide - FOS) and Probiotics (Bifidobacterium lactis) to support digestive health.
â­ Contains Nucleotides to support the immune system.
â­ Unique fat blend free from Palm Olein Oil.
â­ Contains Lutein, Iron, Choline, Taurine, and Zinc for overall growth support.

#Similac #BabyFormula #MaxPro #DigestiveComfort #BabyEssentials #InfantNutrition #BabyHealth #LactoseFree #SaudiArabia #SaudiMoms

description_en:
Discover optimal comfort and growth for your baby with **Similac Max Pro (2)**, the innovative formula specially designed to meet the needs of infants aged 6 to 12 months. **Similac Max Pro (2)** has been developed with utmost care to provide complete nutrition that supports healthy digestion and contributes to building a strong immune system. This 98% lactose-free formula is based on partially hydrolyzed cow's milk protein, making it an ideal choice for infants experiencing lactose intolerance or gastrointestinal issues such as gas, bloating, colic, diarrhea, or spit-up. With its inclusion of HMO, Prebiotics, Probiotics, and nucleotides, **Similac Max Pro (2)** helps promote a healthy gut environment and reduce the risk of infections.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Similac Max Pro (2)**:
â­ Wash hands thoroughly before preparing the formula.
â­ Boil clean water and let it cool to a suitable feeding temperature.
â­ Use the enclosed scoop to measure the correct amount of formula powder.
â­ Add the powder to the prepared water and refer to the feeding guide on the can.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the milk temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Discard any leftover formula within one hour of preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Similac Max Pro (2)**:
â­ Contains HMO (2'-Fucosyllactose) to support immunity.
â­ Enriched with Prebiotics (Fructo-oligosaccharide - FOS) to support digestive health.
â­ Fortified with Probiotics (Bifidobacterium lactis) to promote gut flora balance.
â­ Contains nucleotides to support immune cell development.
â­ Provides essential fatty acids like DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid) and AA (Arachidonic Acid) for brain and eye development.
â­ Free from Palm Olein Oil.
â­ Contains Lutein for eye health support.
â­ Provides Choline, Iron, Taurine, and Zinc for overall growth and development.

#Similac #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #SimilacMaxPro #BabyHealth #Infants #Babies #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #SpecialtyFormula
