title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ 229 - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ
description_en:
Define your lips with precision and allure using the **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 229 - Pink**. This exceptional lipliner is designed to be non-greasy, sweat, and humidity-resistant, ensuring a smooth application and long-lasting hold. Its advanced polymer formulation creates strong, water-resistant films that endure for hours. The moisture-proof formula also serves as the perfect base for your lipstick, preventing it from smudging or bleeding into fine lines, even in warm weather. Choose your preferred shade from the **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 229 - Pink** and beautify your lips for a captivating look.

Features:
â­ Provides long-lasting lip makeup.
â­ Water and sweat resistant.
â­ Smooth texture that dries quickly.
â­ Available in various colors to complement all your looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 229 - Pink**:
â­ Begin by applying a base coat of hydrating lip balm to lock in moisture and create a plumper appearance.
â­ Avoid using a highly sharpened tip of the lip liner; a slightly blunt tip results in more natural-looking outlines.
â­ Sketch the outline of your lips with swift, continuous movements to create a perfect shape.
â­ After outlining, apply your favorite shade of lipstick or lip gloss to complete your look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 229 - Pink**:
â­ Water-resistant polymer formula.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients for lip protection.
â­ High-quality colorants.
â­ Fixing ingredients for long-lasting wear.

#Flormar #Lipliner #LipMakeup #DefinedLips #Lipstick #Makeup #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

Achieve perfectly defined lips with the Flormar Waterproof Lip Liner. Its innovative formula, enriched with special polymers, provides precise definition and extends the wear of your lipstick by preventing bleeding and smudging. Resistant to humidity and sweat, the **Flormar Waterproof Lip Liner PCL-246 Rosebush** ensures your lip makeup stays smooth and flawless for longer. Available in a variety of shades, this lip liner is the essential base for long-lasting lip looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lip Liner PCL-246 Rosebush**

â­ Shape your lips with the lip liner before applying lipstick or lip gloss for a polished, professional finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lip Liner PCL-246 Rosebush**

â­ C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, TALC, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, SYNTHETIC JAPAN WAX, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, METHYLPARABEN, PROPYLPARABEN, BHT, MICA, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT. +/-(MAY CONTAIN): CI 77742 (MANGANESE VIOLET), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES), CI 75470 (CARMINE).

description_en:
Add a touch of natural radiance to your look with **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 040 Shimmer Pink**. This product provides a bronzer effect or different shades that harmonize with your skin tone, offering high-quality natural makeup with long-lasting results. Experience its immediate effect as soon as you apply it to the upper part of your cheeks with a brush for a bright and attractive appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 040 Shimmer Pink**:
â­ Apply on cheekbones with a blusher brush and softly blend.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 040 Shimmer Pink**:
â­ Contains a masterful blend of talc, corn starch, and ingredients that give your skin a natural color.
â­ Enriched with moisturizing ingredients ensuring skin softness during application.
â­ Offers high longevity and water resistance for a long-lasting makeup experience.
â­ Provides a naturally radiant finish suitable for all your looks.
â­ Free from parabens and harmful substances, making it safe for your skin.

description_en:
Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-239 Misty Rose provides precise definition and long-lasting wear for your lips. Its formula, enriched with special polymers, helps you shape your lips with ease, while also enhancing lipstick longevity and preventing feathering or smudging. Resistant to humidity and sweat, Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-239 ensures your lip makeup stays smooth and flawless for longer. Available in a variety of shades, it offers the perfect base for unparalleled lip makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-239 Misty Rose**:
â­ Outline your lips with the lipliner before applying lipstick or lipgloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-239 Misty Rose**:
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides, Talc, Mica, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Japan Wax, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate. +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

It enhances lipstick's longevity by preventing feathering and smudging, ensuring a smooth, flawless lip look that lasts longer. Resistant to humidity and sweat, it keeps your lip makeup looking perfect for extended periods.

â­ Available in various shades to complement every look.
â­ Provides professional lip contouring.
â­ Boosts lipstick staying power and prevents color bleeding.
â­ Waterproof, humidity, and sweat-resistant for long-lasting wear.
â­ Smooth formula glides on easily.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-237 Rosy Sand**:

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-237 Rosy Sand**:

description_en:
Enhance your manicure with Flormar Nail Enamel. The **Flormar Nail Enamel 352** offers a deep, alluring red shade with an ultra-glossy finish, perfect for all skin tones and special occasions. Its quick-dry formula provides long-lasting, chip-resistant wear, complemented by a professional brush for flawless, one-stroke coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 352**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin coat and let it dry for 5 minutes.
â­ For a richer color payoff, apply a second layer as desired.
â­ Use nail polish remover to clean the edges for a neat finish.
â­ Apply a top coat for enhanced shine and longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 352**:
â­ Rich and vibrant pigments for nail protection.
â­ Quick-dry formula for lasting shine.
â­ Chip-resistant with long-wear feature.
â­ Flat and sturdy applicator brush for full coverage.
â­ Attractive 11 ml compact bottle.
â­ Not tested on animals.

title_en: Flormar Matte Waterproof Dipliner - Black
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¯ÙŠØ¨ Ù„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠ Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Discover precision and allure with **Flormar Matte Waterproof Dipliner - Black**, the perfect eyeliner for a captivating eye look that lasts. It delivers an inky-dark line with a matte finish, thanks to its waterproof formula that ensures superior all-day wear without smudging.

Its fine, precise brush is easy to use, allowing you to draw smooth eyeliner lines, sharp wings, or even bold, eye-catching looks to shine on every occasion.

â­ Waterproof for long-lasting wear.
â­ Matte, attractive finish.
â­ Precise brush for easy application and professional line drawing.
â­ Does not smudge or clump on eyelids.
â­ Enhances your eyes' beauty and gives you a complete look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Matte Waterproof Dipliner - Black**:
â­ Start from the center of the eye above your upper lashes and trace along the upper lash line.
â­ Move the brush towards the outer edge of your lash line for a fluid line.
â­ For an even line, keep your hand steady.
â­ Fill in any gaps to ensure a flawless line.
â­ Draw small strokes and close the gaps for a professional result.
â­ Repeat the same steps for the other eye.
â­ Dries in one minute to give you a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Matte Waterproof Dipliner - Black**:
â­ High-precision liquid formula.
â­ Rich black pigments for intense color.
â­ Waterproof ingredients for long-lasting hold.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients to prevent smudging.

#Flormar #BlackEyeliner #EyeMakeup #Waterproof #Matte #Beauty #Eyeshadow #SaudiDeals #Bride #Cosmetics

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel 502 - Light Pink
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 502 - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­
description_en:
Discover elegance and sophistication with **Flormar Nail Enamel 502 - Light Pink**. This exquisite polish offers a classic light pink shade that imparts a chic touch to your nails, perfect for every occasion. It features an easy-to-apply formula that provides a captivating, long-lasting shine, complemented by a wide applicator brush ensuring even color distribution without clumping. **Flormar Nail Enamel 502 - Light Pink** is crafted with high-quality ingredients, guaranteeing quick drying and a flawless finish even with a single coat. It is also non-toxic and cruelty-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 502 - Light Pink**:
â­ Prepare your nails by cleaning and thoroughly drying them.
â­ Apply one thin coat of the polish to the entire nail using the wide brush.
â­ For a richer color and added shine, you can apply a second thin coat after the first has dried for a few seconds.
â­ To maintain the gloss and prevent chipping, apply a top coat after the color has completely dried.
â­ It applies quickly and dries within seconds, giving you a flawless, glossy look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 502 - Light Pink**:
â­ Special formula that gives nails exceptional shine.
â­ Contributes to maintaining the natural moisture of the nails.
â­ Thick texture ensures perfect coverage from the first coat.
â­ Quick drying for convenience and ease of use.
â­ Enables safe nail growth due to oxygen and water vapor permeability.
â­ Rich pigment ensures long-lasting color.
â­ Non-toxic and cruelty-free.
â­ Holds international quality certifications.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 406 - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø¯Ø§ÙƒÙ† - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† ÙˆÙ‚ÙˆØ© ØªØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover the allure of dark red with **Flormar Nail Enamel 406**, a classic shade that complements all skin tones. This nail enamel features an advanced formula for quick-drying, long-lasting wear with an ultra-glossy finish. The carefully designed applicator brush ensures perfect, one-stroke coverage for a dramatic and captivating look. **Flormar Nail Enamel 406** strengthens and protects your nails from chipping, while maintaining their hydration. Achieve healthy, beautiful nails with its rich, vibrant pigments. ğŸ’…

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 406**
â­ File your nails to your desired shape.
â­ Wash and thoroughly dry your hands, then moisturize and wipe off excess moisturizer from nails.
â­ Gently push back cuticles and wipe nails with a damp cotton pad.
â­ Apply a base coat for long-lasting, chip-resistant wear.
â­ Allow the base coat to dry for 1-2 minutes.
â­ Shake the **Flormar Nail Enamel 406** bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin layer of enamel on nails and let it dry for 5 minutes.
â­ For a more intense color and extra shine, apply a second coat if desired.
â­ Once dry, use an acetone-dipped cotton pad to clean the nail edges.
â­ Apply a top coat to enhance glossiness and extend wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 406**
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Toluene
â­ Xylene
â­ Formaldehyde
â­ Benzophenone-1
â­ N-Butyl Alcohol
â­ Titanium Dioxide

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 385 - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ù…Ø®Ù…Ù„ÙŠ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Discover your feminine charm with **Flormar Nail Enamel 385**, featuring a stunning Red Velvet-Bright Color.

Flormar is dedicated to customer satisfaction and delivering high-quality products. With a vision to be a leading innovative beauty brand for powerful women, Flormar offers a comprehensive range of makeup and skincare. This cruelty-free brand ensures its products are never tested on animals. **Flormar Nail Enamel 385** is crafted for women who create magic.

â­ The product is designed for women.
â­ The nail enamel contains a single, rich color.
â­ It's perfect for setting a standard with your most elegant nails.
â­ **Flormar Nail Enamel 385** offers a high-tone, impactful finish.
â­ Achieve an elegant and bright finish on your nails.
â­ Highly feasible and functions beautifully for women.
â­ This versatile color shade is suitable for all skin tones.
â­ The colors possess a deep-rooted, captivating effect.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 385**:
â­ Remove old nail polish using a cotton pad.
â­ File your nails to your desired shape and length.
â­ Apply moisturizer or petroleum jelly to your hands to counteract dryness from nail polish remover.
â­ Apply a base coat (nail hardener) to keep your nails healthy and strong.
â­ Apply **Flormar Nail Enamel 385** in two coats, allowing the first coat to dry before applying the second.
â­ Immerse your nails in ice-cold water for 1-2 minutes to expedite the drying process.
â­ Finish with a top coat for added shine and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 385**:

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 506 - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹ Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ØµØ­ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Discover the shine with **Flormar Nail Enamel 506**, the enchanting pink shade that gives your nails a professional gloss and a salon-like finish right in your home. It features a rich formula that nourishes your nails, keeping them strong and healthy with a luxurious, long-lasting shine. Express yourself with **Flormar Nail Enamel** and its vibrant color range.

â­ Gives nails a glossy and beautiful look.
â­ Super enriching formulation dries within minutes, providing a gel-like finish, free from smudging.
â­ Offers a long-lasting finish with an even coating in a single stroke.
â­ Free from formaldehyde, camphor, toluene, and other harmful chemicals.
â­ High-quality, chip-resistant formula that glides on smoothly.
â­ Specially designed round-cut, fan-shaped brush for effortless, all-over coverage.
â­ Available in a variety of shades to suit every occasion and mood.
â­ Anti-allergic and suits every skin tone.
â­ Added antioxidants and vitamins keep nails hydrated and prevent yellowing.
â­ Suitable for both teens and women.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Remove old nail polish with a non-acetone remover.
â­ File and trim your nails to smooth out edges.
â­ Soak your nails in lukewarm water for a minute or two.
â­ Apply a thin layer of base coat and let it dry.
â­ Apply a second coat carefully, ensuring all edges and corners are covered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ High-quality formula for rich color and perfect coverage.
â­ Nourishing ingredients for nails.
â­ Antioxidants and vitamins for nail care.

description_en:
Achieve a captivating natural look with **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 044 Pink Bronze**. This product offers a unique bronzer effect or various shades that harmonize with your skin tone, ensuring a high-quality, natural-looking makeup that lasts. You'll instantly notice its bright and radiant effect when applied to the upper part of your cheeks with the appropriate brush.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 044 Pink Bronze**:
â­ Apply to the cheekbones using a blusher brush.
â­ Blend softly for a seamless, natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 044 Pink Bronze**:

description_en:
Achieve a captivating look with the Flormar Eyeliner Midnight Matte 01 Black. This slender, matte eyeliner allows you to create precise and striking lines, featuring a quick-drying, smudge-free formula with intense black pigment to enhance your eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eyeliner Midnight Matte 01 Black**:
â­ Draw a fine line along the lash roots, starting from the inner corner of the eye to the outer corner, for perfect definition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eyeliner Midnight Matte 01 Black**:
â­ Aqua (water), methyl propanediol, styrene/acrylates copolymer, styrene/acrylates/ammonium methacrylate copolymer, cellulose, peg-60 hydrogenated castor oil, coco-glucoside, poloxamer 407, citric acid, phenoxyethanol, potassium sorbate, phenylpropanol, sodium benzoate, caprylic glycol, sodium laureth-12 sulfate, sodium lauryl sulfate, sodium dehydrogenate, bht. +/- (may contain): ci 77266 [nano] (black 2).

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel 499 - Rich Brown Shine
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 499 - Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Achieve a professional manicure with **Flormar Nail Enamel 499** in its captivating rich brown shade and superior shine. This highly pigmented enamel complements all skin tones, offering a stunning and long-lasting glamorous look. **Flormar Nail Enamel** is a non-toxic and cruelty-free product, providing a brilliant, enduring finish that will make your nails sparkle. Enjoy beautiful, healthy-looking nails with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before application for even color distribution.
â­ Apply your favorite base coat for nail protection.
â­ Apply two coats of **Flormar Nail Enamel** for the perfect opaque color, or one coat for a lighter finish.
â­ Finish with a top coat for enhanced shine and longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Non-toxic and cruelty-free formula.
â­ High-quality pigments for rich, vibrant color payoff.
â­ Shine-enhancing ingredients for exceptional nail brilliance.
â­ Quick-drying components for time-saving application.

#Flormar #NailEnamel #NailPolish #BrownNails #NailGoals #Manicure #BeautySaudi #KSAFashion #NailCare #GlossyNails

title_en: Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil - Black
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ÙƒØ­Ù„ Ø§Ù„ØªØ±Ø§ - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Tired of shaky hands and complicated liquid eyeliner application? The **Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil** helps you define your eyes with subtle precision, thanks to its user-friendly pencil form. Enriched with Vitamins E and C, and Jojoba Oil, this unique formula locks in moisture and nourishes your skin from within. It also helps prevent early signs of aging and is suitable for all skin types, from dry to oily. Its polymer-based, waterproof formula ensures long-lasting wear without smudging or fading.

â­ Easy to Use: Offers effortless application for thin, thick, or bold lines.
â­ Perfect Control: Allows close application to waterlines and lash lines for precise drawing.
â­ High-Impact Color: Adds depth and an eye-catching effect to your eyes, perfect for everyday and dramatic looks.
â­ Smudge-Proof & Fade-Proof: Long-lasting, waterproof, and tear-proof to keep your look flawless.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ Sharpen the eyeliner pencil for a more defined line and to remove any surface bacteria.
â­ Gently draw a thin line along the upper lash line from the inner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Repeat on the lower eyelid and connect the lines at the outer corner for a natural look.
â­ For a dramatic look, draw a line at a 45-degree angle from the outer corner of your eye and extend upwards.
â­ Ensure the lines on both eyes are symmetrical.
â­ Finish with eyeshadow and mascara for a perfect result.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E.
â­ Contains Vitamin C.
â­ Infused with Jojoba Oil.
â­ Polymer-based formula for long-lasting hold.

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel 311 - Bright Scarlet Purple
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 311 - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ù‚Ø±Ù…Ø²ÙŠ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Elevate your style with **Flormar Nail Enamel** in shade 311, a mesmerizing bright scarlet purple that adds a touch of captivating glamour to your nails. Experience a formula that's easy to apply, quick to dry, and long-lasting, ensuring a flawless look for hours. Its balanced consistency and precision brush glide smoothly for an even, streak-free finish. More than just color, this nail enamel is a statement of your radiant femininity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:

â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a base coat for extended durability.
â­ Dip the brush into the enamel to create a thin layer.
â­ Swipe the nail with three clean strokes, avoiding the edges and surrounding skin.
â­ One coat is sufficient, but a second can be added for deeper color intensity.
â­ Wait 5 minutes for the polish to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:

â­ Long-lasting and quick-drying formula.
â­ Gel-like texture for a thicker single coat.
â­ High-quality, easy-to-use applicator brush.
â­ Beautiful, seductive bright scarlet purple shade.
â­ Not tested on animals.

description_en:
Discover the allure of your lips with **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 12 - Orange**. This captivating orange shade embodies a chic autumn vibe, perfect for your daily wear if you prefer a sophisticated matte finish without any shine. The **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick** comes in an elegant, compact glass case, making it a stylish and convenient addition to your makeup bag.

It boasts exceptionally high pigmentation, delivering rich color payoff with a single stroke. The specially designed, high-quality brush is durable, ensuring a smooth, streak-free application. Enriched with moisturizing oils, it protects your lips from dryness, providing deep hydration and a plump, attractive look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ Prepare your lips with a lip balm or primer if needed.
â­ Outline the outer edge of your lips clearly using the brush.
â­ Fill the inner part of your lips with short, even strokes.
â­ For fuller-looking lips, you can slightly overdraw the outer line as desired.
â­ Wipe off any excess liquid on the brush with a tissue for perfect application control.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing lip oils.
â­ Long-lasting matte formula.
â­ Rich, vibrant pigment.

#Flormar #FlormarLipstick #LiquidLipstick #MatteLips #LipMakeup #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #MakeupSaudi #LipCare #OrangeLips

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined brows with **Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 405**, specially formulated to define and enhance your eyebrows with rich color and a natural-looking finish. Its unique composition creates fuller arches for a complete look.

â­ Intense color formulation for perfect brow definition.
â­ Provides a natural-looking coverage with precise application.
â­ Nourishes and moisturizes the skin thanks to natural vegetable oils.
â­ Blends easily with the skin, filling in any gaps.
â­ Compact and pocket-friendly size, perfect for on-the-go.
â­ Equipped with a built-in brush for seamless blending and application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 405**:
â­ Use the attached soft brush to sketch the shape of your brows, working in an upward and outward direction.
â­ Utilize the sharpened tip to add gentle, light strokes to fill in sparse areas.
â­ Follow your natural brow shape and fill any gaps with feathery strokes.
â­ Blend the color with the brush and comb again for a natural and attractive finish.
â­ Choose a shade that complements your hair color and skin tone for the best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 405**:
â­ Natural vegetable oils to moisturize the skin and protect against early aging signs.
â­ Formula free from harmful substances to ensure eye safety.

#Flormar #EyebrowPencil #EyeMakeup #NaturalBrows #BrowDefinition #SaudiMakeup #BeautyBlogger #Cosmetics #SaudiOffers #Beauty

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-234 Vanilla**. Its formula, enriched with special polymers, easily shapes your lips and adds a professional finish. The **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-234 Vanilla** enhances lipstick longevity by preventing feathering and smudging, ensuring your lips look smooth and attractive for longer, while resisting humidity and sweat. Available in various shades to complement any look, it serves as the ideal base for long-lasting lip makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-234 Vanilla**:
â­ Precisely line your lips with the liner before applying lipstick or lip gloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-234 Vanilla**:
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides, Talc, Mica, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Japan Wax, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

description_en:
Discover timeless brilliance with **Flormar Nail Enamel 490**, a legendary, easy-to-apply polish that gives your nails a classic touch. Available in an 11 ml bottle, this enamel boasts a special formula that provides extra, long-lasting shine â€“ a hallmark of all **Flormar Nail Enamel** varieties. Say goodbye to chipping, as its advanced formula ensures color integrity for days. With its rich, opaque shade, you might only need one coat for perfect coverage. The enamel glides on smoothly and dries quickly, making it ideal for all nail types. Choose from a wide array of colors to suit your mood and occasion, from bold to subtle, you'll be spoilt for choice.

â­ A fun color for both toes and fingernails.
â­ Fast-drying, chip-resistant, and glossy finish.
â­ Compact shape for easy portability in your handbag.
â­ Highly pigmented formula for clear luster.
â­ Protects nails by creating a thin film.
â­ Dries in under 10 minutes, offering freedom from smudges.
â­ Lasts from 3 to 7 days.
â­ Brush provides even coverage in a single stroke.
â­ Flormar Nail Enamels are sold after ISO quality certifications.
â­ Gives a smooth, perfect finish at affordable prices.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Clean nails thoroughly before application.
â­ Use three strokes for coverage: base, left, right, and center.
â­ Always apply a base coat to extend color longevity.
â­ Apply a top coat to lock in polish and prevent chips.
â­ Clean nail edges after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Quick-dry formula.
â­ High-quality pigments.
â­ Long-lasting shine.
â­ Safe and non-toxic ingredients.

description_en:
Achieve flawless makeup that lasts all day with the **Flormar All Day Fix Matte Setting Spray**. This revolutionary spray ensures your makeup stays locked in place, delivering a perfect matte finish that controls unwanted shine and oil. Its lightweight formula leaves your skin feeling refreshed and hydrated without any sticky residue, making it an essential addition to your beauty routine.

â­ Long-lasting makeup hold.
â­ Provides a natural matte finish.
â­ Effectively controls shine and oil production.
â­ Lightweight and non-sticky formula.
â­ Keeps skin feeling refreshed and hydrated.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar All Day Fix Matte Setting Spray**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Hold the bottle at arm's length from your face.
â­ Spray evenly over your entire face with eyes closed.
â­ Allow it to dry naturally.
â­ Use after applying makeup to set it in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar All Day Fix Matte Setting Spray**:
â­ Gentle formula suitable for all skin types.
â­ Hydrating ingredients to keep skin refreshed.
â­ Setting agents to combat shine and oil.

description_en:
Define your lips flawlessly with **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner** in shade Nut Cookie PCL-236. This innovative pencil, formulated with special polymers, allows for easy lip shaping and adds definition. It also enhances lipstick's longevity by preventing bleeding and smudging, keeping your lip makeup smooth and impeccable for longer. Resistant to humidity and sweat, **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner** provides the perfect base for a long-lasting lip look and is available in various colors to suit every style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner**
â­ Outline your lips precisely with the lipliner before applying lipstick or lipgloss for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner**
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides, Talc, Mica, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Japan Wax, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate. +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

description_en:
Unleash the power of your lashes with **Flormar Mascara Hero Volume** & Curl, the revolutionary mascara designed to deliver intense volume and a dramatic curl. Elevate your look with this expertly formulated mascara that ensures a smooth, clump-free application, defining each lash for a captivating and long-lasting effect. Experience the transformation to fuller, more voluminous lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Mascara Hero Volume**:
â­ Apply the mascara from the root to the tip of your lower lashes.
â­ Use zig-zag motions to build maximum volume and curl.
â­ Reapply as needed to achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Mascara Hero Volume**:
â­ Formula enriched for volume and curl.
â­ Cotton seed oil for lash nourishment.
â­ Hoya Lacunosa flower extract for lash enhancement.
â­ Vitamin E and Vitamin C for antioxidant benefits.

#Flormar #Mascara #Lashes #EyeMakeup #VolumeLashes #CurlLashes #SaudiMakeup #OnlineShopping #Beauty #LashGoals

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel 313 - Chic Black
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 313 - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø£Ù†ÙŠÙ‚
description_en:
Give your nails a glamorous makeover with **Flormar Nail Enamel**. Nail Polish shades can be a reflection of your emotions, the occasion, or a statement about your personality overall. Expose your hidden creativity and complete your look with the perfect shade of nails from **Flormar**. The formula is consistently creamy, quick-drying, and has long durability. Coating your nails with this will bring out your quirky side and leave you feeling stylish and chic. **Flormar Nail Enamel** will give your nails the silky elegance you crave. Shade 313 is called Black Minimalism Bright, the classic black that goes well with practically everything be it for a peppy daytime outfit, a grunge look, or even a glamorous, sultry evening outfit.

â­ The polish is long-lasting and quick drying.
â­ The applicator quality is very good and glides beautifully.
â­ The enamel is easy to remove.
â­ The 313 beautiful black shade is suitable for all skin types.
â­ The texture is gel-like and not watery, therefore a single coating is thick and not streaky.
â­ It provides an even finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**
â­ Shake the bottle well before using.
â­ Dip your nail polish brush in the nail enamel bottle to create a thin layer.
â­ Swipe on the nail with three clean strokes. Avoid the outer edges and surrounding skin for a cleaner finish.
â­ Apply a single coat with its specially designed brush and let dry for about 5 minutes.
â­ A single coat is enough for long wear, but you may wear a double coat if you prefer.
â­ Voila! You are set with beautiful salon-style manicured nails for a week!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**
â­ (Please refer to the product packaging for a complete list of ingredients)

description_en:
Discover an unparalleled natural radiance with **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-106 Rosewood**. This luxurious pressed powder is expertly formulated to mimic the natural flush of your face, brightening your complexion and making it appear fresher and more vibrant. **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-106 Rosewood** is a pressed powder blush that mimics the natural flush of the face, brightens and makes the complexion look fresher and more vibrant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-106 Rosewood**:
â­ Apply the desired amount onto the cheekbones using a blusher brush.
â­ Blend softly for a natural and seamless color transition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-106 Rosewood**:
â­ High-quality pressed powder for a natural color payoff.
â­ Lightweight formula that blends seamlessly with the skin.
â­ Provides a healthy and radiant appearance.
â­ Perfect for daily wear and special occasions.
â­ Available in various shades to suit all skin tones.

description_en:
Achieve long-lasting makeup perfection with **Flormar All Day Fix Setting Spray**. This setting spray offers a semi-matte finish, giving your skin a natural and refreshed look. Its unique formula is enriched with chamomile extract and bisabolol, providing hydration and nourishment to your skin without feeling heavy. Ideal for combination skin, **Flormar All Day Fix Setting Spray** ensures your makeup stays in place for hours, protecting it while keeping your skin vibrant. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar All Day Fix Setting Spray**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Spray evenly over your entire face from an appropriate distance after completing your makeup.
â­ Allow it to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar All Day Fix Setting Spray**:
â­ Chamomile Extract
â­ Bisabolol
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin
â­ Panthenol
â­ Light Fragrance

#Flormar #SettingSpray #LongLastingMakeup #NaturalFinish #CombinationSkin #Skincare #Cosmetics #Beauty #SaudiArabia #RiyadhMakeup

title_en: Flormar Ultra Thin Eyeliner Black - Precise Definition for Mesmerizing Eyes
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø§Ù„ØªØ±Ø§ Ø§ÙŠÙ„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ - ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø¯Ù‚ÙŠÙ‚ Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ø³Ø§Ø­Ø±Ø©
description_en:
Introducing the **Flormar Ultra Thin Eyeliner Black**, your ultimate tool for achieving any eye makeup look you desire. Its highly pigmented formula and exceptionally thin felt brush empower you to create flawless lines with unparalleled precision. Say goodbye to smudging and constant touch-ups; the **Flormar Ultra Thin Eyeliner Black** is quick-drying, smudge-proof, and water-resistant, ensuring long-lasting wear for a defined and stunning eye look throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Ultra Thin Eyeliner Black**:
â­ Start from the inner corner of your eye.
â­ Draw a thin line along the lash roots towards the outer corner.
â­ Gradually thicken the line for a different look.
â­ For a precise wing, extend the line slightly past the outer corner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Ultra Thin Eyeliner Black**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer
â­ PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Coco-Glucoside
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate
â­ Ammonium Hydroxide
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2)

#Flormar #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #Beauty #MakeupSaudi #KSA #SaudiBeauty #Jeddah #Riyadh #Cosmetics

title_en: Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Barbie JL52 - Ultra Gel Shine
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø¬ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙƒ JL52 Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ø¨ÙŠ - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ø¬Ù„ ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚
description_en:
Achieve a professional gel manicure look with Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Barbie JL52. Experience the gel manicure effect without the need for LED light, as this enamel adds ultra shimmer and intense color to your nails. It features a specially designed brush for easier application, ensuring perfect coverage from the first coat. For the ultimate finish and amplified shine and volume, we recommend applying two coats of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Barbie JL52**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Barbie JL52**
â­ The application especially in two coats enables a fantastic gloss and volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Barbie JL52**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). [0414072.03]

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© Ùˆ Ù…Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© W08 - Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
Discover your skin's perfection with **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W08- Beige**, the essential powder for a radiant daily look. As one of the largest cosmetic brands, Flormar offers you this advanced powder that provides your skin with a flawless appearance and a soft, clear radiance. Its special long-lasting, oil-free formula helps you control shine and effectively hide imperfections. Whether used dry for a smooth, matte finish or damp for stronger coverage, this powder delivers a naturally perfect look.

â­ Delivers a smooth and matte finish for even-toned skin.
â­ Enriched with natural ingredients that deeply hydrate the skin, restoring its natural radiance.
â­ Blends seamlessly with the skin without looking cakey.
â­ Keeps skin oil-free and prevents dryness, providing a natural look.
â­ Available in five natural-toned shades, making it ideal for all skin types.
â­ Can be used dry or wet to suit your makeup needs.
â­ Comes in an easy-to-carry matte black compact with a soft sponge and attached mirror.
â­ Lightweight and perfect for everyday use.
â­ Effectively conceals dark spots, acne, and any blemishes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W08- Beige**:
â­ Use the dry sponge for a smooth powder finish.
â­ Softly dab the compact over the face and neck so the skin appears healthy and well-toned.
â­ Dampen the sponge applicator for a strong base application.
â­ Start applying the powder from the center of your face, gently moving towards the outer edges.
â­ After use, wash and rinse the sponge thoroughly.
â­ Ensure the sponge is clean and dry before placing it back in your package.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W08- Beige**:
â­ Oil-free formula for a shine-free complexion.
â­ Natural ingredients for deep skin hydration.
â­ Talc for a smooth, velvety application.
â­ Mineral pigments for natural, even-toned skin.
â­ Vitamin E to help protect the skin from external factors.

#Flormar #CompactPowder #Makeup #Beauty #Skincare #FlawlessSkin #BeautyTips #SaudiBeauty #MakeupAddict #FlormarMakeup

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙØ© 001 - Ø¥Ø´Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Achieve a natural radiance with **Flormar Invisible Loose Powder 001**. Discover the world of beauty with Flormar, a leading cosmetics brand offering high-quality, world-class products. This loose powder is an essential for your daily makeup, giving your skin a perfect look with a soft and clear radiance. Its special long-lasting, oil-free formula is designed to control skin shine and hide imperfections, providing you with a natural and flawless appearance. Perfect for everyday use, it offers lightweight coverage with a smooth, matte finish. The compact comes with a soft sponge and a built-in mirror for easy on-the-go application.

**Product Features:**
â­ Provides a smooth, matte finish for even-toned skin.
â­ Deeply hydrates the skin to restore natural radiance with its natural ingredients.
â­ Blends seamlessly with the skin without looking cakey.
â­ Keeps skin oil-free and prevents dryness, delivering a natural look.
â­ Available in natural shades suitable for all skin types.
â­ Can be used dry or wet for different effects.
â­ Features a sleek black matte finish box that's easy to carry and use, complete with a sponge and mirror.
â­ Effortlessly conceals dark spots, acne, and any blemishes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Invisible Loose Powder 001**:
â­ Use the dry sponge for a smooth, matte powder finish.
â­ Gently dab the compact over your face and neck to even out skin tone.
â­ Dampen the sponge applicator for a stronger base and longer-lasting makeup hold.
â­ Start applying the powder from the center of your face, blending outwards towards the edges.
â­ After use, wash and rinse the sponge gently.
â­ Ensure the sponge is clean and dry before placing it back into the compact.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Invisible Loose Powder 001**:
â­ Natural moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Oil-free formula.
â­ Safe mineral pigments.

title_en: Flormar Blush-On Cbl-105 Matte Rose - Fresh & Vibrant Complexion
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø®Ø¯ÙˆØ¯ 105 Ù…Ø§Øª Ø±ÙˆØ² - Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù†Ø¶Ø±Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ø´Ø±Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Discover the secret to a natural glow with **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-105 Matte Rose**. This pressed powder blush is designed to mimic the natural flush of the face, brightening your complexion and making it look fresher and more vibrant. This soft blush glides onto your skin, providing a radiant, long-lasting touch of color that enhances your natural beauty with an elegant finish. Enjoy a fresh and luminous look every time you use **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-105 Matte Rose**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-105 Matte Rose**
â­ Apply the blush to your cheekbones using a dedicated blusher brush.
â­ Gently blend the color for a natural and even look.
â­ Add more layers as desired to increase color intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-105 Matte Rose**
â­ Talc, Mica, Boron Nitride, Lauroyl Lysine, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Cellulose, Magnesium Stearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Isostearyl Isostearate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Diisostearyl Malate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tin Oxide, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Palmitic Acid, Benzoic Acid.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 12085 (Red 36), Ci 75470 (Carmine). [31000006a.00]

shortdescription_en: Pressed powder blush for a natural flush. Perfect for a fresh and vibrant complexion.

title_en: Flormar Triple Action Mascara - Black: Perfect Length, Curl & Volume
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù…Ø³ÙƒØ±Ø© 3 ÙÙŠ 1 - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯: Ø¥Ø·Ø§Ù„Ø©ØŒ ØªØ¬Ø¹ÙŠØ¯ØŒ ÙˆØ­Ø¬Ù… Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠ
description_en:
Looking for a single mascara that does it all? Introducing the innovative **Flormar Triple Action Mascara**, your ultimate solution for stunning lashes. This mascara offers perfect lash lengthening, curling, and volumizing in one go. Its elegant packaging with a golden casing and aesthetic black inscriptions makes it a standout piece in your makeup bag. Easily switch between the three modes by rotating the button on the lid.

**Product Features:**

â­ Elegant packaging with a golden casing featuring aesthetic black inscriptions. The case has a slim design for an easy grip and handling.
â­ Innovative design allows you to switch between the three modes by simply rotating the bottom of the lid.
â­ Features a great texture that ensures easy application without clumping.
â­ Perfectly separates lashes at every step and prevents clumping.
â­ Offers intense color thanks to advanced pigments, chemically formulated for maximum safety.
â­ Wearable for long hours without flaking or running.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Triple Action Mascara**

â­ Ensure you have adequate lighting and focus while applying.
â­ **Extended Lash Mode:** Use the brush straight. Apply at least two coats for maximum visible length.
â­ **Curling Mode:** Rotate the lid once to twist the brush bristles. Apply to the outer edges of lashes towards the tips in an upward motion to create a perfect upward curl.
â­ **Extra Volume Mode:** Rotate the lid again for thicker, fuller eyelashes for a dazzling look!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Triple Action Mascara**

â­ Formula includes advanced pigments and polymers to bind and hold lashes.
â­ Creamy texture for smooth application.
â­ [Specific active ingredients to be added as needed]

description_en:
Achieve perfect precision with **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-242 Deep Bordx**. This defining pencil empowers you to shape your lips effortlessly, thanks to its unique formula infused with special polymers. It not only adds definition but also enhances your lipstick's staying power by preventing bleeding into fine lines and smudging. Resistant to humidity and sweat, **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-242 Deep Bordx** ensures your lip makeup looks smooth and captivating for longer. It's the ideal base for a long-lasting lip look, available in various shades to complement your different styles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-242 Deep Bordx**:
â­ Outline the lips with the lip liner before applying lipstick or lipgloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-242 Deep Bordx**:
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides, Talc, Mica, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Japan Wax, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

#Flormar #LipLiner #LipMakeup #Lips #Beauty #SaudiMakeup #Cosmetics #Skincare #SaudiArabia #MakeupAddict

description_en:
Achieve a naturally flushed and vibrant look with **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-102 Rose Pink**. This finely pressed powder blush seamlessly blends into your skin, imparting a healthy, delicate hue that enhances your complexion. Its smooth texture mimics the natural flush of your face, brightening your skin and making it appear fresher and more alive. Perfect for adding a touch of natural color and radiance to your makeup routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-102 Rose Pink**
â­ Apply to the cheekbones using a blusher brush.
â­ Softly blend for a natural and seamless color transition.
â­ Start with a small amount and build up for desired intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-102 Rose Pink**
â­ Pressed powder formula for a smooth application.
â­ Blends effortlessly to mimic natural flush.
â­ Brightens and revitalizes the complexion.
â­ Enhances cheekbone definition.
â­ Long-lasting color payoff.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø§ÙŠÙ„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ 113 - Ø£Ø¨ÙŠØ¶
description_en:
Experience unparalleled precision with the **Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil 113 - White**. Flormar, a leading Turkish brand, offers a vast array of beauty products catering to diverse tastes. This pencil boasts a highly pigmented, waterproof, and smudge-proof formula, providing perfect definition for your eyelids, waterline, and even brows. It's ideal for creating a subtle smoky eye or accentuating your eyes with clarity. Its long-lasting wear extends up to 12 hours, enriched with Vitamin E to moisturize and protect your eyes from aging.

â­ Available in various, highly pigmented colors.
â­ Contains Vitamin E.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof.
â­ Does not fade for 12 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil 113 - White**:
â­ To line your eyelids and waterline, swipe the pencil across the desired area.
â­ Prep your eyes with moisturizer and concealer before lining.
â­ For beginners, draw using small strokes along your lashes and build thickness as needed.
â­ Always start from the inner corner and go toward the outer edge.
â­ For a winged liner look, draw a line diagonally from the tip of your wing to the middle of your upper lash line.
â­ For a smoky eye, swipe the pencil across your upper lash line and blend with a smudging brush.
â­ Finish by lining your waterlines and applying mascara.
â­ To fill in your brows, draw a defined line, concentrating on the tail end, using light upward strokes and holding the pencil sideways.
â­ Set your brows with transparent mascara or brow gel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil 113 - White**:
â­ Formula enriched with Vitamin E.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof ingredients.

#Flormar #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #Beauty #Kohl #Waterproof #SmokyEye #NaturalBeauty #SaudiShopping #FlormarSaudi

description_en:
Elevate your nail game with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC40**. This high-performance nail enamel delivers rich pigments and full coverage with just one coat, ensuring a vibrant and long-lasting shine. Achieve a flawless, eye-catching look that complements any style. **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC40** is your go-to for stunning, durable color.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC40**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails over a base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, then apply a top coat for added protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC40**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Benzophenone-1, Benzophenone-3, and more, providing a smooth application and lasting finish.

description_en:
Achieve a professional gel manicure effect without the need for an LED light with Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish. This nail enamel delivers ultra shimmer and intense color to your nails, making them look stunning and vibrant. The special brush ensures an easy and flawless application for a perfect finish every time.

â­ Glossy gel effect that lasts.
â­ Intense, rich color with a high-shine finish.
â­ Special brush for easy and precise application.
â­ Perfect for achieving a professional gel manicure at home.
â­ Gives nails a full, healthy appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Jl51 Perfect Selfie**
â­ Applying in two coats especially enables a fantastic gloss and volume, enhancing the overall look of your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Jl51 Perfect Selfie**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2).

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ùƒ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ 010 - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover the allure of perfect lips with the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 10 - Pink**. This enchanting pink shade exudes an elegant and chic vibe, making it a perfect addition for the autumn season and beyond. Its matte finish is the ideal choice for those who prefer a natural, sophisticated look without any shine. Experience the confidence and charm that the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 10 - Pink** brings to your makeup routine.

â­ The **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 10 - Pink** comes in an attractive, compact glass case, making it both elegant and convenient to carry.
â­ It offers high pigmentation, providing rich and opaque color with just a single swipe.
â­ Features a high-quality, durable applicator brush that distributes the product evenly without breaking.
â­ Enriched with advanced oils to moisturize and protect your lips from dryness, ensuring a healthy and captivating look!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 10 - Pink**
â­ Exfoliate, moisturize, and apply a lip primer if needed before application.
â­ Use the applicator to lightly trace the edges of your lips, creating an outline.
â­ Fill in the lips from the inside with short strokes, being careful not to go beyond the defined lip line.
â­ You can wipe off any excess liquid from the brush for better control and to prevent dripping.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 10 - Pink**
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing lip oils.
â­ High-quality pigments for rich, matte color.
â­ Fast-drying, long-lasting liquid formula.

#Flormar #Lipstick #Makeup #Lips #Beauty #MatteLips #LiquidLipstick #LipCare #SaudiMakeup #EverydayMakeup

description_en:
Achieve the perfect pout with **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze**, delivering a hydrating, glossy, and radiant finish that lasts. Infused with nourishing Shea Butter, it provides intense moisture for soft, plump-looking lips without any sticky residue. Elevate your look with 20 vibrant color options, available in metallic, pearlescent, and glass shine finishes!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze**
â­ Apply directly to lips.
â­ Reapply throughout the day as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze**
â­ Polybutene
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Mango Seed Butter
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Features a diverse range of natural and synthetic colorants for rich shades.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 510 - Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙŠØ¯: Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹ ÙˆØµØ­Ø© Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ±Ùƒ
description_en:
Discover the elegance of your nails with **Flormar Nail Enamel 510** in its chic nude shade. This enamel boasts a formula rich in vitamins and minerals, free from harsh chemicals, to give you healthy, glossy nails that last. Enjoy perfect coverage and a rich color in a single coat, with added protection and strength for your nails. **Flormar Nail Enamel 510** is your ultimate choice for a professional and sophisticated look on every occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 510**:
â­ Remove old nail polish using an acetone-free remover.
â­ Trim and file your nails to your desired shape.
â­ Soak your hands in warm water to soften cuticles.
â­ Apply a base coat and let it dry.
â­ Apply a thin coat of nail enamel in two strokes and let it dry.
â­ Apply a second and third coat for more depth and color.
â­ Finally, apply a last wafer-thin coat on top for a blazing shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 510**:
â­ Contains beneficial vitamins and minerals for nails.
â­ Formula free from harsh chemical substances.
â­ Organic polymers for unique color and texture.
â­ Quick-drying formula that lasts long.

Achieve a natural radiance with the **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 045 Touch Of Rose**. This high-quality baked blush-on offers a customizable bronzer effect or varying shades that complement your unique skin tone, ensuring a natural and sophisticated makeup look. The **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 045 Touch Of Rose** is your go-to for adding a healthy flush and defining your cheekbones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 045 Touch Of Rose**
â­ Apply to the cheekbones using a blusher brush.
â­ Blend softly for a natural and seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Baked Blush-On - 045 Touch Of Rose**

title_en: Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 102 - Beige
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ Ø¨ÙŠØ±ÙÙƒØª ÙƒØ§ÙØ±Ø¬ 102 - Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 102 - Beige**. This luxurious, water-based foundation boasts a velvety texture and a classic pastel shade that complements all skin types. It provides complete coverage, effectively hiding blemishes, acne scars, and imperfections, leaving your skin looking fresh and radiant for up to 12 hours.

The **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 102 - Beige** is infused with essential oils like olive oil and almond oil, delivering deep hydration and a healthier-looking complexion. Its SPF 15 formula offers essential protection against harmful UV rays, ensuring your skin is shielded throughout the day.

â­ Guarantees maximum coverage for soft, supple skin.
â­ Provides an even complexion and a luminous look.
â­ Offers 12 hours of flawless coverage.
â­ Hydrating formula keeps skin moisturized all day.
â­ Blends easily with fingers, brush, or sponge.
â­ Not tested on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 102 - Beige**
â­ Dispense a small amount of foundation onto your palm.
â­ Dot the foundation evenly across your forehead, cheeks, nose, chin, and jawline.
â­ Gently blend using your fingers, a foundation brush, or a beauty sponge for optimal coverage.
â­ For a perfect finishing touch, apply translucent powder.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 102 - Beige**
â­ Olive Oil.
â­ Almond Oil.
â­ Water-based formula.
â­ SPF 15.

#Flormar #Foundation #Makeup #HealthySkin #FullCoverage #SkinHydration #Beauty #Skincare #RiyadhMakeup #FlormarSaudi

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel 323 - Brown: Long-Lasting Glamour
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 323 - Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ: Ù„ÙˆÙ† ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover the natural beauty of your nails with **Flormar Nail Enamel 323 - Brown**. This rich and warm brown shade is the perfect finishing touch, giving your hands an elegant and attractive look for any occasion. **Flormar Nail Enamel 323 - Brown** boasts an innovative formula that ensures long-lasting, vibrant color with superior resistance to peeling, fading, and chipping. Its smooth and comfortable application, thanks to the carefully designed brush, provides full coverage in a single stroke, making it your ideal choice for stunning nails with ease.

Features:
â­ Cruelty-free product, not tested on animals.
â­ Long-lasting wear for a glamorous look for days.
â­ Rich pigmentation for excellent color payoff.
â­ Well-designed applicator for smooth application and full coverage in one stroke.
â­ Quick-dry formula for time-saving beauty.
â­ Suitable for all skin types and nails.
â­ Non-toxic and safe for nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 323 - Brown**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before application.
â­ Clean your nails and dry them up nicely.
â­ Apply a coat of your favorite shade with a straight line starting from the end to the tip, then work on the sides.
â­ Let the first coat dry completely before applying a second coat for a better result.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 323 - Brown**:
â­ (Ingredients to be listed here upon verification of the actual product ingredient list)

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù‚Ù… Ø¸Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† 004 ÙÙ„Ùˆ ÙŠÙˆØ± Ù‡ÙŠØ±Øª - Ù…ÙƒÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ
description_en:
Discover endless possibilities with the **Flormar Eye Shadow Palette 004 Follow Your Heart**! This stunning palette offers a perfect blend of pearl and semi-matte finishes, giving you vibrant colors and exceptional pigmentation for a professional and captivating eye makeup look. Thanks to its creamy texture that applies with ease, this palette allows you to freely blend and create with 10 diverse and rich colors.

â­ Compact and practical formula.
â­ Creamy texture that glides onto the skin effortlessly.
â­ Variety of shiny and matte finishes.
â­ High pigmentation for strong colors from the first application.
â­ Dust-free formula for a clean look.
â­ 10 compatible and blendable color options.
â­ Long-lasting effect for makeup that stays put for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eye Shadow Palette 004 Follow Your Heart**
â­ For ideal shadow transitions, start by applying the lightest color to the inner corners of the eyes, then use a medium color for the center of the eyelid, and the darkest color to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Blend all colors with a professional blending brush for a magical smoky effect.
â­ To deepen the look, lightly apply a dark shadow to the crease area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eye Shadow Palette 004 Follow Your Heart**
â­ High-quality ingredients to ensure the best performance.
â­ Skin-safe formula.

#Flormar #Eyeshadow #EyeMakeup #ProfessionalMakeup #EyeshadowPalette #Beauty #SaudiMakeup #FlormarMakeup #MakeupAddict #BeautyProducts

title_en: Flormar Compact Powder 88 Medium Peach Beige
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© 88 Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ ÙØ§ØªØ­
description_en:
Discover unparalleled smoothness with **Flormar Compact Powder 88 Medium Peach Beige**. Enjoy a lightweight formula that absorbs excess oil, providing a natural, matte finish that lasts. Perfect for covering blemishes and dark circles with a luminous, even tone, **Flormar Compact Powder 88 Medium Peach Beige** gives your face a vibrant and healthy look thanks to its smooth, velvety texture. Whether applied wet or dry, you'll achieve your desired perfect look while reducing skin shine. Make your skin look radiant and silky smooth with this amazing powder.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Compact Powder 88 Medium Peach Beige**

â­ Use a powder brush or applicator to sweep across the powder.
â­ Gently press the brush to remove any excess product.
â­ Apply the powder to your skin, focusing on oily areas like the T-Zone and hairline.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Compact Powder 88 Medium Peach Beige**

â­ Clay powder for enhanced radiance and silky texture.
â­ Natural ingredients for a glowing and smooth complexion.
â­ Hypoallergenic formula to prevent skin irritation and allergies.

#FlormarPowder #FlormarMakeup #PressedPowder #FaceMakeup #SaudiMakeup #ClearSkin #FullCoverage #ProfessionalMakeup #NaturalFinish #RadiantLook

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø®ÙÙŠÙØ© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ²Ù† - 07 Ø¬Ø±ÙŠØ³
description_en:
Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder in the shade-07 Grace is a revolutionary lip product that combines the comfort of a powder with the pigmentation of a lipstick. This lightweight formula provides a matte finish with intense color payoff, making your lips look bold and beautiful. The unique powder-to-cream texture ensures smooth and even application, keeping your lips soft and comfortable all day long.

Product Features:
â­ Powder-to-cream texture for unique application
â­ Intense color payoff for bold lips
â­ Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear
â­ Luxurious matte finish
â­ Smooth and even application for a flawless pout
â­ Long-lasting wear to keep your look intact

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar** Lightweight Lip Powder:
â­ Apply the lip powder directly to your lips using the applicator provided.
â­ Start from the center of your lips and move outward, ensuring even coverage.
â­ For a more intense look, apply a second layer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar** Lightweight Lip Powder:
(Product ingredients are not currently available, but rest assured about the product's quality and safety).

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø¨Ø²Ø§ÙˆÙŠØ© 04 Ø¯Ø§Ø±Ùƒ Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† - Ù„ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ ÙˆØªØ¹Ø¨Ø¦Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨
description_en:
Achieve perfect brows with the **Flormar Angled Eyebrow Pencil 04 Dark Brown**. This pencil features a soft formula and a precise angled tip that helps you easily fill in gaps and define your brows for a fuller, natural look. The included brush is perfect for grooming and blending the color for a professional finish. The **Flormar Angled Eyebrow Pencil 04 Dark Brown** comes in 4 color options to suit all eyebrow shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Angled Eyebrow Pencil 04 Dark Brown**:
â­ Using the attached brush, comb the eyebrows upward.
â­ Fill in any gaps in each eyebrow using tiny strokes that follow the direction of the hair growth.
â­ Start at the inner corner of the brow and work the way out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Angled Eyebrow Pencil 04 Dark Brown**:
â­ Hydrogenated palm oil, synthetic japan wax, hydrogenated vegetable oil, boron nitride, silica, c10-18 triglycerides, zinc stearate, tocopherol, lecithin, ascorbyl palmitate, glyceryl stearate, glyceryl oleate, citric acid. +/- (may contain): ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77492 (iron oxides), ci 77491 (iron oxides), ci 16035 (red 40), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

title_en: Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 201 - Nude
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ 201 - Ù†ÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Define your lips with precision using the Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil. This pencil delivers a flawless definition and a natural, long-lasting look. Its smooth, non-greasy formula prevents lipstick from smudging and ensures color longevity. Perfect for shaping your lips with accuracy, anytime.

â­ Provides perfect definition and a natural look for your lips.
â­ Water, sweat, and humidity-resistant for long-lasting wear.
â­ Polymer formula ensures color stability and prevents lipstick bleeding.
â­ Prevents lipstick from feathering into fine lines, even in hot weather.
â­ Smooth texture dries quickly, offering an ideal base for lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar W.P Lipliner Pencil 201- Nude**:
â­ Begin with a hydrating lip balm base coat to lock in moisture and make lips appear plumper.
â­ Avoid using a highly sharpened tip; a blunt tip creates a more natural outline.
â­ Sketch the outer lines of your lips with swift, continuous movement for a perfect shape.
â­ After lining your lips, apply your favorite lipstick or lip gloss shade.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar W.P Lipliner Pencil 201- Nude**:
â­ Strong water-resistant polymer formulation.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to maintain lip softness.

Experience unparalleled brilliance with **Flormar Nail Enamel 380**. This nail polish boasts a unique formula for easy application and exceptional, long-lasting shine. Enjoy a variety of shades and rich tones that give your nails an attractive look, maintaining their glossy finish without chipping.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 380**:

â­ For a more intense color and full coverage, apply a second coat after the first one dries.
â­ Close the cap tightly after each use.

â­ High-quality nail polish formula for optimal performance.

description_en:
Define and enhance your brows with the **Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 402**, the perfect formula for perfectly shaped and fuller-looking arches. Its precise application and blendable texture deliver intense color and a natural-looking finish, effortlessly filling in any gaps. Infused with natural vegetable oils, this pencil not only beautifies but also nourishes your skin, offering protection against premature aging. The **Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 402** is designed for convenience, featuring a compact size and an integrated brush for seamless application, making it your go-to product for a flawless and captivating look anytime.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 402**
â­ Use the attached brush to sketch the shape of your brows, following their natural growth direction.
â­ Apply the color with light, natural strokes to fill in sparse areas.
â­ Blend the color with the brush for a seamless and natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 402**
â­ Natural vegetable oils to moisturize and protect the skin.
â­ Intense color formulation for perfect coverage.
â­ Easy to blend and apply.

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel 453 - Glossy Khaki Green | Long-Lasting
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 453 - Ø£Ø®Ø¶Ø± ÙƒØ§ÙƒÙŠ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹ | ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Elevate your nail game with the stunning **Flormar Nail Enamel 453** in a captivating Khaki Green shade. This nail enamel delivers a glossy finish and full coverage with just a single coat, making it the perfect choice for a chic and sophisticated look. Its special formula ensures long-lasting color and durability, resisting chips and fading. The precision applicator allows for effortless application, providing a professional-quality manicure experience from the comfort of your home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 453**

â­ Prepare Your Nails: Remove any old nail polish, trim and file your nails, and soak your hands in warm water. Wipe nails with alcohol to remove any oils. You can apply petroleum jelly around the nail to avoid skin staining.
â­ First Coat: Apply a thin layer of **Flormar Nail Enamel 453** with strokes from the center of the nail to the tip. Wipe the brush on the bottle neck to remove excess polish.
â­ Drying: Allow the first coat to dry completely.
â­ Additional Coats: Apply a second or third coat as desired for desired opacity.
â­ Finishing Touch: Consider applying a top coat to enhance shine and extend the wear of the enamel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 453**

â­ Long-Lasting Formula: Ensures color and shine stay put for weeks.
â­ Full Coverage: One coat provides rich, vibrant color.
â­ Precision Applicator: Makes application easy and offers perfect control.
â­ Rich Khaki Green Hue: With a dazzling, attractive glossy finish.
â­ Dermatologically Tested: For your safe and confident use.
â­ Chip & Fade Resistant: Keeps your nails looking impeccable.

#Flormar #NailEnamel #Manicure #BeautifulNails #NailArt #JeddahNails #RiyadhNails #NailCare #GreenNails #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Introducing the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 005 - Pink**, a perfect addition to your makeup collection. This lipstick boasts a sophisticated matte finish, ideal for everyday wear, offering a chic and elegant look without any unwanted shine. Its elegant and compact glass packaging makes it convenient to carry and apply. The **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 005 - Pink** provides high color payoff with just one stroke, featuring a precise and durable applicator brush for effortless application. Enriched with moisturizing oils, it protects your lips from dryness and deeply nourishes them for a plump, attractive appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 005 - Pink**:
â­ Before application, ensure lips are moisturized or prepped with a primer if needed.
â­ Carefully outline your lips with the applicator for a defined edge.
â­ Fill in the lips from the center outwards, staying within the outlined edges.
â­ For more control, gently blot any excess product with a tissue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 005 - Pink**:
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing lip oils.
â­ High-performance matte formula.
â­ Premium quality applicator.

description_en:
Discover lasting beauty with **Flormar Nail Enamel 075**, the legendary polish that offers exceptional ease of application and a brilliant shine. Thanks to its unique formula, **Flormar Nail Enamel 075** ensures rich color and full coverage in a single coat, maintaining its dazzling shine and chip-free finish for extended wear. Choose from our wide array of distinctive shades for an irresistible look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 075**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the applicator attached to the cap into the nail enamel.
â­ Drip any excess liquid back into the bottle.
â­ Apply a thin coat on your nails and allow it to dry completely.
â­ For more intense color, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the cap tightly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 075**:
â­ Nail polish with a unique formula for lasting color and shine.

description_en:
Discover the perfect lip shine with **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 04 Undressed**, a lip gloss that provides a long-lasting, shiny, and wet finish.

Achieve smooth, radiant lips with its formula enriched with shea butter, offering intense moisture for ultimate comfort. The **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 04 Undressed** boasts a non-sticky, lasting shine, making it ideal for everyday wear.

Complete your look with the diverse color options and finishes of **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 04 Undressed**, available in vibrant metallic, pearlescent, and glass shine finishes!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 04 Undressed**

â­ Apply directly to lips for optimal results.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day to maintain shine and moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 04 Undressed**

â­ Polybutene
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
â­ Shea Butter for deep hydration
â­ Mica for attractive shimmer
â­ Mango Seed Butter for enhanced smoothness
â­ Various color options with Iron Oxides and Titanium Dioxide

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø®ÙÙŠÙØ© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ²Ù† Ù…Ù† ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± - 08 Ø¥Ø³Ù†Ø´Ø§Ù„
description_en:
Discover unparalleled softness with **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**. This innovative formula offers an ultra-light lip makeup experience, enhanced with moisturizing extracts for all-day comfort. It features a semi-transparent matte finish that imparts a natural and attractive color, making it perfect for everyday wear. Enjoy long-lasting color with **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**, designed for comfortable, weightless wear. Comes with a sponge applicator for precise and easy application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**
â­ Apply a thin layer of the lip powder to your lips using the sponge applicator.
â­ Let it dry completely for the matte finish.
â­ For a more intense color, you can apply additional layers.
â­ For a smoother result, blot your lips with a tissue between coats if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**
â­ Shea Butter: For deep hydration and to prevent lip dryness.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that helps nourish the lips.
â­ Olive Oil: Adds softness and maintains lip moisture.
â­ Lightweight Formula: Provides a comfortable, weightless feel on the lips.
â­ Semi-Transparent Matte Finish: Gives lips a natural and attractive color.

#Flormar #LipPowder #LipMakeup #MatteLips #HydratedLips #SaudiBeauty #EverydayMakeup #LipCare #Lipstick #Cosmetics

title_en: Flormar Baked Blush -50 Peachy Bronze
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ù„Ø§Ø´Ø± Ù…Ø®Ø¨ÙˆØ² - 50 Ø®ÙˆØ®ÙŠ Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²ÙŠ
description_en:
**Flormar Baked Blush -50 Peachy Bronze** is a baked sensation that imparts a healthy glow and natural-looking color to your skin. It features a baked formula providing a silky, lightweight texture that blends seamlessly with the skin, giving you a natural, buildable look. The shade '-50 Peachy Bronze' offers a warm touch of peach and bronze tones with a subtle shimmer for an attractive radiance. Designed for long-lasting wear, it may also contain Vitamin E for skin nourishment. It's perfect for highlighting your cheekbones and adding a radiant finish to your everyday or evening look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Baked Blush -50 Peachy Bronze**:
â­ Swirl your brush over the blush to pick up the product.
â­ Tap off any excess powder.
â­ Apply the blush to the apples of your cheeks, blending upwards towards your temples for a natural, flushed look.
â­ You can layer the product for a more intense color payoff.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Baked Blush -50 Peachy Bronze**:
â­ Baked formula for a silky, lightweight texture.
â­ Warm peachy bronze shade with subtle shimmer.
â­ Delivers a natural, buildable finish.
â­ Long-lasting wear.
â­ May contain Vitamin E, known for its antioxidant properties.
â­ Easy to blend for a natural, flushed look.

#Flormar #Blush #BakedBlush #Makeup #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #Cosmetics #MyMakeup #BeautyBlogger #EyeMakeup

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel 454 - Emerald Green
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 454 - Ø£Ø®Ø¶Ø± Ø²Ù…Ø±Ø¯ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover the captivating emerald green shade with **Flormar Nail Enamel 454**. This nail polish delivers the perfect color and a dazzling shine with effortless application, making it your go-to choice for every occasion. Its advanced formula is long-lasting, resistant to fading and chipping, and boasts a smooth, break-resistant texture. The thoughtfully designed brush ensures drip-free application and complete comfort. **Flormar Nail Enamel 454** is your ideal pick for high quality, holding ISO certifications and being affordably priced. Add this beauty to your collection today!

Product Features:
â­ Cruelty-free and not tested on animals.
â­ Long-lasting, providing a charming look for days.
â­ Richly pigmented for excellent color payoff.
â­ Well-designed applicator ensures full coverage and one-stroke application.
â­ Quick-drying, setting in the blink of an eye.
â­ Suitable for all nail types.
â­ Non-toxic and safe for nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 454**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Clean and gently dry your nails.
â­ Apply your favorite shade in a straight line from cuticle to tip, then to the sides.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry before applying a second for optimal results.

#Flormar #NailPolish #GreenNails #EmeraldGreen #Beauty #NailCare #Makeup #SaudiArabia #OnlineShopping #Cosmetics

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© ÙˆÙ…Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© W07 Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ - Ø¥Ø´Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Achieve unparalleled radiance with **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W07 Beige**. This essential powder is a must-have in your daily makeup routine, providing your skin with an even tone and a silky-smooth finish. Its unique, long-lasting, oil-free formula effectively controls shine and conceals imperfections, leaving your skin looking flawless and radiant all day long. It offers buildable coverage, whether you prefer a light, natural finish or a more enhanced look, making it the perfect choice for any occasion.

Features:
â­ Delivers a smooth, matte finish for an even-toned complexion.
â­ Enriched with natural ingredients that deeply hydrate the skin to restore its natural radiance.
â­ Blends seamlessly into the skin without looking cakey.
â­ Controls oil and keeps the skin hydrated, providing a natural look.
â­ Available in five natural shades, making it ideal for all skin types.
â­ Can be used dry or wet for versatile coverage.
â­ Features a chic and practical compact design that's easy to carry, complete with a mirror and a separate soft sponge.
â­ Lightweight and perfect for everyday use.
â­ Effectively hides dark spots, acne scars, and any other blemishes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W07 Beige**:
â­ For a smooth powder finish, use the dry sponge and gently dab over the face and neck.
â­ For a stronger base application, dampen the sponge and apply the powder from the center of your face outwards.
â­ After each use, wash and rinse the sponge thoroughly and ensure it's dry before placing it back in the compact.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W07 Beige**:
â­ Contains a blend of natural hydrating ingredients.
â­ Oil-free formula for a non-shiny complexion.
â­ High-quality ingredients for seamless blending and enhanced radiance.

#Flormar #FlormarPowder #FaceMakeup #CompactPowder #DailyMakeup #ProMakeup #Beauty #Skincare #SaudiMakeup #FullCoverage

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ ÙƒÙŠØ³ Ù…ÙŠ ØªØ§ØªÙˆ Ø¨ÙŠØ±ÙÙƒØ´Ù† 018
description_en: Unleash your perfect pout with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 018 Perfection**. This long-lasting formula delivers intense, smudge-proof pigmentation for a captivating look that stays put all day. Its smooth, creamy texture glides effortlessly onto your lips with the integrated soft sponge applicator, ensuring a professional finish with ease. Unlike other matte lipsticks, its rich formula nourishes and hydrates your lips, preventing dryness and offering unparalleled comfort. Experience its incredibly lightweight feel that you'll barely notice on your lips. Plus, choose from 16 diverse color options to express your unique style! For a flawless, long-lasting effect, simply wait 1 minute with your lips parted after application for the product to dry and set.
