title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC06 - Shiny Gray
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC06 - Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Discover unparalleled shine with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel Fc06** in an captivating gray shade.

**Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel Fc06** boasts a unique formula that ensures easy application and exceptional, long-lasting shine. Flormar offers you a wide range of diverse colors and different finishes, whether you prefer glossy, matte, or glittery.

â­ Long-lasting color and shine, thanks to its unique formula.
â­ Rich and shiny gray shade with a glossy finish.
â­ Full coverage even with a single coat.
â­ Keeps the glossy finish intact without the formation of chips and flakes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel Fc06**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Uncap the nail enamel and dip the attached applicator into the nail enamel.
â­ Drip the excess liquid back into the bottle.
â­ Apply a thin coat of the enamel on your nails and wait for it to dry.
â­ For a more intense effect, apply a second coat of enamel.
â­ Close the lid tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel Fc06**:
â­ Nail polish.

description_en:
Achieve stunning nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC66**, designed to give you rich color and complete coverage in a single swipe. Its unique formula provides a long-lasting, shiny, and captivating look, making it your perfect choice for an elegant and distinctive style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC66**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for extra protection and superior shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC66**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose.
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate.
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano].
â­ Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake).

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 508 - Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ¶ÙŠ Ø£Ù†ÙŠÙ‚
description_en:
Discover ultimate elegance with **Flormar Nail Enamel 508**, a unique silvery-grey shade that adds a touch of sophistication to your look. Perfect for parties, special occasions, and formal settings, this nail enamel gives your nails a captivating and luxurious appearance. Its smooth, even formula ensures full coverage with a flawless finish, guaranteeing high quality and a non-toxic composition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 508**
â­ Start by thoroughly cleaning your nails.
â­ Use the applicator to pick up small amounts of enamel.
â­ Apply the enamel with gentle, even strokes for a flawless look.
â­ To prevent the enamel from bleeding onto the skin, you can protect the area around the nail with a little oil or petroleum jelly.
â­ Add a top coat for extra shine and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 508**
â­ Non-toxic and safe-to-use formula.
â­ Thick texture providing perfect coverage in a single coat.
â­ Chic and attractive silvery-grey color.
â­ Innovative bottle design for ease of use.
â­ Secure cap to prevent enamel leakage.

description_en:
Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-241 Sour Cherry helps you shape your lips with precision and adds definition thanks to the special polymers in its formula. It increases the lasting power of your lipstick by preventing it from bleeding into lines and smudging, and is resistant against humidity and sweat. This makes your lip make-up look smooth and flawless for longer, providing the perfect base for a long-lasting lip look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-241 Sour Cherry**:
â­ Shape your lips precisely with the lipliner before applying lipstick or lipgloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-241 Sour Cherry**:
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Synthetic Japan Wax
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

description_en:
Introducing the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick**, a sophisticated matte finish that bestows your lips with an alluring and distinctive look. This lipstick boasts a unique formula that provides rich color and full coverage in a single swipe, while maintaining lip hydration. Its compact and practical design makes it the perfect companion for your daily beauty regimen.

â­ Delivers a rich and captivating matte color.
â­ Hydrating formula protects lips from dryness.
â­ High coverage with an easy, single-swipe application.
â­ Elegant and compact design for portability.
â­ High-quality applicator brush ensures superior precision.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ Before application, ensure your lips are moisturized if needed.
â­ Precisely define the outer lip line using the brush.
â­ Fill in the lips from the inside with short, even strokes.
â­ For a fuller look, you can outline the lips slightly wider.
â­ Wipe off any excess lipstick for a perfect application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ Contains advanced oils to moisturize and protect the lips.
â­ Long-lasting formula with high color stability.
â­ High-quality pigments for pure and intense color.

#Flormar #LiquidLipstick #MatteLips #LipMakeup #Lipstick #Makeup #Beauty #LipCare #AttractiveLips #SaudiMakeup

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Flormar Loos Powder Banana Pudding**, the loose powder that gives you a natural, long-lasting finish. It features a silky, lightweight formula that provides sheer coverage, perfect for concealing imperfections and reducing shine. **Flormar Loos Powder Banana Pudding** offers a semi-matte finish that expertly blurs imperfections, leaving your skin looking smooth and natural. This powder is suitable for all skin types, especially oily and combination skin, for effects that last all day.

â­ Finely milled, lightweight powder for a perfect finish.
â­ Effectively sets makeup and reduces skin shine.
â­ Provides a smooth, matte finish that lasts.
â­ Brightens the under-eye area for instant radiance.
â­ Helps even out skin tone and conceal redness.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, giving you confidence all day.
â­ Long-lasting, flawless coverage for a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Loos Powder Banana Pudding**
â­ After applying foundation and concealer, use a fluffy brush to pick up a small amount of powder.
â­ Tap off any excess powder.
â­ Apply to the face, focusing on areas that need setting or brightening.
â­ Blend evenly for a smooth, matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Loos Powder Banana Pudding**
â­ Ultra-fine, lightweight texture.
â­ Sets makeup and reduces shine.
â­ Provides a smooth, matte finish.
â­ Helps to brighten the under-eye area.
â­ Neutralizes redness and discoloration.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Long-lasting coverage.

#Flormar #SettingPowder #DailyMakeup #MatteSkin #FullCoverage #LoosePowder #MakeupSetting #ProMakeup #SaudiBeauty #NaturalLook

title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC71 - Nude
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC71 - Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Discover the beauty of your nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC71 - Nude**. Flormar, a trusted brand with over 70 years of cosmetic industry experience, is renowned for delivering superior quality. This nail enamel is perfect for various occasions and can be easily matched with your daily outfits, whether in black, white, or a combination of both. It comes in an elegant and practical bottle for easy carrying and use. Thanks to its quick-dry formula, **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC71 - Nude** gives your nails a gorgeous look in just minutes.

Product Features:
â­ Provides intense shine and radiance that enhances your nails and outfit elegance.
â­ Vivid and glossy colors, as Flormar offers a wide range to suit all tastes.
â­ Long-lasting wear due to its innovative formula that prevents chipping and fading.
â­ No cracks or bubbles observed, giving your nails a flawless, glossy look for extended periods.
â­ High-quality brush for complete and easy coverage in a single stroke, ensuring even application without clumps.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC71 - Nude**:
â­ Thoroughly clean your nails from any old polish using nail polish remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails if necessary to achieve the perfect shape.
â­ Soak your hands in warm water to moisturize the skin around the nails.
â­ Dry your hands thoroughly and remove any excess cuticle.
â­ Use a cotton pad to remove any residual moisturizer from the nail surface.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) to protect your nails and add vibrancy to the enamel.
â­ Apply your favorite **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC71 - Nude** shade. One coat is usually enough, or apply a second coat for more intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC71 - Nude**:
â­ High-quality formula ensuring rich color and long-lasting shine.
â­ Quick-dry ingredients that prevent smudging and give you a perfect look swiftly.
â­ High-performance colorants providing full coverage in a single stroke.
â­ Precision brush designed for professional and easy application.

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #Makeup #Beauty #Nails #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Achieve stunning nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC09**, designed to give you rich color and full coverage in a single stroke. Its unique formula ensures a long-lasting shine that captures attention.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC09**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails over a base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, then apply a top coat for protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC09**:
â­ Rich pigments for complete coverage.
â­ Liquid formula for easy application.
â­ Ingredients to ensure long-lasting shine.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC33 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø¬Ø°Ø§Ø¨ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ…
description_en:
Discover a radiant nail look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC33**. This polish features rich pigments that provide complete coverage with just one coat, making it the perfect choice for a professional, attractive, and long-lasting finish. Let your nails express your beauty with this amazing product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC33**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails over a base coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, then apply a top coat for added shine and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC33**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose.
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer.
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol.
â­ Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano].
â­ Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate.
â­ Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer.
â­ Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides).

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #NailCare #Beauty #Makeup #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Dammam

description_en:
Experience the allure of velvety lips with **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder** in shade 05 Perfection. This revolutionary lip product merges the comfort of a powder with the intense pigmentation of a lipstick for an unparalleled experience. Enjoy a matte finish with rich color that enhances your lips, giving them a bold and captivating look. Its unique powder-to-cream texture ensures a smooth, even application, keeping your lips soft and comfortable all day long.

â­ Powder-to-cream texture: Smooth and comfortable transformation.
â­ Intense color payoff: Rich and bold pigmentation.
â­ Lightweight and comfortable: Unmatched comfort on the lips.
â­ Matte finish: Elegant, velvety appearance.
â­ Smooth and even application: Guarantees perfect coverage.
â­ Long-lasting wear: Staying power throughout your day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**:
â­ Apply the lip powder directly to your lips using the provided applicator.
â­ Start from the center of your lips and move outwards for even coverage.
â­ For a more intense look, apply a second layer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**:
â­ (Ingredients will be listed here when available).

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**. This innovative powder offers a super-lightweight lip makeup experience, enriched with natural moisturizing extracts to give you soft, attractive lips all day long. Its thin liquid consistency provides medium buildable pigment coverage, with a matte, non-glossy finish that gives your lips an elegant, non-drying look. Perfect for everyday use thanks to the convenient applicator tip.

â­ Ultra-lightweight lip powder for a comfortable experience.
â­ Formula rich in moisturizing extracts to prevent lip dryness.
â­ Elegant and attractive matte finish.
â­ Adjustable medium pigment density.
â­ Easy-to-use applicator for perfect results.
â­ Provides a feeling of comfort and weightlessness on the lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**:
â­ Apply the powder directly to your lips using the integrated applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**:
â­ Shea Butter: For deep hydration and superior nourishment.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that protects the lips.
â­ Olive Oil: To enhance softness and suppleness.

description_en:
Discover lasting beauty with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 017 Nudist**. This smudge-proof liquid lipstick delivers intense pigmentation and long-lasting wear for vibrant lips. With its rich formula and smooth, creamy texture, it's easy to apply using the soft sponge applicator. Unlike other matte lipsticks, it won't dry out your lips thanks to its nourishing formula, ensuring comfort and ease of use. Its soft texture makes it incredibly lightweight, and it comes in 16 different color options to express your unique style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 017 Nudist**
â­ Smooth a thin layer over lips with the sponge applicator.
â­ Wait for 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle for a flawless, long-lasting effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 017 Nudist**
â­ Isododecane
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Polybutene
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Isocetyl Stearate
â­ Isohexadecane
â­ Kaolin
â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Glyceryl Behenate
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Aroma (Flavour)
â­ Propylene Carbonate
â­ Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether
â­ Lecithin
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with the Flormar Waterproof Lipliner.

The **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner** helps you shape your lips effortlessly and adds precise definition thanks to the special polymers in its formula. It enhances lipstick longevity by preventing bleeding and smudging, and is resistant to humidity and sweat, ensuring your lip makeup looks smooth for longer. Available in a variety of shades, the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner** provides the perfect base for long-lasting lip makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner**:
â­ Shape the lips with lip liner before applying lipstick or lipgloss for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner**:
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Synthetic Japan Wax
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

description_en:
Discover the beauty of your nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC75**, offering rich color and complete coverage from the very first coat. Its highly pigmented formula gives your nails a brilliant, eye-catching shine that lasts, making it the perfect choice for a radiant look on any occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC75**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for extra shine and longer-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC75**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled softness with **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 018 Sunny Land**. This liquid shade offers a unique velvety experience for a silky texture on your lips. With its long-wear performance, creamy texture, and nourishing oils, **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 018 Sunny Land** provides superior care for your lips, combating dryness while adding a touch of perfect beauty.

â­ Silky smooth texture.
â­ Long-lasting wear.
â­ Creamy formula with nourishing oils.
â­ Protects lips from dryness.
â­ Velvety effect and perfect beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 018 Sunny Land**:

â­ Apply a single layer onto lips using the applicator sponge.
â­ Keep away from heat and direct sunlight.
â­ Close the cap properly after use to ensure product longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 018 Sunny Land**:

â­ Isododecane, Dimethicone, Isononyl Isononanoate, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera(Carnauba Wax), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Quaternium-90 Sepiolite, Propylene Carbonate, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Myristate, Phenoxyethanol, Quaternium-90 Montmorillonite, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Ethyl Vanillin, Theobroma Grandiflorum(Cupuacu) Seed Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-DI-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid.
â­ +/-(May Contain): CI 77891(Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491(Iron Oxides), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 7 Ca Lake), CI 17200(D&C Red No. 33 Al Lake), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 6 Ba Lake), CI 77499(Iron Oxides), CI 19140(Fd&C Yellow No. 5 Al Lake), CI 45410(D&C Red No. 28 Al Lake), CI 15985(Fd&C Yellow No. 6 Al Lake), CI 42090(Fd&C Blue No. 1 Al Lake), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 6), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 7), CI 15880(D&C Red No. 34), CI 45380(D&C Red No. 21 Al Lake), CI 77492(Iron Oxides).

description_en:
Discover beauty with the **Flormar Eye Shadow Palette 001 Fallen Angel**, an eyeshadow palette with mesmerizing colors combining pearl and semimatte finishes, specially designed to give your eyes an irresistible look. Thanks to its creamy texture, this palette offers richly pigmented makeup that is easy to apply and blend for diverse looks suitable for all occasions. Each palette contains 10 harmonious shades that can be expertly mixed to create unique gradients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eye Shadow Palette 001 Fallen Angel**:
â­ Begin with a suitable eyeshadow brush.
â­ Use a blending brush or a fluffy brush to apply and blend eyeshadow shades seamlessly.
â­ A smudger brush can be used to add depth and perfect color intensity.
â­ Mix different shades to add shimmer and distinction to your look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eye Shadow Palette 001 Fallen Angel**:
â­ Creamy, richly pigmented formula.
â­ Combination of pearl and semimatte finishes.
â­ 10 blendable color shades.
â­ Easy to apply and blend.

title_en: Flormar Loose Powder 04- Beige: Natural & Radiant Finish
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø­Ø±Ø© 04 - Ø¨ÙŠØ¬: Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© ÙˆÙ…Ø´Ø±Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Flormar Loose Powder 04- Beige**. As a leading cosmetics brand, Flormar brings you a high-quality loose powder that provides a smooth and radiant look to your skin all day long. This oil-free powder effectively controls skin shine, covers imperfections, and gives you unparalleled natural radiance.

â­ Delivers a soft, matte finish for even-toned skin.
â­ Natural ingredients deeply hydrate the skin, restoring its natural radiance.
â­ Blends effortlessly with the skin without caking.
â­ Keeps skin oil-free and prevents dryness, offering a natural look.
â­ Available in five natural shades, suitable for all skin types.
â­ Can be used dry or wet for versatile coverage.
â­ Chic and practical packaging with a sponge and mirror for on-the-go application.
â­ Lightweight and perfect for everyday use.
â­ Easily conceals dark spots, acne, and blemishes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Loose Powder 04- Beige**
â­ For a natural finish, use the dry sponge and gently dab over the face and neck.
â­ For stronger coverage, dampen the sponge and apply the powder from the center of your face outwards.
â­ Wash the sponge thoroughly after each use and ensure it's dry before placing it back in the package.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Loose Powder 04- Beige**
â­ Contains carefully selected natural ingredients to hydrate and nourish the skin.
â­ An oil-free formula ensures healthy, controlled skin.

#Flormar #LoosePowder #FaceMakeup #SaudiBeauty #Skincare #SettingPowder #DailyMakeup #Beige #FlormarMakeup #SaudiArabia

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ ÙƒÙŠØ³ Ù…ÙŠ ØªØ§ØªÙˆ Ø±ÙˆØ² ÙˆÙˆØ¯ 22 - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…Ø¯
description_en:
Achieve perfect lips with the Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 022 Rosewood, your ultimate solution for a long-lasting, smudge-proof lipstick with intense pigmentation. Its rich formula prevents lip dryness, while the soft and creamy texture ensures easy application thanks to its soft sponge applicator. 

â­ Long-lasting formula stays on your lips for hours.
â­ Intense pigmentation gives your lips vibrant color.
â­ Soft and creamy texture for ultimate comfort.
â­ Does not dry out lips, enriched with moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Incredibly lightweight.
â­ Available in 16 color options to express your style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 022 Rosewood**
â­ Smooth a thin layer over lips with the sponge applicator.
â­ Wait 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle for a flawless effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 022 Rosewood**
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polybutene, Dimethicone, Isocetyl Stearate, Isohexadecane, Kaolin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Beeswax, Glyceryl Behenate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Aroma (Flavour), Propylene Carbonate, Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).

#Flormar #Lipstick #LipTattoo #KissMeMore #Rosewood #LongLasting #Makeup #Beauty #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Blush 05 - Red**. This lipstick delivers a dense, rich color with an ultra-smooth, lightweight creamy texture.

The no-smudge formula of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Blush 05 - Red** ensures a brilliant look that lasts for long hours, featuring a built-in sponge applicator for ultimate ease and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Blush 05 - Red**:
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating and moisturizing.
â­ Apply a lip primer to enhance longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick as you would any other lipstick.
â­ Wait 1 minute for the color to dry and set completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Blush 05 - Red**:
â­ Aluminum Starch.
â­ Synthetic Beeswax.
â­ Ozokerite.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled elegance with **Flormar** Nail Enamel in its captivating emerald green shade. This product delivers a luxurious, glossy finish that lasts, making it the perfect choice for all your occasions. It features a precision applicator specially designed for easy and quick application, ensuring even, smudge-free coverage. Its unique formula is quick-drying and chip-resistant, so you can enjoy perfect nails all day long. Pamper your nails with a touch of luxury and sophistication.

â­ Available in a wide range of colors to suit all tastes.
â­ Extremely easy to use, perfect for everyday wear.
â­ Innovative applicator designed for a smooth, flawless application.
â­ Quick-drying and long-lasting, maintaining your nail's beauty.
â­ Durable, unbreakable packaging for maximum safety.
â­ Perfect one-stroke coverage, saving you time and effort.
â­ Stays intact on nails without fading.
â­ Drip-resistant, keeping your hands clean.
â­ Provides a perfect salon-like finish to your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar**:
â­ Clean and thoroughly dry your nails.
â­ Apply a thin first coat of **Flormar** to clean, dry nails.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely.
â­ For the best result, apply a second coat starting from the center, then on the edges of your nails.
â­ Wipe away any excess or smudges with nail enamel remover.
â­ Ensure you shake the bottle well before application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar**:
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate

Discover brilliance and beauty with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl44**, the legendary polish known for its unique formula that offers easy application and exceptional shine. Flormar's nail enamel varieties remain brilliant and long-lasting, waiting for you with a wide range of special shades, glossy, matte, and glittering nail polish choices.

â­ Long-lasting color and shine, thanks to its unique formula.
â­ Full coverage even with a single coat.
â­ Keeps the glossy finish intact without chipping.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl44**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the attached applicator into the enamel and remove excess liquid.
â­ Apply a thin coat on your nails and wait for it to dry.
â­ For a more intense effect, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the cap tightly after use.

â­ Nail polish.

title_en: Flormar Waterproof Lipliner - Pcl-240 Sunset
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯ Ø´ÙØ§Ø© Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - 240 Ø³Ù†Ø³ÙŠØª
description_en:
Introducing the Flormar Waterproof Lipliner in shade Pcl-240 Sunset, expertly crafted to shape your lips with precision and add definition thanks to its special polymer-infused formula. This lipliner enhances the staying power of your lipstick, preventing feathering and smudging, for a smooth and long-lasting lip look that withstands humidity and sweat. Available in various shades, the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner** provides the perfect base for a flawless, enduring lip makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner**:
â­ Outline your lips with the lipliner before applying lipstick or lipgloss for optimal results and extended wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner**:
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides, Talc, Mica, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Japan Wax, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

#Flormar #Lipliner #DefinedLips #LipMakeup #LongLastingLipstick #WaterproofMakeup #SaudiMakeup #LipDefinition #ProMakeup #SaudiBeauty

title_en: Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd08 - Red | Intense Color & Rapid Drying
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙŠÙƒ Ø¯Ø±Ø§ÙŠ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 08 - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± | Ø³Ø±Ø¹Ø© ÙˆØ¬Ø§Ø°Ø¨ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Give your nails a captivating, long-lasting look with **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd08 - Red**. This nail enamel features a unique formula that combines intense, vibrant red color with nourishing properties for superior nail care. It dries remarkably fast, within just one minute, making it the perfect choice for an elegant finish without the wait. Whether for a special occasion or to add a pop of vibrancy to your day, **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel** guarantees a glossy finish and attractive appearance that lasts for hours. Each bottle comes with a professional brush for a smooth and precise application. 

â­ Imparts a rich, glossy red to your nails.
â­ Dries completely in just one minute.
â­ Nourishes and moisturizes your nails.
â­ Long-lasting wear without chipping.
â­ Easy application with the integrated brush.
â­ Adds a captivating and attractive finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel**:
â­ Ensure your nails are clean and free from any old polish.
â­ Trim and shape your nails as desired.
â­ Apply a base coat of nail polish and let it dry for two minutes.
â­ Apply the first coat of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd08**.
â­ After one minute and once the first coat is dry, apply a second coat for more intense color.
â­ Enjoy your perfect nail look after a minute.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Magnesium Stearate
â­ May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).

description_en:
Achieve a stunning and captivating nail look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC76**. This nail polish boasts a rich pigment formula that delivers full coverage with vibrant color from the very first coat, ensuring a professional and long-lasting finish. Enjoy shiny, eye-catching colors that enhance your nails and keep up with the latest trends.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC76**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow drying.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply the top coat for enhanced shine and durability.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC76**:

description_en:
Elevate your nail game with **Flormar Nail Enamel 501**, the perfect shade of pink to complement any outfit or occasion. This exquisite nail enamel boasts a long-lasting, chip-resistant formula that delivers a vibrant, glossy finish for weeks. The specially designed applicator ensures a smooth, streak-free application, providing flawless coverage with just one coat. Experience the effortless beauty of **Flormar Nail Enamel 501**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 501**
â­ Clean and prep your nails thoroughly.
â­ Buff and shape your nails to your desired look.
â­ Apply a thin coat of the enamel, starting from the center of the nail and moving to the sides.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely before applying a second.
â­ For enhanced durability and shine, finish with a top coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 501**
â­ Advanced formula for long-lasting color and shine.
â­ High-quality pigments for a rich pink hue.
â­ Quick-drying properties to prevent smudging and chipping.
â­ Precision applicator for easy and even application.

description_en:
Discover the beauty of your nails with **Flormar Nail Enamel 458** in an elegant gray shade. This premium polish is designed to give you a sophisticated and attractive look, with long-lasting wear and eye-catching shine. The calm gray color adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit, making it your perfect choice for daily and special occasions. Enjoy an easy and quick application experience for stunning nails at all times.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Gently twist the cap of the bottle to access the brush.
â­ Take an optimal amount of polish on the brush tip and carefully apply it to your nails.
â­ Securely close the cap after use.
â­ Allow the polish to dry completely and avoid contact with fabrics immediately after application.
â­ Store the product in a dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ High-quality formulation for rich color and a perfect finish.
â­ Gray pigments for a sophisticated and attractive effect.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients for satisfactory results in a short time.
â­ Safe ingredients for nail care.

description_en:
Discover the lasting effect you need with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC29**. This enamel offers rich pigments and full coverage in one captivating shade, giving your nails a shiny, long-lasting look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC29**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC29**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.

description_en:
Achieve a stunning gel manicure effect with Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Country Rose Jl59. This nail polish delivers ultra shimmer and intense color to your nails, all without the need for a LED lamp.

It features a special brush for an easier application process. For maximum impact, apply two coats of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Country Rose Jl59** to boost the color intensity and enhance the high-shine finish, giving your nails a volumized and captivating look, reminiscent of professional salon treatments.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Country Rose Jl59**:
â­ Application, especially in two coats, enables a fantastic gloss and volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Country Rose Jl59**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). Give your nails a stunning look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC63**. This nail polish features rich pigments that provide complete coverage in a single coat, making it your ideal choice for a glossy and attractive long-lasting finish. Enjoy vibrant colors that express your elegance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC63**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails, after applying the base coat. Allow it to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat and wait 2 minutes.
â­ For best results, add a top coat to protect the color and enhance shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC63**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano].
â­ Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer.
â­ Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ùƒ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ 017 Ù…ÙŠØ³ØªÙŠ Ø¨ÙŠØªØ´ - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ø­Ø±ÙŠØ±ÙŠØ© ØªØ¯ÙˆÙ…
description_en:
Experience the luxurious silky texture of the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 017 Misty Peach** on your lips. With its long-lasting performance, creamy texture, and nourishing oils, the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 017 Misty Peach** effectively protects your lips from dryness, offering a velvety effect, perfect beauty, and care all in one product. This lipstick will undoubtedly become an indispensable part of your beauty routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 017 Misty Peach**:
â­ Apply a layer onto lips using the sponge applicator.
â­ Keep away from heat and direct sunlight.
â­ After use, close the cap properly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 017 Misty Peach**:
â­ Isododecane, Dimethicone, Isononyl Isononanoate, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera(Carnauba Wax), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Quaternium-90 Sepiolite, Propylene Carbonate, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Myristate, Phenoxyethanol, Quaternium-90 Montmorillonite, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Ethyl Vanillin, Theobroma Grandiflorum(Cupuacu) Seed Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-DI-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid.
â­ +/-(May Contain): CI 77891(Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491(Iron Oxides), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 7 Ca Lake), CI 17200(D&C Red No. 33 Al Lake), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 6 Ba Lake), CI 77499(Iron Oxides), CI 19140(Fd&C Yellow No. 5 Al Lake), CI 45410(D&C Red No. 28 Al Lake), CI 15985(Fd&C Yellow No. 6 Al Lake), CI 42090(Fd&C Blue No. 1 Al Lake), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 6), CI 15850(D&C Red No. 7), CI 15880(D&C Red No. 34), CI 45380(D&C Red No. 21 Al Lake), CI 77492(Iron Oxides).

title_en: Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 56 Gossip Girl
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠ Ø­Ø±ÙŠØ±ÙŠ 56 Gossip Girl
description_en:
Discover the beauty of your lips with **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 56 Gossip Girl**. This bold shade delivers a long-lasting, silky matte finish with rich color payoff and a smooth texture that glides effortlessly onto your lips for ultimate comfort all day. Its lightweight formula prevents dryness, and the precise applicator ensures easy and perfect application.

â­ Delivers a bold, long-lasting matte finish.
â­ Rich, captivating color for fuller-looking lips.
â­ Silky, smooth texture for superior comfort.
â­ Lightweight formula that prevents lip dryness.
â­ Easy and precise application with the included applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 56 Gossip Girl**
â­ Exfoliate and moisturize your lips before application.
â­ Use the applicator to smoothly coat your upper and lower lips.
â­ For a more defined look, line your lips with a lip liner before applying the liquid lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 56 Gossip Girl**
â­ Cyclomethicone
â­ Isododecane
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ (Exact ingredients may vary, please refer to the packaging)

description_en:
Discover ultimate beauty with the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 54 Daily Must**. This liquid lipstick offers high coverage and an ultra-smooth, long-lasting texture, giving your lips a captivating, silky matte finish. Its rich formula, infused with Cupuacu butter and Baobab oil, keeps your lips hydrated and provides a weightless, barely-there feel. Enjoy intense color payoff and a matte finish that keeps your lip makeup flawless all day without fading or smudging. Easy to apply with its precise sponge applicator for a perfect look.

â­ Apply the liquid lipstick precisely to your lips using the applicator.

â­ Cupuacu oils for deep hydration.
â­ Baobab oil for lip nourishment.
â­ Liquid formula for easy application.

â­ High, long-lasting coverage.

title_en: Flormar Bronzing Powder 08 Suntan - Natural Warmth for a Radiant Complexion
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²Ø± 08 ØµÙ† ØªØ§Ù† - Ø¯ÙØ¡ Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù…Ø´Ø±Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Achieve a naturally sun-kissed, flawless complexion with **Flormar Bronzing Powder 08 Suntan**. This powder features a lightweight, silky texture that provides medium to high buildable coverage and a long-lasting matte finish. Perfect for enhancing your facial features and adding natural warmth, it leaves your skin looking bronzed and radiant.

â­ Delivers a natural, sun-kissed bronzed look.
â­ Lightweight and silky-smooth texture for ultimate comfort.
â­ Medium to high buildable coverage.
â­ Matte finish for a polished and refined appearance.
â­ Ideal for contouring and adding warmth to the complexion.
â­ Long-lasting formula.
â­ Contains up to 80% natural origin ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Bronzing Powder 08 Suntan**:
â­ With a makeup brush, apply and gently blend the powder onto the face and neck.
â­ For a sun-kissed effect, initially concentrate application on the high points of your face such as the forehead, cheekbones, and bridge of the nose.
â­ Use the remaining powder on the brush to lightly dust the rest of your face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Bronzing Powder 08 Suntan**:
â­ Pressed powder with a matte finish.
â­ Formulated with a high percentage of natural origin ingredients (up to 80%).
â­ Designed to impart natural warmth to the skin.

#Flormar #BronzingPowder #FaceMakeup #NaturalLook #SunKissedSkin #MatteFinish #Contouring #SaudiMakeup #MakeupTrend #BeautyEssentials

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¬Ù„ Ø§ÙŠÙ„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ 01: ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ
description_en:
Achieve captivating eye looks with **Flormar Gel Eyeliner Gel Black 01**. This gel eyeliner offers the perfect way to apply the eye makeup you've always desired with ease and precision. Using the professional brush included in its package, you can create thin or thick lines according to your preference, giving you complete control. **Flormar Gel Eyeliner Gel Black 01** features perfect color intensity and convenient use, making it your ideal choice to add depth and allure to your eyes. It's the ultimate solution for long-lasting, professional eye makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Gel Eyeliner Gel Black 01**:
â­ Draw a line as close as possible to the upper lash line, starting from the inner corner of the eye towards the outer corner.
â­ The special brush helps to create a thin or thick line according to preference, ensuring precise application.
â­ After use, close the cap properly to maintain product quality and prevent drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Gel Eyeliner Gel Black 01**:
â­ C13-15 ALKANE
â­ TRIETHYLHEXANOIN
â­ SYNTHETIC WAX
â­ CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE
â­ TALC
â­ POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE
â­ TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE
â­ POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE
â­ POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID
â­ STEARALKONIUM HECTORITE
â­ SILICA
â­ TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE
â­ PROPYLENE CARBONATE
â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE
â­ 1,2-HEXANEDIOL
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL
â­ ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE
â­ +/- (MAY CONTAIN): CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77492 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES).

title_en: Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 021 Naive - Long-Lasting Wear & Velvety Finish
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ ÙƒÙŠØ³ Ù…ÙŠ ØªØ§ØªÙˆ 021 Ù†ÙŠÙ - Ø«Ø¨Ø§Øª ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹ ÙˆØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø®Ù…Ù„ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Discover timeless beauty with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 021 Naive**. Experience unparalleled lipstick wear with its advanced formula, offering rich pigmentation and long-lasting, smudge-proof wear. The **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 021 Naive** boasts a soft, creamy texture that glides effortlessly onto lips with its convenient sponge applicator, ensuring a smooth and flawless application. Unlike traditional matte lipsticks that can dry out lips, this lip tint is enriched with a moisturizing formula, keeping your lips comfortable all day, and is incredibly lightweight. With 16 stunning color options, you can effortlessly express your unique style. For a perfect, long-lasting result, simply wait 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 021 Naive**
â­ Smooth a thin layer over lips with the included sponge applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 021 Naive**
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polybutene, Dimethicone, Isocetyl Stearate, Isohexadecane, Kaolin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Beeswax, Glyceryl Behenate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Aroma (Flavour), Propylene Carbonate, Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid. +/- (May Contain): Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake). [33000134ksa.00]

description_en:
Experience a revolution in lipstick with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07**. If you're after a lipstick that won't smudge and offers intense pigmentation, then **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07** is just right for you! It stays on your lips with its long-lasting formula. With its smooth and creamy texture, liquid lipstick is easy to apply thanks to its soft sponge applicator. Unlike other matte lipsticks, it does not dry out the lips thanks to its rich formula and offers unparalleled ease of use. Its soft texture makes it incredibly lightweight, and it's available in 16 different color options to express your unique style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07**
â­ Apply a thin layer over lips with the attached applicator.
â­ Wait 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle for a flawless and long-lasting effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07**
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polybutene, Dimethicone, Isocetyl Stearate, Isohexadecane, Kaolin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Beeswax, Glyceryl Behenate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Aroma (Flavour), Propylene Carbonate, Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).

description_en:
Discover the secret to captivating lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09**, the liquid lipstick that delivers intense pigmentation and unparalleled longevity. Perfect for those seeking a smudge-proof look that lasts for hours. Its smooth and creamy texture glides on effortlessly thanks to the integrated sponge applicator, providing a seamless, clump-free application. Unlike traditional matte formulas, **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09** does not dry out the lips due to its rich and hydrating formula, making it incredibly lightweight and comfortable to wear. Available in 16 diverse color options to suit all your looks and styles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09**
â­ Apply a thin, even layer to the lips using the sponge applicator.
â­ For optimal results and wear, allow the product to dry completely for 1 minute with your lips apart after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09**
â­ Isododecane
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Polybutene
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Isocetyl Stearate
â­ Isohexadecane
â­ Kaolin
â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Glyceryl Behenate
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Aroma (Flavour)
â­ Propylene Carbonate
â­ Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether
â­ Lecithin
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).

description_en:
Discover the **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**, an innovative lip makeup product with a thin liquid consistency and medium pigment density. Enjoy naturally colored, long-lasting lips with an incredibly weightless feel, thanks to its unique formula enriched with moisturizing extracts like Shea Butter, Vitamin E, and Olive Oil. It's the perfect solution for practical and comfortable lip makeup, providing a natural and attractive look ideal for everyday wear. ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**: Apply a thin layer of the powder to your lips using the integrated sponge applicator. Let it dry completely for a weightless matte finish. You can build the color by applying additional layers for higher intensity as desired. ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**: Contains a rich blend of moisturizing Shea Butter, nourishing Vitamin E, and Olive Oil for added hydration. These natural ingredients work together to keep your lips soft and hydrated, making it suitable even for dry lips.

Enjoy buildable medium pigment density with the integrated sponge applicator for easy and comfortable application. **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder - 03 Dearest** is your perfect choice for flawless and trendy lip makeup.

â­ Lightweight lip powder for superior comfort.
â­ Contains moisturizing extracts for soft lips.

â­ Thin liquid consistency and adjustable medium pigment density.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Sangria 13** in a captivating purple shade. This lipstick delivers a dense and saturated color, thanks to its creamy texture that leaves your lips feeling soft. Its no-smudge formula ensures a brilliant look that lasts for long hours, complemented by a comfortable sponge applicator for effortless and precise application. **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Sangria 13** enhances your lip's beauty and adds a distinctive touch to your personality with its clear and attractive effect.

Product Features:
â­ Long-lasting wear, keeping your lips beautiful for hours.
â­ Extremely soft, creamy, and lightweight texture.
â­ Comes with a built-in sponge applicator for easy and precise application.
â­ Provides lips with an intense and saturated look.
â­ Smudge-proof formula that retains its liquid texture on the lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Sangria 13**:
â­ Prep your lips by gently exfoliating them with a nourishing scrub.
â­ You can apply a lip primer to increase color longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick just as you would any other lipstick.
â­ Wait for one minute with your lips apart for the product to dry and set completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Sangria 13**:
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Flormar** Compact Powder 103 Honey. Its fine, silky texture ensures easy application, delivering a natural and attractive finish. Thanks to its innovative formula, **Flormar** Compact Powder offers superior resistance to sweat and humidity, guaranteeing your makeup stays impeccable all day long without the need for frequent touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar** Compact Powder 103 Honey:
â­ For best results, gently apply the powder using the included applicator or a soft powder brush.
â­ Start from the center of the face and blend outwards for even, natural coverage.
â­ Can be used alone or over foundation to set makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar** Compact Powder 103 Honey:
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Boron Nitride
â­ Zinc Oxide
â­ Silica
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

#Flormar #CompactPowder #FaceMakeup #FlormarSaudi #NaturalLook #LongLastingMakeup #SettingPowder #SaudiBeauty #MakeupBrands #BeautySaudi

description_en:
Achieve plump, captivating lips with the new **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze**. This lip gloss delivers a long-lasting shiny, wet finish, providing intense moisture thanks to its nourishing shea butter formula. The **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze** leaves no sticky residue, ensuring all-day comfort. Explore 20 vibrant color options with metallic, pearlescent, and glass shine finishes to complement your diverse looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze**:
â­ Apply directly to the lips.
â­ Reapply throughout the day as needed to maintain shine and moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze**:
â­ Enriched with shea butter for deep hydration.
â­ Formula provides long-lasting shine.
â­ Variety of color options with different finishes.
â­ High-quality ingredients for soft, attractive lips.

#Flormar #LipGloss #Lips #SaudiMakeup #LipCare #LipMoisture #Beauty #LipShine #EyeMakeup #Lipstick

description_en:
Achieve luminous, hydrated lips with **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 03 Golden Terracotta**. This lip gloss offers intense moisture thanks to shea butter in its formula, providing a long-lasting shine without a sticky feel. Complete your look with 20 vibrant color options featuring metallic, pearlescent, and glass shine finishes for a perfect pout.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 03 Golden Terracotta**
â­ Apply directly to lips.
â­ Reapply throughout the day as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Dewy Lip Glaze 03 Golden Terracotta**
â­ POLYBUTENE, PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM(MINERAL OIL), TRIISOSTEARYL CITRATE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, RICINUS COMMUNIS(CASTOR) SEED OIL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII(SHEA) BUTTER, MICA, MANGIFERA INDICA(MANGO) SEED BUTTER, CALCIUM SODIUM BOROSILICATE, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, ETHYL VANILLIN, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE, SILICA, PARFUM(FRAGRANCE), PEG-8, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TOCOPHEROL, TIN OXIDE, METHYLPARABEN, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, ETHYLPARABEN, ASCORBIC ACID, CITRIC ACID, POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID.
â­ +/- (MAY CONTAIN): TITANIUM DIOXIDE, IRON OXIDES, RED 28 LAKE, RED 6, RED 7, BLUE 1 LAKE, etc.

#Flormar #LipGloss #DewyLips #LipMakeup #Cosmetics #LipCare #Beauty #Jeddah #Riyadh #SaudiArabia

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - 232 Ø¨Ø§Ø³Ù†Øª Ø±ÙŠØ¯
description_en:
Achieve a professional finish for your lip makeup with the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-232 Passnt Red**. This lipliner allows you to shape your lips with precision and ease, thanks to its advanced formula and special polymers that ensure clear definition. Its effect extends to enhance lipstick longevity by preventing it from bleeding into lines and smudging, keeping your lips looking flawless for longer.

Resistant to humidity and sweat, the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-232 Passnt Red** guarantees your lip makeup stays smooth and attractive for hours. Available in a wide range of colors to suit all your looks, this lipliner provides the perfect base for long-lasting lip makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-232 Passnt Red**:
â­ Shape the lips with the lipliner before applying lipstick or lipgloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-232 Passnt Red**:
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides, Talc, Mica, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Japan Wax, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

shortdescription_en: Define your lips precisely with Flormar's waterproof lipliner, preventing lipstick bleed and ensuring long wear.

title_en: Flormar Waterproof Lipliner PCL-238 Pure Rose
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ PCL-238 Ø¨ÙŠÙˆØ± Ø±ÙˆØ²
description_en:
Achieve flawless lip definition with the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-238 Pure Rose**. This lipliner is formulated with special polymers that help you shape your lips with ease and add precise definition, preventing lipstick from bleeding into fine lines and smudging. It also enhances the lasting power of your lipstick. Resistant to humidity and sweat, the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-238 Pure Rose** ensures your lip makeup looks smooth and stays vibrant for longer. Available in a variety of shades, this **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-238 Pure Rose** will provide the perfect base for a long-lasting lip look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-238 Pure Rose**
â­ Shape your lips with the **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-238 Pure Rose** before applying lipstick or lip gloss for a defined and polished look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Lipliner Pcl-238 Pure Rose**
â­ C10-18 Triglycerides
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Synthetic Japan Wax
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ +/-(May Contain): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).

shortdescription_en: Flormar's waterproof lipliner offers precise lip definition and long-lasting wear. Get perfectly shaped lips!

title_en: Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 58 Milky - Ultimate Gel Shine
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø¬ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙƒ 58 Ù…ÙŠÙ„ÙƒÙŠ - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ø¬Ù„ ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚
description_en:
Achieve a professional gel manicure effect at home with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 58 Milky**. This unique nail polish delivers ultra shimmer and intense color with an innovative formula that mimics gel finishes without the need for an LED lamp. Its special brush ensures an easy application, and just two coats are enough to give your nails a brilliantly glossy and volumized look. Discover your nails' ultimate shine with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 58 Milky**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 58 Milky**
â­ For a fantastic gloss and volume, application especially in two coats is recommended.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 58 Milky**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). [0414072.03]
